anya-e0301n:15_0: Sañjātaṃ so hadaye mayhaṃ, tamokhandhaṃ panūdataṃ.
anya-e0301n:20_0: Na tāhi tuṭṭhiṃ vindanti, ye sāratthā bhimānino;
anya-e0301n:21_0: Te maṃ saṅgamma yācanti, paramatthassa dīpanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:35_1: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ kattukāmo anuruddhatthero saṅgahārabbhe tāva sappayojane pañcapiṇḍatthe dassento ādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n:35_8: Sā sammāsambuddhamatulaṃ sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṃ abhivādiyāti etehi padehi dassitā.
anya-e0301n:35_9: Sakalena ganthena abhihitā padhānatthabhūtā cattāro abhidhammatthā ganthābhidheyyo.
anya-e0301n:37_0: Saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyoyevāti katvā abhidheyyo abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadena dassitotivuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:38_0: Na hi so appadhānatthabhūto saṅgahitabhāvo imasmiṃ piṇḍatthadassane abhidheyyo nāma bhavituṃ yuttoti.
anya-e0301n:38_1: Ito paṭṭhāyaca ṭīkāyanti vutte imassa saṅgahassa dvīsu sīhaḷaṭīkāsu pathamāṭīkā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:41_3: Saṅgahaganthe kate sati taduggahaparipucchādivasena anāyāsato laddhabbaṃ dhammānaṃ sarūpāvabodhādikaṃ
anya-e0301n:41_4: anupādāparinibbānantaṃ ganthassa phalānuphalaṃ ganthappayojanaṃ taṃpi abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadeneva sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ.
anya-e0301n:44_0: Na hi abhidhammatthasaddena vinā anāyāsato saṃsiddhimattadīpakena saṅgahasaddamattena tādiso anupādāparinibbānanto payo janaviseso sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0301n:45_0: 2. Tattha ratanattayavandanā tāva asaṅkheyyaappameyyappayojanā hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:46_0: Te tādise pūjayato, nibbute akuto bhaye;
anya-e0301n:47_0: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, yamettha mapi kenacīti.
anya-e0301n:48_0: Ya metthamapītiettha yenakenaci api manussenavā devenavā brahmunāvā saṅkhātuṃ na sakkāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:48_1: Ṭīkākārāpi taṃ payojanaṃ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti.
anya-e0301n:53_2: ratanattayavandanā hi nāma vandanākiriyābhinipphādako sattakkhattuṃ sattakkhattuṃ anekakoṭisatasahassavāre
anya-e0301n:53_4: So ca anuttaresu buddhādīsu puññakkhettesu saṃvaḍḍhitattā therassa ca uḷāracchandasaddhābuddhiguṇehi
anya-e0301n:53_5: paribhāvitattā mahājutiko mahapphalo mahānisaṃso ca puññātisayo hoti.
anya-e0301n:53_6: So sayaṃ payogasampattibhāve ṭhatvā bahiddhā vipattipaccaye apanetvā sampattipaccaye upanetvā atipaṇītautucittāhāra
anya-e0301n:53_7: samuṭṭhitānaṃ sarīraṭṭhakadhātūnaṃ upabrūhanaṃ katvā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya laddho kāsassa janakakammassa
anya-e0301n:53_10: Atha laddhānubalena laddho kāsena ca tadubhayena puññena nibbattā rūpārūpasantatiyo therasantāne yamakamahānadiyo
anya-e0301n:53_12: Tadā tasmiṃ iṭṭhaphalaghanaparipūrite therasantāne aniṭṭhaphalabhūtānaṃ rogādi antarāyānaṃ uppattiyā
anya-e0301n:53_13: okāso nāma natthīti iṭṭhaphalasantānavibādhakāni aniṭṭhaphalasantānajanakāni ca apuññakammāni dūrato
anya-e0301n:53_15: Na hi kammānināma puññāni apuññāni ca attano vipākuppattiyā okāse asati vipaccantīti.
anya-e0301n:53_16: Tato tasmiṃ santāne āyuvaṇṇā dayo iṭṭhaphaladhammā yāva ganthaniṭṭhānā yāva āyukappapariyo sānāpi vā vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhatvā pavattanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:55_0: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyuvaṇṇo sukhaṃ balanti.
anya-e0301n:56_1: Tasmā saṅgahārabbhe ratanattayavandanākaraṇaṃ therassa attanā ārabbha mānasaṅgahassa anantarāyena parisamāpanutthaṃ.
anya-e0301n:56_3: sotūnañca saṅgahaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ ādimhiyeva ratanattaya vandanā siddhito anantarāyena gahaṇa kiccasampajjanatthanti.
anya-e0301n:58_0: Sattasu javanesu pathamajavana vaseneva vandanā payojanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ viya dissati.
anya-e0301n:59_2: Yathā hi āhārarūpassa dvīsu kiccesu ojaṭṭhamakarūpajananakiccaṃ parittakaṃ appamattakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:59_4: Tathāhi paṭṭhānepi tadupatthambhanakiccameva gahetvā kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayoti vibhaṅgavāro vibhatto.
anya-e0301n:59_5: Evamevaṃ idhapi pathamajavanassa avunāva vipākajananakiccaṃ parittakaṃ appamattakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:59_9: Yasmā pana ganthābhidheyye ganthappakāre ganthappayojane ca ādito vivitesati sotu janānaṃ ganthassavane ussāho jāyati.
anya-e0301n:59_10: Tasmā tesaṃ ganthā bhidheyyādīnaṃ dassanaṃ ganthe ussāhajananatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n:60_2: Sammāca bujjhi sāmañca bujjhīti sammā sambuddho.
anya-e0301n:60_4: So bujjhitabbesu ñeyyadhammesu bujjhanakriyāya asesabyāvibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0301n:60_5: Tathāhi padesañāṇe ṭhitā paccekabuddhādayo attano visaye eva aviparītaṃ bujjhanti.
anya-e0301n:60_6: Avisaye pana andhakāre paviṭṭhāviya hontīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:60_7: Visayo ca tesaṃ appamattakova sabbaññuvisayaṃ upādāya yathā hattha puṭe ākāso appamattakova ajaṭākāsaṃ upādāyāti.
anya-e0301n:60_8: Te hi phassādīsu dhammesu ekadhammampi sabbākārato bujjhituṃ nasakkontīti.
anya-e0301n:60_11: Te hi anamatagge saṃsāre anantāsu ca lokadhātūsu tiyaddhagate addhamuttake ca dhamme hatthamaṇike viya samasame katvā bujjhanti.
anya-e0301n:60_12: Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāta māgacchantīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:60_14: Tattha hi te dhammā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaṃ abhidhammaṃ sammasanato paṭṭhāya niccakālaṃ upaṭṭhahantīti.
anya-e0301n:60_15: Sabbaññubuddhā pana yattake dhamme vicāretuṃ icchanti.
anya-e0301n:60_16: Tattake dhamme āvajjanāya visuṃ katvā āvajjitvā vicārentīti.
anya-e0301n:60_17: Nanu dhammā mahantā bhavaṅgaṃ parittakanti na codetabbametaṃ.
anya-e0301n:60_19: Saṃsaddo pana sāmanti etassa atthe upasaggo.
anya-e0301n:60_21: Na me ācariyo atthīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:60_22: Nanu bhagavato tatīyacatutthāruppa samāpattiyo āḷārudakamūlikāti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n:60_23: Tā pana analaṅkaritvā laddhamattāva hutvā chaḍḍitattā pacchā bujjhanakriyāya pādakamattāpi nahonti.
anya-e0301n:60_25: Tasmā tā bhagavato buddhabhāve sācariyakataṃ na sādhentīti.
anya-e0301n:61_1: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi.
anya-e0301n:63_1: Idāni thero attano vandanaṃ suṭṭhubalavaṃ karonto atulanti āha.
anya-e0301n:63_2: Anekaguṇapadavisayā hi vandanā suṭṭhutaraṃ balavatī hotīti.
anya-e0301n:63_3: Nanu ekaguṇapadavisayāpi vandanā antarā yanīvāraṇesamatthā siyāti kiṃ dutīyenāti.
anya-e0301n:63_5: Viññujātikā pana satthuguṇatthomane mattakārino nāma na honti.
anya-e0301n:63_9: Na kevalaṃ antarā yanīvāraṇameva vandanāya icchitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:63_11: Sopi hi anāyāsena gantha niṭṭhānassa ganthapārisuddhiyā ca paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0301n:63_13: Citta samādhāne ca sati paññātikkhāsūrā hutvā pahati.
anya-e0301n:63_14: Samāhito bhikkhave yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:63_15: Tasmā tadatthāyapi attano vandanā suṭṭhu balavatī kātabbāyevāti.
anya-e0301n:65_0: “Yathāvuttavacanattha yogepi sammāsambuddhasaddassa bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā atulanti iminā vise setī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:66_2: Tasmā taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ jānantānaṃsantike bhāvatthasuññaṃ satthusamaññāmattaṃ bhavituṃ nārahati.
anya-e0301n:66_3: Aññesaṃ pana padasahassaṃ vuccamānaṃpi satthu samaññāmattameva sampajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:66_6: natthitulo sadiso etassāti vā atulo. Bhagavā.
anya-e0301n:66_7: Na hi atthi bhagavato attanā sadiso koci lokasminti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:67_0: Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0301n:69_3: Tadā hi mahāpuriso sampatijātova samāno puratthimadisābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0301n:69_4: Tasmiṃ disā bhāge anantāni cakkavāḷāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0301n:69_5: Tesu ṭhitā devabrahmāno mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadiso natthi.
anya-e0301n:69_8: Tadā mahāpuriso attano sabbalokaggabhāvaṃ ñatvā aggohamasmi lokassa,
anya-e0301n:69_11: natthi dāni punabbhavoti evaṃ achambhivācaṃ nicchāresīti.
anya-e0301n:69_14: Yadā pana so sumedhabhūto dīpaṅkarabuddhassa santike niyatabyākaraṇaṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e0301n:69_15: Tadāpi thapetvā dīpaṅkarasammāsambuddhaṃ pāramitāguṇehi tena sadiso koci nattheva.
anya-e0301n:69_16: Natthibhāvocassa tadā pavatte hi dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīhi asādhāraṇapāṭihāriyehi dīpetabbo.
anya-e0301n:69_17: Tāni hi paccekabodhisattānaṃ satasahassaṃpi pavattetuṃ na sakkhissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:69_19: Teneva hi tadā pavattipāramipavicayaññāṇaṃ attano visaye sabbaññuthaññāṇagatikanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:69_20: Sāvakabodhisattāpi hi yato paṭṭhāya attano bodhiyā anurūpe sambhāradhamme sayameva jānituṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n:69_21: Tato paṭṭhāya anivattidhammā hutvā vattānusārimahāputhujjanabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā bodhisattabhūmiṃ okkantā honti.
anya-e0301n:69_22: Ekena pariyāyena niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ca nāma honti.
anya-e0301n:69_23: Tadā eva buddhānaṃ sammukhibhāve sati niyatabyākaraṇaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n:71_0: Samitatthe yyakārassa akārassa vā vasena etaṃ siddhanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:72_0: Na hi tulasaddo dhātusiddho kammasādhano ca bhavituṃ na yutto.
anya-e0301n:72_4: Evañca sati kammasādhaneneva tadatthasiddhito kiṃ tato samitatthe yyakārassaakārassa vā cintāyāti.
anya-e0301n:72_5: Vatticchānugato saddappayogoti katvā etaṃ vuttanti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n:72_6: Yathā sutaṃ yuttaṃ vajjetvā assutassa parikappanāya payo janābhāvatoti.
anya-e0301n:73_1: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi satthu tisso sampadā vibhā vitā honti.
anya-e0301n:73_3: Tattha satthu mahākaruṇā samaṅgitā bodhisambhārasambharaṇañca hetusampadānāma.
anya-e0301n:73_4: Bodhimaṇḍe pavattitā catuvīsati koṭisabhasahassasaṅkhā mahāvajiraññāṇasaṅkhātā sabbaññumahā vipassanāpi ettheva saṅgahitā.
anya-e0301n:73_6: Pahāna sampadāyameva vā sā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:73_7: Phalasampadā catubbidhā pahānasampadā ñāṇasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti.
anya-e0301n:73_8: Tattha saha vāsanāya kilesappahānaṃ pahānasampadā nāma.
anya-e0301n:75_0: Etāsu dvīsu sampadāsu ñāṇasampadā pathamaṃ vuttā,
anya-e0301n:77_0: “Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ aggamaggaññāṇa”nti ñāṇasampadāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:78_1: Na hi maggaññāṇato aññā pahānasampadānāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n:78_2: Yañca koci vadeyya maggaññāṇaṃ ñāṇañca hoti pahānañca.
anya-e0301n:80_0: Ñāṇasampadāyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sabbapathamaṃ vattabbaṃpi na vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:81_0: Nanu “tammūlakāni ca dasabalādi ññāṇānī”ti ettha ādisaddena sabbaññutaññāṇaṃpi gahitanti ce.
anya-e0301n:82_0: Na hi appadhānaṃ sarūpato niddisitvā padhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ ādisaddena gahitanti ñāyāgataṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:82_1: Acinteyyānubhāvehi sīlā diguṇehi iddhi dhammehi ca sampadā ānubhāvasampadā.
anya-e0301n:82_5: Ajjhāsayassa uḷāratā kāyavacīpayogassa ca parisuddhatāti attho.
anya-e0301n:82_6: Tattha devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā āsaya sampadā.
anya-e0301n:82_7: Loke abhiññātānaṃ rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ seṭṭhi gahapatīnaṃ devarājūnampi dhammaṃ desentassa lābhasakkārādi
anya-e0301n:82_10: Dvīhi ānu bhāvarūpakāyasampadāhi saha dve sattupakārasampadā atulapadena.
anya-e0301n:82_11: Hetusampadā pana dvīhipi padehi sāmatthiyato vibhāvitā.
anya-e0301n:82_12: Na hi tādisiyā hetusampadāya vinā itarāsaṃ pavatti atthīti. [Sampadā]
anya-e0301n:83_1: Punapi thero attano vandanaṃ balavataraṃ karonto sasaddhammagaṇuttamanti āha.
anya-e0301n:83_4: sasaṅghaṃ lokanāyakanti hi vutte saṅghassapi namanakriyāpatti sahasaddena viññāyati.
anya-e0301n:85_0: “Guṇībhūtānaṃpi hi dhammasaṅghānaṃ abhivādetabba bhāvo sahayogena viññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:85_3: Evañhi sati idha adhippetassa kriyā samavāyassa siddhattā dhammasaṅghānaṃpi therassa vandanā kriyāpatti siddhā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:85_4: Itarathā tabbapaccayassa arahatthadīpanato abhivādanā rahatā saṅkhāta guṇasamavāyo vutto siyā.
anya-e0301n:85_6: Attano nidassanena ca saha na sameti saputtadāro āgatoti.
anya-e0301n:86_0: Apica thero imaṃ ganthaṃ racayissāmīti pubbabhāgeyeva tīṇi ratanāni vandi,
anya-e0301n:86_1: atha taṃ attano vandanaṃ ganthappaṭiññāya saha ghaṭetvā dassento imaṃ gāthaṃ racayītipi na na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n:86_5: Tattha saddhammena ca gaṇuttamena ca attanā nimmitena sakalalokassa saraṇabhūtena saha vattatīti sasaddhamma gaṇuttamo.
anya-e0301n:86_7: Na hi paranimmitena saddhammena gaṇuttamena ca sahitā sāvakā sasaddhammāti ca sagaṇuttamāti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0301n:86_8: Na ca attanoeva saraṇabhūtena saddhammena sabrahmacārigaṇuttamena ca sahitā paccekabuddhā tathā thomanaṃ arahantīti,
anya-e0301n:86_9: tasmā idaṃpi satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:87_3: Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:87_7: yesaṃ vasena sattā apāyesuvā vaṭṭadukkhesuvā patanti,
anya-e0301n:87_9: Imasmiṃ atthe cattāro ariyamaggā nibbānañca nippariyāyato dhammonāma.
anya-e0301n:87_10: Ariyamaggā hi kilese samucchindantā nibbānena saheva hutvā samucchindanti.
anya-e0301n:87_19: Yo hi dhārentaṃ ekantena dukkhato moceti.
anya-e0301n:87_24: Tehi keci bhāvanā vasena keci sacchikiriyavasena keci diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāravasena keci uggaha dhāraṇavasena dhārīyanti.
anya-e0301n:87_25: Te ca evaṃ dhārīyamānā dhārentaṃ yathārahaṃ apāyadukkhato vaṭṭadukkhatoca mocenti,
anya-e0301n:87_27: Dhārentivā sappurisājanā apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca attānaṃ apata mānaṃ vahanti etenāti dhammo.
anya-e0301n:87_28: Dharantivā ettha dhammadīpā dhammappaṭisaraṇā janā laddhappatiṭṭhā hontīti dhammotipi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:87_30: Nanu paṭipattidhammena saha ekādasavidhova vattabboti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n:87_31: Sopana paṭipattidhammo maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāeva hotīti pubbacetanā viya dāne magge eva so saṅgahito.
anya-e0301n:87_32: Tasmā dhammo dasavidhova sabbattha vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:88_2: Tadaggena pariyattidhārakopi saṅghe vandaneyye saṅgahitoti yutto.
anya-e0301n:88_4: Tadaggena tassa kalyāṇahetubhūto paṭipatti dhammopi dhamme vandaneyye saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:88_5: So hi puthujjanabhūtopi yehi dhammehi samannāgatattā sekhe sotāpatti phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahito.
anya-e0301n:88_6: Te pana dhammā sekkhe sotāpattimagge asaṅgahitāti nasakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n:88_7: Ettāvatā ye vadanti saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti,
anya-e0301n:88_9: Na hi taṃsaraṇaṃ gacchantassa saraṇagamanaṃ sampajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:88_12: yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca desito paññatto,
anya-e0301n:88_13: so vo mamaccayena satthāti evaṃ satthuṭhāne thapetvā bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇito pariyattidhammo dhammasaraṇe saṅgahitoti yutto,
anya-e0301n:88_19: Satthārā ca anekesu suttasahassesu so garahito.
anya-e0301n:89_1: Samitakilesānaṃ tatoyeva pasatthānaṃ pūjitānaṃ sappurisānaṃ paṇḍitānañca dhammoti attho.
anya-e0301n:89_3: sopi ekantena santoyeva hotīti santo dhammotipi saddhammo.
anya-e0301n:89_4: Pasattho pūjito dhammoti attho. Sacco vā.
anya-e0301n:89_6: So hi ayaṃ me hitoti dhārentassa ahitoyeva sampajjati.
anya-e0301n:89_9: Gaṇuttamapade loke samāna diṭṭhisīlānaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ samūho gaṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:89_10: Idha pana uttamehi sīlādiguṇehi yutto bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamoca so gaṇocāti atthena uttamagaṇonāma.
anya-e0301n:89_11: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati yathā muniseṭṭho munivaroti.
anya-e0301n:91_0: “Gaṇānaṃ gaṇesuvā devamanussādisamūhesu uttamo gaṇuttamo”ti ca vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:92_0: Etasmiñhi atthe sati uttamasaddo padhānabhūto hoti.
anya-e0301n:92_1: Soca guṇamhiyeva pavattatīti tena idha ariyasaṅgho vuttoti nasijjhatīti.
anya-e0301n:92_5: Tattha samaggena saṅghena kataṃ upasampadākammaṃ sammutināma.
anya-e0301n:92_6: Tāya sammutiyā upasampannabhūmiṃ patvā ṭhito bhikkhusaṅgho sammutisaṅghonāma.
anya-e0301n:92_10: Tathāpi saraṇagamana vandanā māna pūjāsakkārānussatiṭṭhānesu anuttara puññakkhetta vise sapariggahatthaṃ
anya-e0301n:92_11: bhagavatā tathā tathā saṃvaṇṇetvā so visuṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:92_12: Puthujjanasaṅghohi puññakkhettaṃ samānopi anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nahoti. Kasmā.
anya-e0301n:92_13: Sālikkhette tiṇānaṃ viya khettaduṭṭhānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchānusayānaṃ sabbhāvāti.
anya-e0301n:92_14: Puññakkhettabhāvo panassa purime saddhammapade vuttanayena veditabboti.
anya-e0301n:93_2: Ettha ca ayaṃ loke sīlādiguṇayutto seṭṭho vandaneyyoti evaṃ seṭṭha cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vandanto visesato vandatīti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:94_0: Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā, katamā tisso. Kāyena vandati, vācāya vandati, manasā vandatīti.
anya-e0301n:95_0: Tattha seṭṭhacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jāṇudvaya kapparadvaya nalāṭa saṅkhātāni pañca aṅgāni bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0301n:95_2: Yaṃ sandhāya pañcappatiṭṭhitena vanditvāti tattha tattha vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:95_10: Guṇapadāni anugantvā guṇe anussaranto manasā vandatināmāti.
anya-e0301n:96_2: Kāmañca thero imaṃ saṅgahaṃ racayanto potthakāruḷhaṃ katvāva racayissati.
anya-e0301n:96_3: Ganthakammaṃ nāma vācākammesu pasiddhanti katvā bhāsissanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:97_1: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti pade abhidhamme vuttā atthā abhidhammatthā.
anya-e0301n:97_3: Saṅgayhantitica therena saṃkhipitvā gayhanti kathīyantīti attho.
anya-e0301n:97_4: Abhidhammeti cettha abhiatireko abhivise soca dhammo abhidhammo.
anya-e0301n:97_5: Dhammoti ca vinayapāḷito aññaṃpāḷi dvayaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0301n:97_6: Yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca desito paññattoti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:97_7: Tañca pāḷidvayaṃ āṇāvidhānasaṅkhātaṃ vinayana kiccaṃ vajjetvā kusalādike yathāpavatte paramatthadhamme eva dīpetīti.
anya-e0301n:97_8: Evaṃ dīpentesuca tesu dvīsu dhammesu yo itarato atirekoca hoti visesoca.
anya-e0301n:97_11: Evañca katvā dhammo abhidhammo vinayo abhivinayoti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:97_16: Atirekavisesatā cettha kusalādi vasena khandhādivasena saṅgahādivasena tathā tathā desetabbappakārānaṃ
anya-e0301n:97_18: Yato sabbaññubuddhā imaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ devesueva desenti.
anya-e0301n:97_19: Na hi manussā evarūpaṃ tayo māse nirantaraṃ pavattanayogyaṃ kathāmaggaṃ ekena iriyāpathena ādito paṭṭhāya pariyosānaṃ pāpetvā paṭiggahetuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e0301n:97_20: naca eva rūpo ekamātikānubandho kathāmaggo nānākhaṇesu nānājanānaṃ desetuṃ sakkuṇeyyo hotīti.
anya-e0301n:97_23: Tattha hi dhammanāmikānaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ majjheeva ayaṃ atirekavisesatā vicāritā.
anya-e0301n:97_24: Naca yujjati vinayena saha tathā vicāretuṃ asamānakiccavisayattā.
anya-e0301n:97_28: Kecipana vadanti evaṃ santepi vinayo eva sabbajeṭṭhako siyā.
anya-e0301n:97_34: Tattha vinayaṃ vivaṇṇento satthu āṇācakke pahāraṃ deti.
anya-e0301n:97_37: tassa dhammasaṅghesu tīsu sikkhāsuca agāravo siddho hoti.
anya-e0301n:97_38: Tasmā vinaya vivaṇṇane āpatti mahantī hoti.
anya-e0301n:97_42: Tasmā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃpi vinayavivaṇṇane mahatī āpatti paññattāti.
anya-e0301n:102_1: Evaṃ ādigāthāyataṃtaṃ payojana sahite pañca atthe dassetvā idāni te abhidhammatthe uddesato dassento dutīyagāthamāha.
anya-e0301n:102_2: Tattha tatthāti bhāsissaṃ abhidhammattha saṅgahanti vutte tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā vuttā
anya-e0301n:102_3: abhidhammatthā sabbathāparamatthato catudhā hontīti yojanā. Etthaca -
anya-e0301n:104_0: Tattha tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapakaraṇetivā abhidhammattha padetivā abhidhammetivā tasaddattho niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0301n:105_0: Na hi abhidhammattha saṅgahapakaraṇe mayā vuttā abhidhammatthāti yujjati.
anya-e0301n:105_4: Na ca saṃvaṇṇanāpakaraṇesu ādimhiyeva tāva tasaddo appadhānapadāni paccāmasatīti atthi.
anya-e0301n:105_5: Tasmā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ ādimhi tattha kena ṭṭhena abhidhammoti vākyeviya idha tasaddattho veditabboti.
anya-e0301n:108_2: Tatta sabbathāti dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vuttena kusalādinā sabbappakārenapi catudhāva honti,
anya-e0301n:108_3: vibhaṅge vibhatte na khandhādinā sabbappakārenapi catudhāva hontīti attho.
anya-e0301n:109_4: tattha satta puggala atta jīvādikā paññattiatthā sabhāvato avijjamānāyeva honti.
anya-e0301n:109_5: Dhammavavatthānaññāṇarahitānaṃpana mahājanānaṃ citte mahantamahantāpi hutvā vijjamānāviya paññāyanti,
anya-e0301n:109_6: teca mahājanā samaggā hutvā tesaṃ ekantena atthibhāvaṃ gahetvā tathā tathā voharanti ceva sampaṭicchantica.
anya-e0301n:109_7: Tasmā te mahājanehi samaggehi sammatattātatoyevaca vacīsaccaviratisaccānaṃ vatthubhūtattāsammuti saccanti vuccanti.
anya-e0301n:109_8: Tasmiṃ sammutisacce ṭhatvā sammā paṭipajjantā sabba lokiyasampattiyoca sabbabodhisambhāra dhammeca ārādhenti.
anya-e0301n:109_11: Paramatthasaccaṃ pana patvā taṃ saccameva nahoti.
anya-e0301n:109_12: Tañhi sayaṃ avijjamānaṃyeva samānaṃ mahājane vijjamānantveva gaṇhāpeti.
anya-e0301n:109_13: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhi tividhamicchādiṭṭhīnaṃ vatthu hutvā bālajanānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyātuṃ nadeti.
anya-e0301n:109_17: Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiādīsu sattasu pakaraṇesu vibhattā kusalādayo dhammā sabhāvasaccaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:109_18: Te hi sayaṃ sabhāvato vijjamānattā kusalānāma dhammā atthi sukhānāma vedanā atthīti gaṇhantena visaṃvādentīti.
anya-e0301n:109_19: Taṃ pana ariyasaccaṃ patvā kiñci asaccaṃpi hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n:109_20: Tathāhi anubhavanabhedamattaṃ upādāyeva vedanā sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n:109_22: Sabbehi pana aniccatā saṅkhatatādīhi anekasatehi ākārehi sabbāpi vedanā dukkhāeva.
anya-e0301n:109_23: Tathā anavajjasukhavipākaṭṭhena kusalabhāvopi akusalaṃ upādāyeva vutto.
anya-e0301n:109_24: Sabbepi hi tebhūmakā kusalasammatā dhammā sāsavatā saṃkilesikatā oghaniya yoganiya upādāniyatā saṅkhātehi vajjehi sāvajjāeva honti.
anya-e0301n:109_25: Dukkhasaccabhūtānañca vipākānaṃ jananaṭṭhena ekantena dukkhavipākāeva honti.
anya-e0301n:109_27: Sabbepi hi catubbhū makadhammā ekantena attāpināma natthi.
anya-e0301n:109_31: Ayaṃ nayo sesattika dukadhammesupi yathārahaṃ netabbo.
anya-e0301n:109_32: Ariya saccaṃnāma sabbesaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ ekanta dukkhabhāvo taṇhāya ekanta dukkhasamudaya bhāvo nibbānasseva
anya-e0301n:109_34: Idhameva hi parisuddhabuddhīnaṃ ariyānaṃ ñāṇe acalamānaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ nippariyāyasaccaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:109_35: Tesu idha sammutisaccaṃ nivattento paramatthatoti ida māha.
anya-e0301n:109_38: Tattha yo vinā aññāpadesena kevalaṃ visuṃ visuṃ attano lakkhaṇena vijjamāno hutvā siddho.
anya-e0301n:109_41: Vijjamānassapana atthassa nānā pavattiākāre upādāya cittena parikappetvā saviggahaṃ katvā gahito cittamayo
anya-e0301n:109_45: So hi santi bhavanti buddhisaddā etthāti attho.
anya-e0301n:109_46: Ekantavijjamānaṭṭhena itarato paramo ukkaṃsagato atthoti paramattho. Api ca,
anya-e0301n:109_47: ye ayaṃ atthi ayaṃ upalabbhatīti gahetvā tassa abhiññeyyassa abhiññatthāya,
anya-e0301n:109_52: Tesaṃ tadatthasādhane avisaṃvādakaṭṭhena paramo uttamo atthoti paramattho.
anya-e0301n:109_53: Itaropana avijjamānattā tassa abhiññādiatthāya paṭipajjantānaṃ tadatthasādhane visaṃvādakoyeva bhavissati.
anya-e0301n:109_54: Napana tadatthaṃ sādhessa tīti paramatthoti vattuṃ nārahatīti.
anya-e0301n:111_0: “Paramassavā uttamassa ñāṇassa attho gocaroti paramattho”tipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:112_3: So eva attho aviparītassa ñāṇassa visayabhāvaṭṭhenāti saccikaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:112_4: Taṃpi aviparītena ñāṇena araṇīyato upagantabba to atthoti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n:113_2: Etthaca cintanakriyā nāma niccaṃ ārammaṇāpekkhā hoti.
anya-e0301n:113_3: Na hi sā ārammaṇena vinā labbhatīti.
anya-e0301n:113_4: Tasmā ārammaṇaggahaṇa ārammaṇupaladdhiyeva idha cintanāti daṭṭhabbāti.
anya-e0301n:113_5: Evañhi sati bhavaṅgasamaya visaññisamayesu cittaṃ ārammaṇena vināpi pavattatīti evaṃ vādīnaṃ vādo paṭikkhitto hoti.
anya-e0301n:113_6: Santesupica nissaya samanantarādīsu tassa paccayesu tehi nāmaṃ alabhitvā ārammaṇapaccayavasenevassa nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:113_8: Tañhi ārammaṇaggahaṇakicce pubbaṅgamabhūtanti taṃ sampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhantā tassa vaseneva gaṇhantīti.
anya-e0301n:113_10: Sabbepi hi dhammā taṃtaṃ kriyāmattāva honti.
anya-e0301n:113_11: Na tesu dabbaṃvā saṇṭhānaṃ vā viggahovā upalabbhati.
anya-e0301n:113_13: Na te attano thāmenavā balenavā vasenavā sattiyāvā uppajjituṃpi sakkonti.
anya-e0301n:113_16: na kadāci kassaci vase vattituṃ sakkontīti.
anya-e0301n:113_19: aya kriyāti evaṃ vibhāgo nalabbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:113_20: Evañca katvā sabbesu paramatthapadesu ekaṃ bhāvasādhanameva padhānato labbhati.
anya-e0301n:113_22: Ettha ca dabbādivasena abhedassa cintanassa atthavisesañāpanatthaṃ vibhāga kappanāvasena bhedakaraṇaṃ pariyāyakathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:113_24: tathā karaṇañca taṃ taṃ kriyāsaṅkhāta dhammavimuttassa paraparikappitassa kārakabhūtassa atta jīva satta puggalassa sabbaso abhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n:113_25: Sati hi attādimhi kiṃ abhedassa bhedakappanāyāti.
anya-e0301n:115_0: Sasavisāṇaṃ viya abhūtassa bhūta kappanā vuttā viya dissati.
anya-e0301n:115_2: dhammesu kattāvā kāre tāvā koci natthi.
anya-e0301n:115_3: Lokepana attappadhāno kriyā nipphādako kattānāma siddho.
anya-e0301n:115_4: Tasmā cintanakicce attappadhānatā dīpanatthaṃ taṃ kattubhāvaṃ citte āropetvā cintetīti cittanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:116_0: Cittassaca balena taṃsampayuttānaṃpi tasmiṃ kicce tadanukūlappavattidīpanatthaṃ punakaraṇabhāvaṃ citte
anya-e0301n:116_1: kattubhāvañca tesu āropetvā cintenti sampayuttakā dhammā etenāti cittanti vuttanti.
anya-e0301n:117_2: Tampi kho bhikkhave caraṇaṃ cittaṃ citteneva cintitanti.
anya-e0301n:117_3: Tenāpi kho bhikkhave caraṇena cittena cittaññeva cittataranti,
anya-e0301n:117_4: nā haṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekanikāyaṃpi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0301n:117_6: Tepi kho bhikkhave tiracchānagatā pāṇā citteneva cittikatā.
anya-e0301n:117_7: Tehipi kho bhikkhave tiracchāna gatehi pāṇehi cittaññeva cittataranti.
anya-e0301n:118_0: Tattha caraṇaṃnāma cittanti yatthavicitrāni dibbavimānādīni cittakammāni katvā idañcidañca puññaṃ karontā idhacidhaca nibbattāti dassento vicaranti.
anya-e0301n:118_9: Yonivicittatāya tesaṃ tiracchā nagatānaṃ vicittatā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n:119_0: Taṃ taṃ sabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ, kiccasampattiyo raso;
anya-e0301n:121_0: Āsannakāraṇaṃ yaṃ taṃ, padaṭṭhānanti taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0301n:124_1: Cetasikanti ettha cetasi bhavaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti cetasikaṃ.
anya-e0301n:124_3: Etthaca tadāyattavuttitā nāma ekuppādatādīhi lakkhaṇehi cittena saha ekī bhūtassa viya pavatti.
anya-e0301n:124_10: tadeva phassādīnanti evaṃ ekapuppha mañjariyaṃ ekavaṇṭupanibbandhāni pupphāni viya cittena saha ekajātiyādi
anya-e0301n:124_11: upanibbandhā phassādayo dhammā idha cetasikaṃnāmāti siddhā honti.
anya-e0301n:124_12: Evañca sati cittaṃpi tehi phassādīhi saha tatheva āyattaṃ pavattatīti taṃpi phassikaṃ vedanikantiādinā vattabbanti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n:124_16: Etthaca manomayāti manasāeva pakatā nimmitā cittakriyā bhūtāti attho.
anya-e0301n:124_17: Etena te phassādayo dhammā cittena vinā nupalabbhantīti dasseti.
anya-e0301n:124_19: Pañcaviññāṇa cittañhitehi kehici vitakkādīhi vinā uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:124_20: Tasmā tesaññeva tadāyatta vuttitā vattabbā na cittassāti.
anya-e0301n:126_0: Ekālambaṇatā mattena tesaṃ tadāyattavuttitaṃ cetasi kattañca vibhāveti. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:127_1: Ettha ca loke nānāvaṇṇadhātuyo udake ghaṃsitvā vatthumhi nānā cittakammāni karonti,
anya-e0301n:127_2: tattha vatthumhi pharaṇaṃ bandhanañca udakasseva kiccaṃ,
anya-e0301n:128_2: Sītuṇhādīhi virodhi paccayehi visama pavatti vasena vikāraṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0301n:128_3: tehi vā vikāraṃ āpādīyatīti attho. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:129_0: Ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:129_6: Ḍaṃsa makasa vātātapa sariṃ sapa sapphassehipi ruppatīti.
anya-e0301n:130_5: Tesañhi appaṭighasabhāvānaṃ sukhuma rūpānaṃpi bahiddhā sītādīhi samāgamonāma natthi.
anya-e0301n:130_10: Samāgamoca nāma idha thapetvā āpātagamanaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇañca aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ ṭhitipattānaṃ oḷārikarūpānaṃ
anya-e0301n:130_13: Ruppanañcanāma parasenāyuddhena raṭṭhakhobhoviya kalāpantaragatadhātūnaṃ kuppanaṃ bhijjanaṃca vuccati.
anya-e0301n:130_19: Omattādhimattarūpasantatīnaṃ uppattiyā paccayabhāvaṃ pattā hontīti attho.
anya-e0301n:130_22: Tadubhayaṃpi kappavuṭṭhāne kappasaṇṭhāne nānāāyukappa saṃvacchara utu māsa ratti divādīnaṃ parivattaneca pākaṭaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:130_23: Kasmā pana rūpanti nāmaṃ ghaṭṭanavasena ruppanadhammānameva siddhanti.
anya-e0301n:130_25: Rūpadhammā hi samūhasaṇṭhānādi bhāvapattiyā saviggahā honti.
anya-e0301n:130_26: Tasmā tesameva ruppanaṃ paccakkhatopi lokassa pākaṭanti tesveva rūpanti nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:130_27: Arūpadhammā pana aviggahāti na tesaṃ vikāro paccakkhato lokassa pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0301n:130_28: Taṃ taṃ rūpavikāraṃ disvāvā sutvā vā pucchitvāyeva vā so lokena jānitabbo aññatra paracittavidūhi.
anya-e0301n:132_1: Yasmā pana vohāronāma lokopacārena vinā nasijjhati.
anya-e0301n:132_3: Tasmā idha sītādiggahaṇena vināpi tappasaṅganivatti lokatova siddhāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:133_0: Yasmā ca brahmaloke brahmānaṃ kāyavikāra vacīvikārā ca iddhivikuppanāvasappavattā nānārūpavikārāca dissantiyeva.
anya-e0301n:133_1: Teca ekena pariyāyena ruppanākārāeva nāma honti,
anya-e0301n:133_2: tasmā tesaṃ vasena tattha rūpānaṃ rūpatāsiddhi hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:133_3: Rūpayati vā attano sabhāvena pakāsatīti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n:133_4: Arūpadhammā hi na attano sabhāvena pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0301n:133_6: Idaṃ pana attano sabhāveneva pākaṭaṃ pañcaviññāṇehipi gahetabbanti.
anya-e0301n:133_7: Imasmiṃ atthe sati brahmaloke rūpānaṃpi uju katova rūpatāsiddhi hotīti.
anya-e0301n:135_0: Anuggāhakānaṃ sītādīnaṃ vasena taṃ sabhāvā nātivattana vasenaca tattha rūpatāsiddhi vibhāvitā.
anya-e0301n:135_1: Yasmāpana sīte nāpi uṇhenāpītiādivacanaṃ nidassanamattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:135_3: tathāhi saññā viññāṇānipi rūpārammaṇarasārammaṇehi eva pāḷiyaṃ niddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0301n:135_5: Na ca viññāṇaṃ rasa meva vijānāti.
anya-e0301n:135_7: Tasmā sītādiggahaṇaṃ amuñcitvāva tattha rūpatāsiddhivibhāvanena payojana natthīti. [Rūpaṃ]
anya-e0301n:136_1: Nibbānanti ettha nibbāyanti sabbe vaṭṭadukkhasantāpā etasminti nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:136_2: Nibbāyantīti ye kilesāvā khandhāvā abhāvitamaggassa āyatiṃ uppajjanārahapakkhe ṭhitā honti.
anya-e0301n:136_4: Na hi khaṇattayaṃ patvā niruddhā atītadhammā nibbāyanti nāma.
anya-e0301n:136_5: Paccuppannesu āyatiṃ avassaṃ uppajjamānesuca dhammesu vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0301n:136_7: Na hi tividha vaṭṭadukkhasantāparahitānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ anuppādanirodho nibbānaṃnāma hotīti.
anya-e0301n:136_11: Tesaṃ tabbinimuttaṃ aññaṃ nibbutiṭṭhānaṃnāma kiñci natthīti.
anya-e0301n:136_13: Nibbanti dhīrā yathayaṃ padīpoti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:136_14: Nibbāyantīti taṃ taṃ kilesānaṃvā khandhānaṃvā puna appaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
anya-e0301n:136_17: Ṭīkāsupana bhavābhavaṃ vinanato saṃsibbana to vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā.
anya-e0301n:138_0: “Nibbābhivā etena rāgaggiādikoti nibbāna”ntipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:139_0: Na hi maggeviya nibbāne katthaci karaṇasādhanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0301n:139_1: naca nibbānaṃ nibbūti kriyāsādhane rāgādikassa kattuno saha kāripaccayo hotīti.
anya-e0301n:142_1: Idāni uddesakkamena cittaṃ tāva niddisanto tattha cittantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:142_4: Cattāro vidhā pakārā yassa taṃ catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0301n:143_2: Kāmentivā ettha sattā avikkhambhitakāmarāgattā kāmaratiyāeva ramanti.
anya-e0301n:143_11: Maraṇakāle hi upaṭṭhitā nirayaggijālā suvaṇṇavaṇṇāviya khāyanti.
anya-e0301n:143_12: Eko kira micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo maraṇamañce nippanno hoti.
anya-e0301n:143_13: Tassa ācariyabrāhmaṇā samīpe ṭhatvā brahmalokaṃ bho gacchāti vadanti.
anya-e0301n:143_15: Tadā so bho ācariyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā paññāyantīti āha.
anya-e0301n:143_24: Etthaca avacaratīti padassa uppajjatīti attho na gahetabbo.
anya-e0301n:143_27: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannāti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:143_28: Yadi cettha so attho adhippeto siyā.
anya-e0301n:143_29: Evaṃ sabhi etthāvacarā etthuppannāti vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n:143_31: Naca pariyāpannasaddo uppannasaddena saha samānatthoti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n:143_32: Na hi lokuttaracittāni tīsu bhavesu uppannā nipi tatra pariyāpannāniyeva hontīti.
anya-e0301n:144_1: Evañca sati tasmiṃ kāme ye mahaggata lokuttaradhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:144_2: Tesaṃpi kāmā vacaratāpattidoso rūpāvacaratādi muttidosoca āpajjati.
anya-e0301n:144_4: Tesañca rūpārūpā vacaratā pattidoso kāmāvacaratā muttidosoca āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:144_7: Tasmā idhapi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ attano attano bhummīsu uppannabahulattā kāmāvacarādi nāmalābhe sati na koci dosoti.Na.
anya-e0301n:144_8: Evañhi sati lokuttara dhammānaṃ kāmāvacaratādi muccanatthaṃ yebhuyyena uppannabhūmi visuṃ vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0301n:144_11: Tehi uppajjantā tīsu bhavesu eva uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:144_12: Tasmā tesaṃ kāma rūpārūpāvacaratāpattidoso dunnivāro siyāti.
anya-e0301n:144_14: Tasmāssa tathā atthaṃ aggahetvā etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannāti bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitena pāḷinayenevassa attho gahetabboti.
anya-e0301n:144_16: Kāme avacarati pariyāpannabhāvena tasmiṃ ajjhogāhetvā carati pavattatīti kāmāvacaranti.
anya-e0301n:144_17: Pariyāpannabhāvocanāma attano ādhārabhūtena tena kāmena saha samānajātigottanāmatā saṅkhātehi paritobhāgehi
anya-e0301n:144_20: Soca tathā pariyāpannabhāvo pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya katoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:144_21: Ettāvatā yedhammā rūpārūpasattasantānabhūtāpi mayhaṃ eteti kāma taṇhāya pariggahitā kāme pariyāpannāva honti.
anya-e0301n:144_24: Tesupana rūpataṇhā arūpataṇhāca pariggāhinī taṇhā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:145_0: Yepana dhammā tiṇṇaṃ taṇhānaṃ pariggahavimuttā honti.
anya-e0301n:145_1: Te tīsu bhavesu uppannāpi tatra apariyāpannāeva hontīti lokuttarā nāma jātāti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n:145_2: Etthaca paṭṭhāne āruppe kāmacchandaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca uddhaccanīvaraṇantiādinā arūpasattasantānepi kāmacchandasaṅkhātāya kāmataṇhāya uppatti vuttā.
anya-e0301n:145_3: Tasmā rūpārūpa bhūmīsu uppannānaṃ kāmadhammānaṃ pariggāhinītaṇhā rūpārūpasattasantāna gatāpi daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:145_5: Na hi jhānabhūmīsu ekantanīvaraṇakiccāni nīvaraṇāni sakkā laddhunti.
anya-e0301n:145_9: Tattha thapetvā rūpārūparāge añño sabbopi lobho imasmiṃ catubbhūmiparicchede kile sakāmonāma.
anya-e0301n:145_10: Thapetvāca rūpārūpāvacaradhamme aññe sabbepi tīsu bhūmīsu uppannā kāmāvacaradhammā vatthukāmonāmāti.
anya-e0301n:145_11: Yaṃpana aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā vatthukāmoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:145_12: Taṃ mahāniddese niddiṭṭhena suttantikapariyāyena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:145_13: Na hi rūpārūpāvacaradhammā abhidhamme kāmanāmena vuttā atthīti.
anya-e0301n:146_1: Rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaranti ettha rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:146_7: Tatthaca heṭṭhā ekādasavidhā bhummi oḷārikena kāmena visesetvā kāma bhūmīti vuttā.
anya-e0301n:146_8: Upari soḷasavidhā bhummi rūpabhūmiicceva vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:146_10: Tattha nissayassanāmaṃ nissite āropanavasena nissayopacāro veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:146_12: Tattha nissitassa nāmaṃ nissaye āropanavasena nissito pacāroti.
anya-e0301n:146_15: Ayamettha tebhūmaka paricchede pāḷianugatā paramatthadīpanā. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:147_1: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattīdeve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
anya-e0301n:147_2: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:147_5: Heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito akaniṭṭhe deve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā
anya-e0301n:147_6: ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassavā upapannassavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissavā cittacetasikā dhammā,
anya-e0301n:147_9: Heṭṭhato ākāsānañcāyatanupage deve pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito nevasaññā nāsaññā yatanupage deve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare. La.
anya-e0301n:149_0: Yathāvuttaṃ suvisadaṃ pāḷinayaṃ aggahetvā aññathā vacanatthāca vinicchayāca ettha vuttā.
anya-e0301n:150_0: Nanu aṭṭhasāliniyameva teca aññeca atthā vuttāti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n:150_1: Bhūtaṃpana suvisadaṃ pāḷianugataṃ atthaṃ ñatvā kiṃvikkhepenāti.
anya-e0301n:151_1: Lokuttaranti ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko vuccati yathāvutto tebhūmakadhammo.
anya-e0301n:151_2: Yathāha lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā lokoti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n:151_3: Evaṃ sante lokuttaradhammānaṃpi nibbānavajjānaṃ lokatāpatti siyā. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n:151_5: Yattha hi nicco dhuvo sassatoti mahājanassa micchāgāho nivisati.
anya-e0301n:151_6: Tattheva tassa nivāraṇatthaṃ ayaṃ lokasamaññā niyamīyati.
anya-e0301n:151_7: Tasmā sabbaso micchāgāhavimuttānaṃ tesaṃ lokatāpatti natthīti vadanti.
anya-e0301n:151_15: Uttaraṇañcettha taṇhāttayaggāha vimuttiyā tīsu lokesu apariyāpannabhāvoyeva.
anya-e0301n:151_16: Soca apariyāpannabhāvo kesaṃ dhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhāna bhūtoviya gayhatīti visuṃ ekā catutthī avatthābhūmināmāti.
anya-e0301n:153_1: Evaṃ cittaṃ bhūmibhedena hīnapaṇītā nukkamato catudhā niddisitvā idāni tadeva catubbidhaṃ cittaṃ yathāniddiṭṭhakkamena
anya-e0301n:153_4: Tatthaca sabbahīnaṃ akusalacittaṃ tāva dassetuṃ somanassasaha gatantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:153_5: Etthaca kāmāvacaracittassapi akusalāhetuka sahetukānukkamo hīna paṇītānukkamavasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:155_0: Upari vuccamānānaṃ bahūnaṃ cittānaṃ sobhaṇasaññākaraṇasukhatthaṃ appake pāpāhetukeyeva pathamaṃ dassentoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:158_0: Tesu tesuca bhavesu gahitappaṭisandhikassa sattassa ādito vīthicittavasena lobhasahagata cittuppādāna meva sambhavato teyeva pathamanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:159_0: Ādito vīthicittavasena manodvārā vajjanasseva sabbapathamaṃ uppajjanatoti.
anya-e0301n:159_1: Akusalesu pana lobhamūla cittaṃ bahukañca hoti.
anya-e0301n:159_2: Dvīhi vaṭṭamūlehi yuttattā padhānaṃ pākaṭañca hotīti tadeva pathamaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:160_3: Na hi anavajjaṭṭhena sundaratā idha yuttāti.
anya-e0301n:160_8: Etthaca sumanassa bhāvoti tasmiṃ citte puggalevā sumanābhidhānassavā ayaṃ so sumanoti sumanabuddhiyāvā pavattinimittanti attho.
anya-e0301n:160_13: Yathā hi tattha attano dantanimittaṃ dantayutte nāge hananappavatti hoti,
anya-e0301n:160_14: evamidhapi taṃ vedanānimittaṃ vedanāyutte manasmiṃ puggalevā abhidhānabuddhiyo pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n:160_17: Somanassena saha ekato gataṃ pavattanti somanassasahagataṃ.
anya-e0301n:160_26: Diṭṭhigatena samaṃ pakārehi yuttanti diṭṭhigata sampayuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:160_27: Diṭṭhigatena ekuppādatādīhi pakārehi samaṃ ekībhūta miva yuttaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti attho.
anya-e0301n:160_31: Tattha āṇattiyāvā ajjhesanāyavā tajjetvā vā idaṃ karohīti parehi kato kāyavacīpayogo payogonāma.
anya-e0301n:160_32: Āṇattādināpana vināva kammassa karaṇatthaṃ taṃ taṃ upāyaṃ pare ācikkhanti.
anya-e0301n:160_36: sayameva vā taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ anussarati,
anya-e0301n:160_40: Saṅkharoti attano pakatiyā kātuṃ anicchamānaṃ citta santānaṃ akātuṃ adatvā karaṇatthāya saṃvidahati tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kamme payojetīti katvā.
anya-e0301n:160_41: Yopana paccayagaṇo tena saṅkhārena virahito hoti.
anya-e0301n:161_0: Saha saṅkhārenāti sasaṅkhāro. Tena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saupāyena paccayagaṇenāti atthoti.
anya-e0301n:162_0: Etthaca paccayagaṇoti ārammaṇādiko sādhāraṇo paccaya gaṇo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0301n:162_1: Asādhāraṇopana kusalakammesu sappurisupanissayādiko akusalakammesu asappurisupanissayādiko paccayagaṇo visesetvā yojetuṃ yutto.
anya-e0301n:162_2: Sopana yadā duvidhena saṅkhārena vinā sayameva cittaṃ asaṃsīdamānaṃ katvā uṭṭhāpeti samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0301n:162_4: Yadāpana tena vinā sayameva cittaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ nasakkoti,
anya-e0301n:162_7: Iti asaṅkhāro sasaṅkhārotica idaṃ paccaya gaṇasseva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n:162_9: Cittaṃpana asaṅkhārena suddhena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ.
anya-e0301n:162_12: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārenāti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0301n:162_13: Etthaca sasaṅkhārena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ hotīti yojetabbanti.
anya-e0301n:164_0: Imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā cittameva asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāranti ca gahetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n:166_1: Saṅkharīyativā taṃ etena yathāvuttanayena sajjīyatīti saṅkhāroti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:167_0: Evañhi sati sasaṅkhārikapi cittaṃ tikkhaṃnāma siyāti.
anya-e0301n:169_0: “So pana attano pubbabhāgappavatte cittasantāneceva parasantāneca pavattatīti taṃ nibbattito cittassa
anya-e0301n:169_1: tikkhabhāva saṅkhāto visesova idha saṅkhāroti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:169_2: Taṃpi asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārikapadānaṃ vacanatthesu virajjhitvā tadanu rūpassa saṅkhārassa parikappanāvasena vuttattā nayuttameva.
anya-e0301n:175_1: sasaṅkhārikaṃ asaṅkhārikanti ce taṃ kevalaṃsaṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:175_3: Bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa idhamatthitāya taṃ vasena nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ.
anya-e0301n:175_6: Taṃpi pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsiddhaṃ ujuṃ visadaṃ atthaṃ muñcitvā attano parikappanā vasena vuttattā na gahetabbameva.
anya-e0301n:176_0: Etthaca attano icchāya vinā paresaṃ āṇattiyāvā ajjhe sanāyavā yācanāyavā pavattitaṃ cittaṃ payogasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n:176_1: Tathā attano icchāya vinā paresaṃ bhayenavā lajjāyavā gāravenavā kathikāyavā daṇḍabhayenavā pavattitaṃ upāyasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n:176_2: Sayamevavā attano līnaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā tena tena upāyena attānaṃ ovaditvāvā taṃ taṃ upāyaṃ anussaritvāvā pavattitaṃ cittaṃ upāyasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n:176_5: Udāsinabhāvena pekkhati anubhavanākārena ārammaṇaṃ passatīti upekkhā.
anya-e0301n:176_7: Yathāhi somanassa domanassāni ārammaṇaṃ adhimattato passanti.
anya-e0301n:176_8: Yato somanassito puggalo tena ārammaṇena viyoge vikārapatto hoti.
anya-e0301n:176_9: Domanassitoca tena ārammaṇena saṃyoge vikārapatto hoti.
anya-e0301n:176_11: ayaṃ pana yuttitova passati na ārammaṇasaṃyoga viyogahetu puggalaṃ vikāraṃ pāpetīti.
anya-e0301n:176_12: Kecipana upapattito yuttito ikkhatīti idaṃ idha nasambhavati.
anya-e0301n:176_13: Na hi akusalaṃ yuttarūpaṃ nāma hotīti vadanti.
anya-e0301n:177_1: Etthaca kiñcāpi phassādayo vitakkādayo mohādayoca dhammā iminā sakalena aṭṭhavidhena cittena saha gatā sampayuttāca honti,
anya-e0301n:177_2: na pana te vedanāviya sayaṃpi bhedavantā honti.
anya-e0301n:177_3: Naca diṭṭhisaṅkhārānaṃ viyatesaṃ imasmiṃ citte katthaci honti katthacinahontīti ayaṃ vikappo atthi.
anya-e0301n:177_4: Tasmāte imassacittassa bhedakarā nahontīti idha nagahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:177_5: Lobhopana aññehi imassa aṭṭhavidhassa bhedakaro hoti.
anya-e0301n:177_6: Vedanādiṭṭhi saṅkhārāca imassa aññamaññassa bhedakarā hontīti teeva idha gahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:177_7: Nanu pīti māna thinamiddhānipi bhedakarāni hontīti tānipi idha sapītikaṃ apītikanti mānasampayuttaṃ mānavippayuttanti
anya-e0301n:177_8: thinamiddhasampayuttaṃ thinamiddhavippayuttanti ca gahetabbā nīti. Na.
anya-e0301n:177_9: Tesu hi somanasse gahite pīti gahitāva hoti.
anya-e0301n:179_0: Phassādivitakkādimohādidhammā ito aññehipi citte hi yuttā hontīti nate aññehi imassa visesaṃ karonti.
anya-e0301n:179_1: Tasmā te idha na gahitāti iminā adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “kasmā panettha aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu
anya-e0301n:179_4: Phassādayohi keci sabbacitta sādhāraṇā keci kusalādi sādhāraṇā.
anya-e0301n:179_5: Mohādayoca sabbā kusalasādhāraṇāti na tehi sakkā cittaṃ visesetu”nti.
anya-e0301n:180_0: Evañhi sati somanassupekkhā saṅkhārāpi aññesu dissantīti tepi aññehi imassa visesaṃ nakaronti.
anya-e0301n:181_5: Somanassappaṭisandhikohi sadā bhavaṅgasomanassena paribhāvita santāno hotīti tassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ yebhuyyena somanassasahagataṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:181_8: Tasmā tassapi cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ yebhuyyena somanassasahagataṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:181_9: Iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti attanā icchitena hīnenavā paṇītenavā ārammaṇena samāyogo.
anya-e0301n:181_16: Tādiso hi puggalo mahantaṃpi appakaṃ maññati,
anya-e0301n:181_23: Tattha diṭṭhajjhāsayatāti kāṇāriṭṭhassaviya sunakkhattassaviyaca purimabhave diṭṭhi gatikabhāvena āgatattā imasmiṃ bhavepi sassatucchedāsaya bhāvo.
anya-e0301n:181_24: Saddhammavimukhatāti ciraṃpi kālaṃ saddhammena vinā āgatatā.
anya-e0301n:181_25: Micchāvitakkabahulatāti attano avisayesu sabbaññuvisayesu ṭhānesu attano pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā cintāpasutavasena micchāvitakkabahulabhāvo.
anya-e0301n:181_26: Ayoniso ummujjananti attanādiṭṭhakāraṇameva sārato saccato ummujjanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:181_38: Imesaṃpana cittānaṃ uppatti vidhānaṃ visuddhimagge gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:181_39: Aṭṭhapīti pisaddena nesaṃ labbhamānakammapathabhedato kāla santānā rammaṇādi bhedatoca anekavidhattaṃ sampiṇḍetīti.
anya-e0301n:183_7: Sā hi attanā sahagate cittevā taṃ samaṅgīpuggalevā dummanā bhidhānassavā ayaṃ so dummanoti dummanabuddhiyāvā pavattinimittaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:184_2: Saṅkhāro tāva imassa cittassa bheda karoti tassa idha gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:184_3: Vedanā paṭighāpana bhedakarā na hontīti te idha na gahetabbāti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n:184_4: domanassaggahaṇaṃ tāva imassa cittassa kadāci aññavedanāyogatā pasaṅganivattanatthanti.
anya-e0301n:184_6: Yadāca janā attano verīnaṃ maraṇe tuṭṭhiṃ pavedenti.
anya-e0301n:184_9: Tadā idaṃ nukho somanassena yuttanti attheva pasaṅgo.
anya-e0301n:184_13: Tathāhi ye natthikāhetukā kiriyamicchā diṭṭhikā pāṇavadhe apuññaṃnāma natthīti gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n:184_16: Yeca pāṇavadhaṃ katvā yaññaṃ yajantānaṃ mahantaṃ puññaṃ hoti,
anya-e0301n:184_18: Te sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vissaṭṭhā pāṇavadhaṃ sayaṃvā karonti.
anya-e0301n:184_20: Tadā idaṃ diṭṭhiyāpi sampayuttaṃ siyāti pasaṅgo hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n:184_22: te kadāci tesaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā pāṇaṃ vadhantā ādito vematikajātāva honti.
anya-e0301n:184_23: Tadātesaṃ idaṃ vicikicchāyapi yuttaṃ siyāti pasaṅgo hoti.
anya-e0301n:184_25: Itarathā purima cittassa lobhasahagatabhāvoviya imassa paṭighasampayuttabhāvo cūḷanigameneva siddhoti tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ niratthakaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n:184_26: Etthaca issāmacchariyakukkuccānaṃ thinamiddhassaca aggahaṇaṃ purimacitte mānathinamiddhanayena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:187_0: [29] Satipi imassa somanassupekkhāsahagatabhāve anaññasādhāraṇeneva domanassena imassa upalakkhaṇatthanti atthassa āpajjanato.
anya-e0301n:187_1: Yathātaṃ satipi purimassa imassaca cittassa mohasahagatabhāve anaññasādhāraṇeneva lobhena paṭighenaca
anya-e0301n:188_0: Evañhi sati pākaṭena domanassena apākaṭānaṃ aññavedanā naṃpi idha laddhabhāvaṃ upalakkhetīti āpajjati.
anya-e0301n:190_0: “Paṭighasampayuttabhāvopana ubhinnaṃ ekanta sahacāritā dassanatthaṃ vutto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:192_6: Tattha dosa bahula bhāvato āgatavasena dosajjhāsayatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:192_8: Appassutassaca aniṭṭha loka dhammehiphuṭṭhassa taṃkutetthalabbhāti paccavekkhanā natthīti.
anya-e0301n:194_2: Yasmāpana idaṃ cittaṃ mūlantaravirahena laddhokāsena suṭṭhubalavantena mohenaceva saṃsappamānavikkhipamānehi vicikicchuddhaccehi ca yuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:194_3: Tasmā idha vedanāpi ārammaṇaṃ adhimattato anubhavituṃ na sakkotīti upekkhāvedanāva yuttā hoti.
anya-e0301n:194_4: Evaṃ santepi idaṃ cittaṃ somanassa domanassa sahagatānaṃpi anantare uppajjati.
anya-e0301n:194_5: Tasmā tadubhayavedanāhipi idaṃ yuttaṃ siyāti pasaṅgo hotīti tappasaṅganivattanatthaṃ idha upekkhāgahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0301n:194_7: Uddhaccaṃ pana sabbākusalesu yuttaṃpi idha laddhokāsaṃ hutvā suṭṭhu balavaṃ hotīti dassanatthaṃ idheva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:194_8: Tenevahi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ dhammuddesavāre uddhaccaṃ aññesu pāpacittesu sarūpato anuddharitvā yevāpanakabhāveneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:194_10: Yasmāca idaṃcittadvayaṃ sattānaṃ pakatisabhāvabhūtanti payogena vā upāyena vā kenaci uppādetabbaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n:194_11: Sabbakālampi bhavaṅgacittaṃviya anosakkamānaṃ asaṃsīdamānaṃ akicchena akasirena pavattati.
anya-e0301n:194_12: Tasmā ekantena asaṅkhārikameva hotīti katvā idha saṅkhārabhedo na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:194_13: Tenevaca pāḷiyaṃpi purimacittesuviya idha sasaṅkhārenāti dutīyacittavāro navuttoti.
anya-e0301n:196_0: Imāni dve cittāni atisammuḷhatāya aticañcalatāya ca sabbatthapi rajjanadussanarahitāni honti.
anya-e0301n:197_0: Rajjana sahitānaṃpi lobhamūla cittānaṃ upekkhā yogassa diṭṭhattāti.
anya-e0301n:199_0: “Tatoyevaca sabhāvatikkhatāya ussāhetabbatāyaca abhāvato saṅkhārabhedopi nesaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:199_1: Tattha sabhāvatikkhatāya abhāvatoti iminā imassa asaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0301n:199_3: Tadubhaye pana idaṃ cittadvayaṃ sabbaso saṅkhāravimuttaṃ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0301n:200_2: Evaṃ sati idha mohopi saṅkhāramutto siyā.
anya-e0301n:200_3: Soca avijjāyevāti tividhabhāvova avijjāya tattha vattabbo.
anya-e0301n:201_0: [33] Yasmāca idha tikkhabhāvonāma vinā saṅkhārena kevalaṃ pakati paccaya gaṇa vaseneva pavattanasamatthatā vuccati.
anya-e0301n:201_2: Tasmā idaṃ sabhāvatikkhaṃ na hotīti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n:202_0: Laddhokāsena mohena suṭṭhu muyhantīti mohamūhānīti vattabbe niruttanayena momūhānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:203_4: Pacchimovā evaṃ saddo purimassa itisaddassa atthavacano.
anya-e0301n:203_6: Sabbathāpi iminā somanassasahagatantiādinā vuttappakāre nāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:203_11: Tesu tesu suttantesu vuttena pakārenāpi dvādaseva.
anya-e0301n:205_0: Heṭṭhā vutto sampayogādi ākārova vibhāvito. Sopana iccevanti imināva siddhoti.
anya-e0301n:206_0: Akusalacittānīti kusalapaṭiviruddhasabhāvattā evaṃ laddhanā māni cittāni.
anya-e0301n:206_4: na hi ārammaṇa vijānanaṃvā ekantena muyhanādiviya sāvajjaṃvā hoti.
anya-e0301n:206_8: Saddhādīnaṃpana mohādīnañca paṭiviruddhabhāvo yathākkamaṃ pahāyakapahātabbabhāvena veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:206_10: Suvaṇṇappaṭirūpakāviya pheggubhūtā abhāvanārahā punappunaṃ āsevīyamānāpi cañcalantiyeva vikkirantiyeva.
anya-e0301n:206_11: Niyāmaṃ okkamantāpi ekasmiṃbhave eva apāyabhāgitāya okkamanti.
anya-e0301n:206_12: Napana kusalamūlāni sabbaso pacchinditvā satte vaṭṭasotaniyate kātuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n:206_14: Jātisuvaṇṇāviya sārabhūtā bhāvanārahā punappunaṃ āsevīyamānā thiratarapattā lokiyesu yāva iddhividhānā
anya-e0301n:206_16: Niyāmaṃ okkamantā apāyasotaṃvā vaṭṭaso taṃvā sabbaso samucchinditvā anupādisesanibbānabhāgitāya okkamanti.
anya-e0301n:206_19: Apica kusaladhammānāma antamaso ālopabhikkhā dānamattāpi lokebhesajjavidhānāniviyaakusalappahānāya eva paṇḍitehipaññapīyanti karīyanti ca,
anya-e0301n:206_21: Akusaladhammāpana loke nānārogajātiyoviya sakalalokassa pakatisabhāvabhūtāeva hontīti te pahātabbāevāti.
anya-e0301n:206_26: Dvādasā kusalā siyunti ettha siyunti nipātapadaṃ idha daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:210_1: Evaṃ sabbanihīnaṃ akusalaṃ saṅgahetvā idāni ahetukaṃ saṅgaṇhanto tatthaca sabbanihīnaṃ akusalavipākaṃ tāva dassetuṃ upekkhāsahagatantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:212_0: Taṃ akusala vipākattāyeva akusalānantaraṃ pathamaṃ dassitanti adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “tesaṃ akusalavipākā
anya-e0301n:213_0: Evañhi sati kusalavipākānipi kusalā nantareeva vattabbāni siyunti.
anya-e0301n:214_3: vijānāti vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmāviññāṇanti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n:214_8: Cakkhussavā indriyabhāvena sāmi bhūtassa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:215_0: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave kaṭṭhañca paṭicca aggi jalati.
anya-e0301n:215_12: Evamevakho bhikkhave cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpeca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:215_14: Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:216_2: Sampayuttadhamme taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃvā bādhati hiṃsatīti attho.
anya-e0301n:216_11: Tenevahi bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti ettha sampaṭicchiṃ sūti vaṇṇayiṃsu.
anya-e0301n:217_17: Etthaca āloka ākāsādīnaṃ sannissayānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tehi vinā rūpādīnaṃ pasādesu āpātāgamanasseva abhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0301n:217_18: na hi āloke sati rūpāni sannihitānipi cakkhumhi āpātamāgacchanti.
anya-e0301n:218_0: Cakkhusmiṃpana asambhinnepi bahiddhārūpārammaṇe āpātaṃ anā gacchante cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati.
anya-e0301n:218_1: Tasmiṃ pana āpātaṃ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati nuppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:219_1: Napana āpākāgamanaṃnāma āloke asatipi sambhavatīti dassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:219_2: Itarathā rattandhakārepi rūpāni cakkhumhi āpātaṃ āgacchantīti āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:220_4: Yathā loke ambaphalādīnaṃ taruṇabhāvaṃ atikkamma pariṇatabhāvappattivipaccananti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:220_11: Tattha pubbe taṃ taṃ kammāyūhanakāleyā kusalākusalacetanāya khaṇattayasamaṅgitā.
anya-e0301n:220_13: Sāpana cetanā nirujjhamānā sabbaso abhāvaṃ patvā nanirujjhati.
anya-e0301n:220_14: Āyatiṃpana vipākapātubhāvāya attano sabbākāraparipūraṃ kriyāvisesaṃ tasmiṃ cittasantāne nidahitvāva nirujjhati.
anya-e0301n:221_0: Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajjukhīraṃva muccati;
anya-e0301n:222_0: Dahantaṃ bālamanveti, bhasmā channova pāvakoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:223_0: Sopana visuṃ eko paramatthadhammotipi saṅkhyaṃ nagacchati,
anya-e0301n:223_3: Sopana yadā attano anurūpe paccaye labhati.
anya-e0301n:223_9: Soca satto taṃ amuñcamāno yadi gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n:223_12: Taṃ amuñcitvā cutassapana cutianantarameva so kammasaṅkhāto kriyā viseso visuṃ eko sasampayutto paramatthadhammarāsi
anya-e0301n:223_14: ekaṃ bhavaṃ pūrayamānotica yāva tāyukaṃ bhavaṅgakiccaṃ chasu dvāresu taṃ taṃ dvārikavipākakiccāni pariyosāne cutikiccañca sādhayamānoti attho.
anya-e0301n:223_15: Tattha purimā tisso samaṅgītā taruṇā vatthānāma honti.
anya-e0301n:223_17: Iti vipaccantīti vipākāni mudutaruṇāvatthaṃ atikkamitvā pariṇakāvatthasaṅkhātaṃ vipakkabhāvaṃ āpajjantīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:223_18: Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ kusalākusalakammasamuṭṭhānānaṃpi kaṭattārūpānaṃ vipākapade aggahaṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:223_19: Tānihi kammasantānato visuṃ siddhattā visuṃ kammato jātāniyeva nāma honti,
anya-e0301n:224_0: Yepana arūpabhāvena sārammaṇabhāvenaca kammena sadisa tāmattaṃ gahetvā arūpadhammānameva vipākattaṃ sādhenti.
anya-e0301n:224_1: Tesaṃ vipākasaddo arūpadhammesu ruḷhīvasena pavattoti āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:224_2: Yañca tattha sālibījanibbattesu nāḷapattapupphaphalesu bījasadisānaṃ phalānameva sāliphalasālipakkanāmaṃ siddhaṃ viyāti upamaṃ dassenti,
anya-e0301n:224_4: Na hi phalānipi taruṇakāle pākanāmaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n:225_4: Kusalassa vipākāni sampayutta hetuvirahato ahetukānicāti kusalavipākā hetuka cittāni.
anya-e0301n:227_0: Pubbakammasahajātena nibbattakahetunāpi idha vipākassa sahetukatāpasaṅgokato. So na sundaro.
anya-e0301n:228_0: Na hi abhidhamme katthaci pubbakammasahajātena nibbattakahetunā vipākassa sahetukāhetukatā sambhavonāma atthi.
anya-e0301n:228_1: Asatica sambhave byabhicārassapi abhāvato so pasaṅgo niratthakovāti.
anya-e0301n:228_3: Etthaca akusalavipākānaṃ sayaṃ abyākatadhammattā lobhādīhi akusalahetūhica sayaṃ akusalavipākattā alobhādīhi
anya-e0301n:228_5: Asati ca taṃ sambhave tesaṃ ahetukabhāvo abyabhicāroyeva hotīti tattha ahetukaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
anya-e0301n:228_6: Kusalavipākānaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalavipākattāyeva alobhādīhi kusalā byākatayogīhi anavajjahetūhi sahetukatā sambhavo atthiyeva.
anya-e0301n:228_7: Satica tasmiṃ sambhave tesaṃ ahetukabhāvo byabhicārasahito hotīti tattheva ahetukaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:229_2: tañhi pañcadvāre ghaṭṭitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjanaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:229_4: Tañhi tasmiṃ āpātaṃ āgacchantaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjantaṃ pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n:231_0: Tāva “manodvāranti ettha āvajjanassa anantara paccayabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ manoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:231_1: Tadeva dvāraṃ āvajjanajavanādi thicitta pavattiyā mukhattā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:234_0: Yadihi yassa bhavaṅgassa anantaraṃ vīthicittāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:234_1: Tadeva ekantena tesaṃ pavattimukhattā manodvāraṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n:234_3: Evañcasati yesu cakkhādīsu rūpā dīnaṃ ghaṭṭitattā āvajjanādīni vīthicittāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:234_4: Tāneva ekantena tesaṃ pavattimukhattā dvārānināma honti.
anya-e0301n:234_15: Khīṇāsavānaṃ anoḷārikesu ārammaṇesu yena cittena sitaṃ pātukaronti,
anya-e0301n:234_17: Na hi khīṇāsavā lokiya mahā janāviya rajjanīyādi bhāvena oḷārikesu hasaniya vatthūsu hasantīti.
anya-e0301n:234_18: Ṭīkāsu pana cittaṃ apekkhitvā hasituppādanti niddiṭṭhaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n:234_19: Vuttanayena ahetukānica tāni vipaccana vipākuppādana kiccarahitattā taṃ taṃ kriyāmattabhūtāni cittānicāti ahetukakriyacittāni.
anya-e0301n:234_20: Etthaca vīthimuttacittāni kiccadubbalattā pañcaviññāṇāni vatthudubbalattā sampaṭicchanādīnica kiccaṭṭhānadubbalattā
anya-e0301n:234_21: attano ussāhena vinā kevalaṃ vipaccanamattena pavattantīti tāni sabbāni vipākānieva honti.
anya-e0301n:234_25: Yāni pana cittāni vipaccanamattaṃ atikkamma attano ussāheneva pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:234_26: Tesu āvajjanadvayaṃ vipākasantānato laddhapaccayattā thokaṃ dubbalabhāvato itarānica nirānusayasantāne
anya-e0301n:234_27: pavattattā sabbaso vipākuppādanatthaṃ ussāharahitānieva hontīti tāni sabbāni kriyānināma jātānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:235_2: Tathāhi cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva vatthūnica ārammaṇānica upādārūpāneva honti,
anya-e0301n:235_3: upādārūpānañca vicupiṇḍakānaṃviya aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ dubbalamevāti tāni iṭṭhe aniṭṭheca ārammaṇe upekkhā sahagatāneva hontīti.
anya-e0301n:235_4: Kāyaviññāṇassapana ārammaṇāni mahābhūtāni hontīti yathā adhikaraṇimatthake thapitaṃ picupiṇḍakaṃ ayokūṭena
anya-e0301n:235_5: paharantānaṃ ayokūṭassa picupiṇḍakaṃ atikkamma akhikaraṇighaṭṭanaṃ balavataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:235_6: Tathā tesaṃ ārammabhūtānaṃ kāyavatthuṃ atikkamma kāyanissaya bhūtesu saṅghaṭṭanaṃ balavataraṃ.
anya-e0301n:235_7: Tasmā kāyaviññāṇaṃ iṭṭhe sukhasahagataṃ aniṭṭhe dukhasahagataṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:235_8: Sampaṭicchanacittaṃpana sabbadubbalānaṃ pañcaviññāṇānaṃ anantaraṃ uppajjatīti niccaṃ dubbalaṃ hutvā sabbattha upekkhāsahagatamevāti.
anya-e0301n:235_9: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana asamānanissaye hi tehi laddhapaccayatāvasena ayamattho vibhāvito,
anya-e0301n:235_11: Tādisenaca balavavatthunissayena purimacittena laddhapaccayaṃ hotīti thokaṃ balavaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:235_12: Tasmā taṃ kusalavipākaṃ iṭṭhe upekkhāsahagataṃ abhiiṭṭhe somanassasahagataṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:235_15: Yadihi taṃ atianiṭṭhārammaṇavasena vedanā bhedayuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n:235_17: Tattha dukkhena tāva na yujjati, kasmā,
anya-e0301n:235_20: paṭighena paṭihaññattāeva domanassabhāvaṃ pattā domanassavedanā paṭighena vinā nappavattatīti.
anya-e0301n:235_21: Ekantākusalabhūtena paṭighena niccayogino domanassassa abyākatesu asambhavatoti.
anya-e0301n:235_26: Evaṃ santepi taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ kammānubhāvatoca muccitvā vipākasantānatoca paccayaṃ gahetvā uṭṭhitattā
anya-e0301n:237_0: Pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ pubbe kenaci aggahite ārammaṇe ekavā rameva pavattattā manodvārāvajjanañca visadisacittasantānaparāvattanavasena
anya-e0301n:237_1: byāpārantarasāpekkhattā ārammaṇarasaṃ adhimattato anubhavituṃ nasakkotīti sabbatthapi majjhatta vedanāyuttamevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:238_0: Na hi cittānaṃ balavadubbalatāvisesoattanopacchā pavattassa cittassa vasena sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n:238_3: Taṃpi hi visadisacittasantānaṃ attanāparaṃ vatteti yevāti.
anya-e0301n:239_1: Imāni cittāni attano pakati paccayagaṇasamāyoge sati nuppajjantīti natthi.
anya-e0301n:240_0: Ahetukavipākānaṃ aparibyattakiccattā sasaṅkhārika kamma viruddho asaṅkhārikabhāvopi natthi.
anya-e0301n:240_2: Tasmā tesaṃ ubhayakammenapi uppatti therena anuññātāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:241_0: Etena tiṇṇaṃ kriyacittānaṃpi tadubhayabhāvābhāvo vutto hoti.
anya-e0301n:241_2: Rūpadassa na saddassavanādīni sattā kadāci attano icchāya karonti.
anya-e0301n:241_3: Kadāci parehi ussāhitā karontīti paccakkhatova siddhametaṃ.
anya-e0301n:241_5: Tadā pañcadvārāvajjanādīni sabbāni vīthicittāni asaṅkhārikānināma honti.
anya-e0301n:241_8: Dvāra vimuttesupana dvīsu upekkhāsantīraṇesu aṭṭhamahāvipākesuviya vattabbo.
anya-e0301n:241_9: Iti sabbāni ahetukacittāni tena pariyāyena saṅkhārabhedena paccekaṃ bhinnānieva honti.
anya-e0301n:241_10: Evaṃ santepi apari byattakiccattāyeva tesaṃ saṅkhārabhedo pāḷiyaṃ navuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:242_2: Tasmā te dubbalakammanibbattesu dubbalavatthukiccaṭṭhānesuca imesu cittesu nuppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:242_3: Tattha sabbaṃ pāpakammaṃ vikkhepayuttaṃ sayaṃpi cañcalati dubbalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:242_4: Tasmā taṃ kappaṭṭhitikaṃpi samānaṃ kālantare hetuyuttaṃ vipākaṃ janetuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n:242_5: Tihetukakammaṃpi samānaṃ dubbalesu cakkhādivatthūsuca dassanādīsu kiccaṭṭhānesuca hetuyuttaṃ vipākaṃ janetuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n:242_7: Tasmā imāni sabbāni sampayuttaheturahitāni jātānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:243_0: 39. Sabbathāpīti padassa attho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:245_0: Sabbathāpīti akusalavipāka kusalavipāka kriyabhede nāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:246_3: kriyacittāni kiccadvārabhedena tīṇīti ahetukacittāni aṭṭhārasa hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:248_1: Idāni heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ cittānaṃ asobhaṇanāmaṃ upari vuccamānānañca sobhaṇanāmaṃ thapento gāthamāha.
anya-e0301n:248_2: Upari vuccamānānañhi sobhaṇatte vutte heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ asobhaṇatā avuttāpi siddhā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:248_3: Tattha pāpāhetukamuttānīti pāpehi ahetukehica muttāni ekūnasaṭṭhicittāni. Athavā.
anya-e0301n:248_6: Akusalānihi attasamaṅgino satte anicchanteyeva apāyaṃ pāpenti.
anya-e0301n:248_8: Etena puññānaṃpi sugatipāpanaṭṭhena pāpatā pasaṅgo nivattito hoti.
anya-e0301n:248_9: Na hi icchantānaṃ pāpane pāpanabyāpāro pākaṭo hotīti.
anya-e0301n:248_11: Sobhaṇehi saddhādiguṇadhammehi yuttiyā tatoyeva ca sayaṃpi sobhaggapattiyā sobhaṇānīti.
anya-e0301n:249_1: Idāni tāni sobhaṇāni hīna paṇītā nukkamena dassento somanassasahagatantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:249_8: Sohi yadā duvidhena saṅkhārena vinā kevalaṃ attano balena kusalacittaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n:249_10: Soyeva yadā attano balena kusalacittaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n:249_14: Sasaṅkhārena uppannaṃ sasaṅkhārikanti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0301n:249_16: Apica saddhāsampatti dassanasampatti deyyadhamma paṭiggāhaka sampattīti evamādi somanassakāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0301n:249_31: Yānica vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa passaddhisambojjhaṅgassaca kāraṇāni aṭṭhakathāsu vuttāni.
anya-e0301n:250_2: Tena imesaṃ idha vuttappakārato aññehi pakārehi anekavidhataṃ sampiṇḍeti.
anya-e0301n:250_4: Imāni aṭṭhacittāni dasahi puññakriyāvatthūhi guṇitāni asīti honti.
anya-e0301n:250_5: Puna tāni chahi ārammaṇehi guṇitāni cattārisatāniceva asīti ca honti.
anya-e0301n:250_6: Puna tāni tīhi kammehi guṇitāni sahassaṃ cattāri satāni cattālīsaṃca honti.
anya-e0301n:250_7: Puna tāni tīhi hīnamajjhimapaṇītehi guṇitāni cattāri sahassāni tīṇi satāni vīsatica honti.
anya-e0301n:250_8: Tāni imāni suddhikānīti katvā dvīsu ṭhānesu thapetabbāni.
anya-e0301n:250_9: Tato ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā dvidhā karontassa ñāṇasampayuttāni dvesahassāni sataṃ saṭṭhica honti.
anya-e0301n:250_11: Puna tattha ñāṇasampayuttāni catūhi adhipatīhi guṇitāni aṭṭhasahassāni chasatāni cattālīsaṃca honti.
anya-e0301n:250_12: Ñāṇavippayuttānipana vīmaṃsāvajjitehi tīhi adhipatīhi guṇitāni chasahassāni cattārisatāni asītica honti.
anya-e0301n:250_13: Puna tadubhayāni sampiṇḍitāni dasasahassaṃ pañcasahassāni sataṃ vīsatica honti.
anya-e0301n:250_14: Puna tāni pubbe visuṃ thapitehi suddhikehi sampiṇḍitāni dasasahassaṃ navasahassāni cattāri satāni cattālīsañca hontīti.
anya-e0301n:250_15: Yaṃpana ṭīkāyaṃ idha vuttanayena suddhikānica ñāṇavippayuttāni ca visuṃ akatvā sabbāni puññakriyādīhi
anya-e0301n:250_16: samaṃ guṇitāni sattarasa sahassāni dve satāni asītica hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:252_0: Suddhikāni visuṃ akatvā ñāṇavippayuttānieva visuṃ katvā tathā guṇitāni vīsa satādhika pannarasa sahassāni hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:253_0: Evañhi sati imāni kāmāvacarakusalāni niccaṃ sādhipatikāni hutvā niyatādhipatikānināma bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0301n:253_1: Naca imāni upari mahaggata kusalāni viya lokuttarāni viya ca niyatā dhipatikāni hontīti.
anya-e0301n:253_3: Yathāvā kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalātiettha ñāṇavippayuttānipi kosallena nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ pavattena
anya-e0301n:253_4: upanissayañāṇena sambhūtattā kusalāni eva nāma honti.
anya-e0301n:253_5: Evamidhapi tāni teneva vīmaṃsādhipatibhūtena sambhūtattā vīmaṃsādhipateyyānipi nāma hontīti na nasakkā
anya-e0301n:253_6: vattunti iminā adhippāyena tāni visuṃ akatāni siyunti.
anya-e0301n:253_7: Evaṃsantepi kāmakusalānināma adhipativimuttāni eva bahutarāni honti.
anya-e0301n:253_8: Tasmā nasakkā sabbāni kāmakusalāni vīmaṃsādhipatimūlikāni bhavitunti.
anya-e0301n:254_13: Imānipana tehi vuṭṭhitattā kusalānināma arogāni nāmāti attho.
anya-e0301n:254_14: Tappaṭipakkhattāca sundarāni chekāni anavajjāni sukhavipākāni ca nāma hontīti.
anya-e0301n:254_15: Kucchite pāpadhamme salayanti cālenti kampenti viddhaṃsentīti kusalāni.
anya-e0301n:254_16: Kucchitenavā ākārena sattasantāne senti anusentīti kusā. Rāgādayo.
anya-e0301n:254_18: Kusaṃvā vuccati ñāṇaṃ kucchitānaṃ sānaṭṭhena tanukaraṇaṭṭhena antakaraṇaṭṭhenavā.
anya-e0301n:254_20: Kusāviya hatthappadesaṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunantītivā kusalāni. Apica,
anya-e0301n:255_3: Tānihi atiiṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe yathākkamaṃ somanassena upekkhāya ca yuttānīti.
anya-e0301n:255_7: Kadācipana tadārammaṇavasena pavattikāle yebhuyyena tihetukajavanānubandhāni ñāṇasampayuttāni honti.
anya-e0301n:255_13: Tānihi paṭisandhiyaṃ purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle ñātakādīhi tena tena payogena upaṭṭhāpitāni kammādīni
anya-e0301n:255_15: Tādisena payogena vinā sayameva kammabalena upaṭṭhitāni gahetvā pavattāni asaṅkhārikānināma honti.
anya-e0301n:255_19: Tena ārammaṇachakka hīnattikavaseneva kāladesa santānādivasenaca tesaṃ anekabhedattaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
anya-e0301n:255_20: Yasmā panetāni dānādivasena kāyakammādivasena chandādīni dhuraṃ katvā ca na pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:255_21: Tasmā tāni puññakriyāvatthūnaṃ kammādhipatīnañca vasena vaḍḍhanaṃ nalabhantīti.
anya-e0301n:257_0: Imāni viññattisamuṭṭhāpanābhāvato kammadvāra vasena na pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:258_3: Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yohi kāmāvacarakusalesu kammadvāra kammapatha puññakriyāvatthubhedo vutto.
anya-e0301n:258_5: Aviññattijanakato avipāka dhammato tathā appavattiyācāti vuttanti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n:258_6: Tattha pana aviññattijanakato kammadvāra bhedo idha natthīti etena kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammanti evaṃ bhedassa abhāvaṃ vadati.
anya-e0301n:258_7: Avipākadhammato kammapathabhedo idha natthīti etena dasavidhassa kammapathabhedassa abhāvaṃ vadati.
anya-e0301n:258_8: Idhapana kusalesupi kammapathabhedaṃ aggahetvā tividhakammadvāra bhedabhinnaṃ kammattikameva gahitaṃ.
anya-e0301n:258_9: Tañca viññatti samuṭṭhāpanā bhāvato tividhakammadvāravasena napavattantīti imināva siddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n:258_10: Yadica heṭṭhā kusalesupi dasavidhakammapathabhedavasena visuṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n:258_11: Evaṃsati idhapi avipākasabhāvato kammapathavasena napavattantīti idaṃ vattabbamevāti.
anya-e0301n:259_1: Mahākriyacittesupi mahāvipākesuviya ārammaṇa vaseneva vedenābhedo upari sayameva vakkhati.
anya-e0301n:261_0: Tathā avicāretvā kriyacittānaṃpi kusale vuttanayena yathārahaṃ somanassa sahagatāditā veditabbāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:262_0: Iccevaṃ sabbathāpīti padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0301n:262_1: Sahetuka kāmāvacara kusala vipāka kriya cittānīti ettha sahetu kaggahaṇaṃ kusala sadda sambandhe bhūtakathana visesanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:264_0: Sakkharakathalikaṃpi macchagumbaṃpi tiṭṭhantaṃpi carantaṃpi passatīti suttapade viya idha yathālābha yojanāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:265_1: Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ vedanā ñāṇa saṅkhāra bhedenāti vedanābhedena,
anya-e0301n:265_6: Saṅkhārabhedenāti saṅkhārena vinā sahaca pavattapaccayagaṇabhedasiddhena cittabhedenāti attho.
anya-e0301n:265_8: yadidaṃ suviññātānaṃ nānāppakārānaṃ padatthānaṃ appakena byañjanena dīpanasamatthatāti.
anya-e0301n:267_0: Sayaṃ abhinnānaṃ ñāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ bhedavacane cittassa bhedakara bhāve ca codanāya anokāsatā sādhitā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:268_1: Sahetu kāmāvacara puññapākakriyā vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedena yathākkamaṃ chaca dvādasaca catuvīsati ca matāti. Etthaca –
anya-e0301n:272_2: Tattha kāme kāmabhūmiyaṃ pākāni sahetukāhetukavasena sabbāni vipākacittāni tevīsa.
anya-e0301n:272_4: Kriyāca sahetukāhetukavasena sabbāni kriyacittāni pana ekādasa honti.
anya-e0301n:272_8: Vibhaṅge vibhattena sabbappakārenapi catuppaññāsa evātiādinā tassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyevāti.
anya-e0301n:274_0: Idha vuttānaṃ kusalādīnaṃ antogadhabhedavasena tassa atthavibhāvanā paṭisiddhā hoti.
anya-e0301n:277_0: Bhavasaddo hi kusalākusalakammesu kammanibbattesuca vipāka kaṭattārūpesu vattamāno abhidhamme diṭṭho.
anya-e0301n:277_3: Bhūmītica sahokāso indriyā nindriyabaddhadhammasamūho vuccatīti kāme kāmabhūmiyanti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:277_4: Bhavotivā bhūmieva vuccati suttantapariyāyena bhavanti ettha sattā saṅkhārācāti katvā.
anya-e0301n:281_1: Evaṃ kāmacittasaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni yathānuppattaṃ rūpacittasaṅgahaṃ dassento vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:281_2: Vitakkoca vicāroca pītica sukhañca ekaggatācāti dvando.
anya-e0301n:281_8: Kasiṇādikassa ārammaṇassa aniccādilakkhaṇassaca upanijjhāyanato paccanīkadhammānañca jhāpanato dayhanato jhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:281_9: Imesu dvīsu atthesu ekaggatāeva sāti sayayuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:281_10: Sāhi ekattārammaṇasaṅkhāto eko aggokoṭikoṭṭhāsovā assāti atthena ekaggasaṅkhātassa cittassa tathāpavattane ādhipaccaguṇayogena ekaggatāti ca vuccati.
anya-e0301n:281_11: Sāyeva cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu vikkhipituṃ adatvā ekasmiṃ yevārammaṇe paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena sammāca ādhiyati thapeti.
anya-e0301n:281_12: Indriyānañca samabhāvaṃ katvā tattheva līnuddhaccābhāvāpādanena samañca ādhiyati thapetīti atthena samādhītica vuccati.
anya-e0301n:281_13: Sāyevaca pāḷiyaṃ avikkhepo avisāhāro saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti niddiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n:281_14: Vitakkādayopi pana tassā sātisayaṃ upakārakattā jhānanteva vuttā.
anya-e0301n:281_15: Tathā hi vitakko tāva cittaṃ thinamiddhavasena osakkituṃ adatvā daḷhaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhameva karoti.
anya-e0301n:281_18: Vicāroca naṃ vicikicchāvasena saṃsappituṃ adatvā daḷhaṃ ārammaṇānubandhameva karoti.
anya-e0301n:281_21: Pītica cittaṃ byāpādavasena ukkaṇṭhituṃ adatvā ārammaṇe parituṭṭhameva karoti.
anya-e0301n:281_24: Tathā sukhañca naṃ uddhacca kukkuccavasena avūpasamituṃ adatvā ārammaṇe laddhasātaṃ upabrūhitaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n:282_1: Evaṃ karontāca te dhammā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tassa cittassa suṭṭhu ekaggabhāvatthāyaca honti.
anya-e0301n:282_3: Sāca ekaggatā tehi dhammehi tathā anuggahitā suṭṭhu balavatī hutvā sayaṃ kāmacchandavasena nānārammaṇesu
anya-e0301n:282_4: cittavidhāvanaṃ nīvāretvā kasiṇanimittādike tasmiṃ ārammaṇe niccalaṃ ṭhatvā taṃārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhāyati oloketi.
anya-e0301n:282_5: Tasmā te sabbepi dhammā upanijjhāyanaṭṭhenapi jhānanti vuttāti.
anya-e0301n:282_6: Tesuca tathā pavattamānesu tappaccanīkā nīvaraṇadhammā okāsaṃ alabhitvā manasmiṃpi pariyuṭṭhituṃ nasakkonti.
anya-e0301n:282_9: Evaṃ santepi yasmā jhāna magga sambodhisaṅkhātesu tīsu ṭhānesu dhammasāmaggī padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:282_10: Aṅgānaṃ samaggabhāveeva appanāpattivasena upanijjhāya nādi kiccasaṃsiddhito.
anya-e0301n:282_11: Yasmāca ete dhammā vuttanayena visuṃvisuṃ attano kiccaṃ karontāpi cittassa ārammaṇe niccalappavatti saṅkhātaṃ ekameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ sādhenti.
anya-e0301n:282_12: Tasmā rathaṅgānaṃ samudāyeeva rathavohāroviya tesaṃ samudāyeeva jhāna vohāro siddhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:282_13: Aparepana pañcannaṃpi tesaṃ ārammaṇābhiniropanādīni yathāsakaṃ kiccāniyeva visuṃ visuṃ upanijjhānakiccānināma
anya-e0301n:282_14: hontīti paṭṭhāne jhānapaccayaṃ patvā sabbepete visuṃ visuṃ jhānapaccayaṃ sādhentiyeva.
anya-e0301n:282_15: Tasmā te visuṃ visuṃpi jhānāniyeva hontīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n:282_16: Yathāca pañcaṅgikaṃ sīlaṃ dasaṅgikaṃ sīlanti ettha pañcasamuditādīni tesaṃ sīlānaṃ pañcaṅgikā dināmalābhasseva kāraṇāni honti.
anya-e0301n:282_18: Na hi pāṇātipātā veramaṇādikaṃ ekaṃpi samānaṃ sīlaṃnāma na hotīti.
anya-e0301n:282_19: Evamevaṃ idhapi pañcasamuditādīni pañcaṅgikādi bhāvasseva pathamajjhānādi bhāvassevaca kāraṇāni.
anya-e0301n:282_21: Itarathā jhānapaccaye jhānaṅgāni paccaniyāniyeva siyuntipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n:282_22: Ettāvatā satipi imassa cittassa phassādīhipi sahitabhāve tesaṃ tathāvidhakiccavisesābhāvā idha aggahaṇantipi siddhaṃ nahotīti.
anya-e0301n:282_23: Vicārapītisukhekaggatā saṅkhātena dutīyajjhānena sampayuttaṃ kusalacittaṃ dutīyajjhāna kusalacittaṃ,
anya-e0301n:283_4: Yohi vitakkasahāyo hutvā pañcaṅgikaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tattha vasībhāvaṃ katvā punavitakke nibbindati.
anya-e0301n:283_5: Tassa vitakkaṃ samatikkamitvā avitakkaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ adhigantuṃ ajjhāsayo saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0301n:283_6: Tadā so tameva pathamajjhānaṃ pādakabhāvatthāya daḷhaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tena ajjhāsayena saheva
anya-e0301n:283_7: punabhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto avitakkaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ adhigacchati.
anya-e0301n:283_8: Tattha sā bhāvanāsayaṃ vitakkayuttāpi tena ajjhāsayena paribhāvitattā vitakkavirāga bhāvanānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n:283_10: Balena taṃ jhānaṃ uppajja mānaṃ avitakkaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0301n:283_12: Evaṃ puggalajjhāsayena tesaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhedo katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:283_13: Etthaca uttaruttarajjhānā dhigamane pādakabhāvatthāya purimapurimajjhānassa samāpajjanaṃ avassaṃ icchitabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:283_14: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:283_17: Tenāha bhagavā ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattāti.
anya-e0301n:283_18: Ayañca attho upari lokuttaracittaṃ patvā āvi bhavissatīti.
anya-e0301n:284_6: Tathāhi sabbesaṃpi lokiya lokuttarajjhānānaṃ sukhappaṭipadabhāve siddhe asaṅkhārikabhāvo siddhoyeva hoti.
anya-e0301n:284_7: Dukkhappaṭipadabhāveca siddhe tesaṃ sasaṅkhārikabhāvo siddhoyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n:285_0: Yo ādito kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti.
anya-e0301n:285_2: Yo kilese vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti.
anya-e0301n:286_1: Etthaca pubbavākye dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogenāti diṭṭhattā paravākyepi sukhe na asaṅkhārena appayogenāti diṭṭhameva hoti.
anya-e0301n:286_2: Tattha sasaṅkhārena sappayogenāti saṅkhārappayogasahitena kāmādīnavadassanādinā paccayagaṇenāti attho.
anya-e0301n:286_3: Etena sabbesaṃ dukkhappaṭipadajjhānānaṃ sasaṅkhārikabhāvo vutto hoti.
anya-e0301n:286_5: Etena sabbesaṃ sukhappaṭipadajjhānānaṃ asaṅkhārikabhāvo vutto hotīti.
anya-e0301n:286_8: Yadievaṃ paṭipadārahitānaṃ magga siddhaupapattisiddhajjhānānaṃ kathaṃ saṅkhārabhedo siddhoti.
anya-e0301n:286_9: Tesaṃpi vaḷañjanakāle samāpattippaṭibandhakānaṃ paccayānaṃ sannihitā sannihitavasena dukkhasukhappaṭipadabhāvasambhavo hotiyevāti.
anya-e0301n:286_10: Tattha maggasiddhajjhānaṃnāma suddhavipassanāyānikānaṃ maggappaṭilābhena saheva siddhajjhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:286_13: Tattha mahāsamayasutte āgatānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhānaṃ heṭṭhima maggasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n:286_15: Yaṃpi anāgāmīnaṃ ajānantānaññeva satthena hanitvā sahasā marantānaṃ uppannaṃ.
anya-e0301n:286_17: Yopana aṭṭhasamāpattiyo bhāvetvā aññatarasmiṃ rūpi brahmaloke nibbatti.
anya-e0301n:286_18: Tassa tā samāpatti yo tattha pākatikāeva honti.
anya-e0301n:286_20: Ekasmiṃ bhavepi hi laddhajjhānāni vaḷañjanakāle sannihitapaccayavasena nānāpaṭipadāyuttāni hontīti.
anya-e0301n:286_21: Jhānuppattippaṭipadā rahitattāvā asaṅkhārikajjhānesu tesaṃ saṅgaho yutto siyāti. Apica,
anya-e0301n:286_22: nettipāḷiyaṃ sabbesaṃ lokiya lokuttarasamādhīnaṃ saṅkhārabhedo sarūpatova niddiṭṭho. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n:286_23: dve samādhayo sasaṅkhāro samādhi asaṅkhāro samādhīti.
anya-e0301n:286_24: Aṭṭhakathāyañca sukhappaṭipadā pubbakānaṃ dvinnaṃ dandhābhiññakhippābhiññasamādhīnaṃ asaṅkhārabhāvo dukkhappaṭipadā
anya-e0301n:286_26: Ettāvatā sabbesaṃ mahaggatalokuttarajjhānacittānaṃ asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārikavasena visuṃ visuṃ duvidhabhāvo siddho hoti.
anya-e0301n:286_30: Tasmā tesaṃ bhedaṃ saṅkhāravasena avatvā paṭipadāvaseneva dhammasaṅgaṇi pāḷiyaṃpi vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:288_0: “Sabbassapi jhānassa parikammasaṅkhātapubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā kevalaṃ adhikāravasena anuppajjanato asaṅkhārikantipi.
anya-e0301n:288_1: Adhikārenaca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkāravaseneva anuppajjanato sasaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:288_3: Asaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattunti idaṃ tāva nayujjati.
anya-e0301n:289_0: Na hi parikammasaṅkhāta pubbābhisaṅkhāro imasmiṃ saṅkhārabhede saṅkhāro evanāma hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n:289_2: tathāhi loke sāsaneca sabbaṃpi kusalākusala kammaṃ attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhāta pubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā uppannaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n:289_4: Yañca cittaṃ yena attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhātapubbā bhisaṅkhārena vinā na uppajjati.
anya-e0301n:289_5: So tassa cittassa pakatipaccayagaṇeevaanto gadho hoti.
anya-e0301n:289_6: Jhānānica lokiya lokuttara bhūtāni sabbāni attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhāta pubbabhāgabhāvanā bhisaṅkhārena
anya-e0301n:289_7: vinā uppannānināma natthīti so tesaṃ pakatipaccayagaṇesueva antogadho hotīti.
anya-e0301n:289_8: Itarathā sabbaṃpi kusalākusala kammaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ nāmanatthīti āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:291_0: Adhikārenaca vinā kevalaṃ.La. Sasaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattunti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:292_0: Na hi lokiyajjhānānināma adhikārena vinā nuppajjantīti atthi.
anya-e0301n:292_1: Kevalaṃpana pubbe samathakammesu katādhikārassa sukhappaṭipadajjhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0301n:292_6: purimabhave siddhaṃ adhikāraṃ gahetvā idha saṅkhārabhedavicāraṇāpi nayuttāeva.
anya-e0301n:292_7: Kusalakriyajjhānesu hi sanni hitapaccayavaseneva tabbicāraṇā yuttāti.
anya-e0301n:294_0: Athavātiādiko pacchima vikappopi paṭikkhitto eva hotīti.
anya-e0301n:295_1: Ettha jhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa nimittuppādato pubbaṃ paṭipadāya khettaṃ,
anya-e0301n:295_3: Tattha pubbe viruddhapaccayānaṃ sannihitena kilamantassa sato paṭipajjantassa bhāvanā paṭipadā dukkhānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n:295_5: Pacchāca dandhaṃ appanaṃ pattassa bhāvanābhiññā dandhābhiññānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n:295_7: Tattha pubbe dukkhā paṭipadā pacchā dandhaṃvā khippaṃvā uppannaṃ jhānaṃ dukkhappaṭipadaṃnāma karoti.
anya-e0301n:295_9: Dutīyajjhānādīsupana purimajjhāne nikanti vikkhambhanassa dukkhasukhatāvasena paṭipadābhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:295_10: Yopana etarahi gahaṭṭhovā pabbajitovā pubbabhave akatādhikāropi antarāyikadhammamutto kalyāṇapaṭipattiyaṃ
anya-e0301n:295_12: Tassa jhānabhāvanā nasampajjatīti natthīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0301n:296_1: Vipākajjhāne kāmakusalaṃ appanaṃ apattaṃ mudubhūtaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:296_3: Tasmā taṃ attanā asadisaṃpi vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0301n:296_6: Tasmā taṃ sadāpi attanā sadisameva vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0301n:296_7: Teneva vitakkavicārapīti sukhekaggatā sahitantiādinā vipākaṃpi sabbaso kusala sadisameva dasseti.
anya-e0301n:297_0: [50] Anantarabhaveyeva phaladānattā taṃ attanā sadisameva vipākaṃ janetītica vadanti,
anya-e0301n:298_0: Evañhi sati kāmakusalaṃpi sattamajavanaṃ attanā sadisavipāka meva janeyyāti.
anya-e0301n:298_1: Yasmāca kusalameva niranusayasantāne pavattaṃ kriyajjhānaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0301n:299_2: Tattha jhānabhedenāti pathamajjhānādīhi pañcahi jhānehi sampayogabhedena.
anya-e0301n:301_0: Jhānabhedenāti jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedenāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:304_0: “Pañcadhāti pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ puna duvaṅgikanti pañcavidhaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:305_0: Jhānameva hi pañcaṅgikādi hoti. Na cittanti.
anya-e0301n:307_1: Idāni yathānuppattaṃ arūpacittaṃ niddisanto ākāsānañcā yatanakusalacittantiādi māha.
anya-e0301n:307_3: So hi sayaṃ sarūpato anupalabbhamānopi candasūriyobhāsādīnaṃ vasena ativijjotamānoviya khāyatīti.
anya-e0301n:307_4: Nakassati chedana bhedana vasena na vilekhīyatīti akāso.
anya-e0301n:307_6: So pana ajaṭākāso paricchinnākāso kasiṇugghāṭimākāso rūpakalāpaparicchedākāsoti catubbidho hoti.
anya-e0301n:307_8: So hi anantena ajaṭākāsena saha ekībhūtoviya hoti.
anya-e0301n:307_11: Nāssa uppādantovā vayantovā paññāyatīti anantotipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:307_14: Yathā pana devānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavatthu devāyatananti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:307_15: Tathā idhapi tasmiṃ appanāpattassa sasampayuttassa jhānassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tadeva āyatanantipi vuccati.
anya-e0301n:308_0: Ākāsānañcā yatananti ākāsānañcā yatanaṃ samāpannassavā upapannassavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissavā citta ceta sikādhammāti hi vibhaṅge vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:309_2: Taṃpana sayaṃ uppādādi antavantaṃpi anantasaññite ākāse pavattanato anantanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:309_4: Attano uppādādīsu koṭṭhāsesu ekadese aṭṭhatvā sakalassa pharaṇavasena tadārammaṇāya bhāvanāya pavattanato anantanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:309_5: Anantasaññitevā ākāse pavattanato anantanti evaṃ tadārammaṇāya bhāvanāya pavattattā anantanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:309_6: Anantasaññitevā ākāse attano pharaṇākāra vasenapi anantanti vattuṃ yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:312_0: “Dutīyā ruppa viññāṇena añcitabbaṃ pāpuṇitabbanti viññāṇañca”ntipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0301n:313_0: Anantaṃ viññāṇanti tadeva viññāṇaṃ ñāṇena phuṭṭhaṃ manasikaroti,
anya-e0301n:313_3: Etena ca taṃviññāṇaṃ ekantena anantavisesanayuttaṃ hotīti viññāyatīti.
anya-e0301n:313_5: Ākiñcaññāyatananti ettha kiñci kiñcananti atthato ekaṃ appamattakassa nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n:313_6: Natthi kiñcanaṃ appamattakaṃ antamaso bhaṅgamattaṃpi avasiṭṭhaṃ assa pathamā ruppaviññāṇassāti akiñcanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:313_9: So hi natthi kiñcīti manasikāra vasena taṃnāmaṃ labhatīti.
anya-e0301n:313_11: Nevasaññā nāsaññāyatananti ettha oḷārika saññaṃ sandhāya nevatthi saññā assāti nevasaññaṃ.
anya-e0301n:313_12: Sukhumasaññaṃ sandhāya naca natthi saññā assāti nāsaññaṃ,
