anya-e0301n:907_2: Evaṃ payogena asādhanīyānaṃ vipākānaṃ tikkhamandatā visesabhūto saṅkhārabhedo kammavaseneva vattabbo.
anya-e0301n:907_4: Itarathā kammavisesena tikkhamandajātānaṃ tesaṃ sannihitapaccayamattena mandatikkhatāpattināma siyāti.
anya-e0301n:907_5: Ahetu kavipākānaṃ pana paridubbalattā aparibyattova tikkhamandatā visesoti ubhayakammanibbattanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n:907_6: Yasmā pana tesaṃ sasaṅkhārāsaṅkhārabhāvo paṭisandhivasenavā tadārammaṇavasenavā uppattikāle pubbapayogasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0301n:907_9: na hi kammabhave saṅkhāro bhavantare vipākāni visesetuṃ yutto.
anya-e0301n:907_10: Tasmā imaṃ vādaṃ kecivādaṃnāma karonto kecanāti āha.
anya-e0301n:908_0: Imasmiṃ kecivāde asaṅkhārikakamme sasaṅkhārika vipākāni sasaṅkhārikakammeca asaṅkhārikavipākāni vajjetvā
anya-e0301n:908_1: catūsu tihe tukukkaṭṭhesu kammesu asaṅkhārikadvaye vipākāni paṭisandhiyaṃ dve,
anya-e0301n:908_10: Catūsu dvihetukomakesu pana paṭisandhiyaṃ ekaṃ ahetukaṃ pavattiyaṃ aṭṭhaahetukānīti evaṃ vipākānaṃ dve
anya-e0301n:908_11: dvādasakamaggā cattāro dasakamaggā ekaṃ ahetukaṭṭhakañca honti,
anya-e0301n:909_1: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana tihetukena kammena paṭisandhitihetukāva hoti.
anya-e0301n:909_3: Duhetukena kammena paṭisandhi duhetukāpi hoti ahetukāpi.
anya-e0301n:909_4: Tihetukā pana nahotīti evaṃ pavatto mahādhammarakkhitattheravādopi āgato.
anya-e0301n:909_5: Tattha yathā duhetukena hīnena kammena ahetukā paṭisandhi avassaṃ icchitabbā hoti.
anya-e0301n:909_6: Tathā tihetukenapi hīnena kammena duhetukāpi paṭisandhi avassaṃ icchitabbāyevāti katvā idha ayaṃvādo therena na gahitoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:909_8: gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.
anya-e0301n:909_9: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā.
anya-e0301n:909_11: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatātica gati sampattiyā ñāṇa vippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hohi.
anya-e0301n:909_12: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā.
anya-e0301n:909_14: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū abyākatātica evaṃ tihetukena kammena paṭisandhi tihetukāva vuttā.
anya-e0301n:909_16: Na pana gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayātiādinā tihetukena kammena dvihetukā paṭisandhi vuttā.
anya-e0301n:909_17: Naca catunnaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayātiādinā dvihetukena kammena ahetukā paṭisandhīti.
anya-e0301n:910_0: Tattha pana tīsu khaṇesu sahajāta hetūnaṃ vasena hetu mūlakova ayaṃ desanāvāroti katvā anokāsatāya ahetukapaṭisandhi tattha navuttā.
anya-e0301n:910_3: Alabbha mānattāyeva sā navuttāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
anya-e0301n:910_4: Tasmā yuttito pāḷiyeva balavatarāti katvā mahādhammarakkhitattheravādova pāḷiyā sametīti paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0301n:910_5: Ṭīkākārā pana kammasarikkhaka vipākadassanatthaṃ sāvasesa pāṭhova mahātherena vuttoti icchanti.
anya-e0301n:910_6: Evañca katvā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃpi tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādova pamāṇaṃ katvā vuttoti.
anya-e0301n:911_0: Vibhāvaniyaṃ idāni ekāya cetanāya dvādasavipākāni ettheva dasakamaggopi ahetukaṭṭhakampiti āgatassa moravāpivāsi mahādhammarakkhitattherassāti pāṭho.
anya-e0301n:912_1: Mahādhamma rakkhitattheravādopi pana ettha ekadesena saṅgahitoyeva.
anya-e0301n:912_2: Tasmiṃpi hi asaṅkhārikaṃ kammaṃ asaṅkhārikavipākameva deti.
anya-e0301n:913_1: Rūpāvacarakamme parittanti duvidhaṃ parittaṃ apaguṇatā yavā hīnatāyavā.
anya-e0301n:913_2: Tattha yaṃ paṇītehi chandādīhi yuttaṃpi abhāvitaṃ hoti paṭiladdhamattaṃ,
anya-e0301n:913_5: upari jhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0301n:913_7: Yaṃ pana subhāvitaṃpi samānaṃ hīnehi chandādīhi yuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:913_9: Yaṃ sandhāya yassa āyūhanakkhaṇe chandovā hīno hoti.
anya-e0301n:913_14: Tattha nātipaguṇa tāya majjhimaṃ sandhāya nātisubhāvito majjhimoti visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:913_15: Majjhimehi chandādīhi yuttatāya majjhimaṃ sandhāya yassa āyūhanakkhaṇe te dhammā majjhimā honti.
anya-e0301n:913_18: Tattha atipaguṇatāya paṇītaṃ sandhāya subhāvito vasippatto paṇītoti visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:913_19: Paṇītehi pana chandādīhi yuttatāya paṇītaṃ sandhāya yassa āyūhanakkhaṇe te dhammā paṇītā honti.
anya-e0301n:913_21: Tattha yāni apaguṇatādi vasena parittādīni vuttāni,
anya-e0301n:913_23: Yāni pana hīnādīhi chandādīhi yuttatāya parittādīni vuttāni,
anya-e0301n:913_25: Imāneva hi tividhāsu bhūmīsu tividhaṃ brahmupapattibhedaṃ sādhentīti.
anya-e0301n:913_26: Itthīnaṃ jhānesu vasīpattānaṃpi chandādīnaṃ apaṇītatāya mahābrahmesu anuppajjanañcettha sādhakaṃ.
anya-e0301n:913_27: Tenevaca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ chandādivasena siddhāni hīna majjhima paṇītāni aṭṭhārasapabhedena vibhajitvā imāni
anya-e0301n:913_28: aṭṭhārasa kammadvārāni nāma imehi pabhāvitattā imesaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasakhattiyā aṭṭhārasa brāhmaṇā aṭṭhārasa
anya-e0301n:913_29: vessā aṭṭhārasa suddā aṭṭhacattā līsa gotta caraṇāni veditabbānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:913_30: Etena hi devānaṃpi brahmūnaṃpi labbhamānaṃ upapattibhedaṃ upalakkhetīti.
anya-e0301n:915_2: Ativiyasubhāvitaṃ pana sabbaso paripuṇṇa vasībhāvaṃ paṇīta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:916_0: Tañhi upari jhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthāsamatthaṃvā hāna bhāgiyatādi visesaṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:918_0: “Ācariyena panettha parittaṃpi īsakaṃ laddhāsevanameva adhippetanti dissati.
anya-e0301n:920_0: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetu, mabhiññā na vipaccatīti.
anya-e0301n:921_0: Samānabhūmikatova āsevana lābhena balava bhāvato mahaggatadhammānaṃ vipākadānaṃ vatvā tadabhāvato abhiññāya avipaccanaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:922_0: Yathā hi ariyamaggacetanā attanā samānabhūmakajavanato aladdhāsevanāpi samānā vipākaṃ na detīti natthi.
anya-e0301n:922_1: Tathā ādi kammikavīthiyaṃ ekavāramattabhūtā sabbasamāpatti vīthīsuca sabbapatha mabhūtā mahaggatacetanāpi
anya-e0301n:922_2: samānabhūmakadhammato aladdhāsevana tāya dubbalattā vipākaṃ nadetīti natthīti na na sakkā viññātunti.
anya-e0301n:922_4: tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n:922_6: Na ca sā cetanā upacitānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n:922_9: Sāpihi tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ. La.
anya-e0301n:922_12: Ubhayattha pana pathamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya upacinitvā bhāvetvā āgatattā asamānabhūmika javanehipi
anya-e0301n:922_13: laddhāsevana bhāvaṃ paṭicca upacitatā bhāvitatāca vuttāti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n:922_14: Tasmā ādi kammikabhūtāpi mahaggatacetanā maraṇā sanne laddhā abbhuṇhā āsannakammabhūtā vipākaṃ nadetīti na vattabbā.
anya-e0301n:922_15: Abhiññācetanā ca samānabhūmakehipi nānāvajjanavīthijavanehi suṭṭhutaraṃ laddhāsevanattā tikkhatarabhūtā kathaṃ dubbalānāma siyā.
anya-e0301n:922_17: Vuttañhi tattha keci pana samāna bhūmakato āsevanalābhena balavantāni jhānānīti tāni vipākaṃ denti.
anya-e0301n:922_18: Abhiññā pana satipi jhānabhāve tadabhāvato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āgantukattāvā dubbalā.
anya-e0301n:922_22: Catutthajjhānasamādhissa pana ānisaṃsabhūtā abhiññācetanā tassa phalasadisā phalaṭṭhāne ṭhitā,
anya-e0301n:922_23: tasmā sā vipākaṃ nadetīti icchanti ṭīkākārā.
anya-e0301n:922_24: Tassa pana iddhi vikubbanādikiccaṃ vipaccanakiccatopi mahantataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:922_25: Sabbathā menaca vikubbanādikiccaṃ sādhentiyā vipaccanathāmepi tena thāmena saha parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:922_26: Tasmā sā puna vipākaṃ nadetītipi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:922_27: Pañcamajjhānanti abhiññābhāvaṃ apattaṃ parittādibhedena tividhaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:922_29: Saññāvirāgaṃ bhāvetvāti citte sati rajjana dussana muyhanāni honti.
anya-e0301n:922_30: Tasmiṃ asati diṭṭhadhammanibbānappattonāma hotīti evaṃ citte eva ādīnavaṃ disvā acittakabhavapatthanā
anya-e0301n:922_31: sahitaṃ vāyokasiṇevā kesañci matena paricchinnākāsa kasiṇevā saññāvirāgaṃ bhāvetvā.
anya-e0301n:922_32: Asaññasattesu uppajjantīti yena yena iriyāpathena idha maranti,
anya-e0301n:922_35: Na hi akammakiriyavādīnaṃ jhānabhāvanā nāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n:922_36: Anāgāmino pana suddhāvāsesu uppajjantīti suddhāvāsesu pana anāgāmino eva uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:922_38: Etena anāgāmīnaṃ aññasmiṃpi brahmaloke uppatti appaṭisiddhā hoti.
anya-e0301n:922_44: Yathākkamaṃ bhāvetvā yathākkamaṃ arūpesu uppajjantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:922_45: Etthaca pathamajjhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvātiādi sabbaṃ pathamajjhānādīnaṃ yathā sakaṃ vipaccanabhūmi vavatthānavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:922_46: Samāpattilābhino pana puthujjana sotāpanna sakadāgāmino attanā laddhasamāpattīnaṃ vipaccanabhūmīsu icchitabhūmiyaṃ nibbattanti.
anya-e0301n:922_47: Tesu puthujjano nikantiyā sati kāmalokepi nibbattatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:922_48: Itare pana jhāne apari hīne sati kāmalokepi nibbattatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:922_49: Itare pana jhāne aparihīne sati kāmabhave nikantināma tesaṃ na sambhavatīti parihīnajjhānāeva tattha nibbattanti.
anya-e0301n:924_0: Tesaṃpi sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ nikantivasena kāmabhavenibbattiṃ icchantena “tathā kāmabhavepi kāmāvacara kammabalena.
anya-e0301n:924_1: Ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattāti hi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:925_0: Tehi jhāne aparihīne ekantena brahmalokagāminoeva honti.
anya-e0301n:925_2: Jhānapari hānica tesaṃ taṃtaṃ palibodha vaseneva hoti.
anya-e0301n:925_6: sahadassanuppādā bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni mahīyanti.La.
anya-e0301n:925_9: Tasmiṃ ce samaye bhikkhave ariyasāvako kālaṅkareyya.
anya-e0301n:925_11: Yena saṃyojanena saṃyutto ariyasāvako puna yimaṃ lokaṃ āgaccheyyāti.
anya-e0301n:925_12: Etthaca tasmiṃ ce samayetiādinā so laddhajjhānaṃ aparihāpetvā ce kālaṅkaroti.
anya-e0301n:925_14: Parihāpentassa pana taṃ saṃyojanaṃ pākatimevāti dasseti.
anya-e0301n:925_15: Paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyañca jhānalābhīnaṃ pana anāgāmissaca brahmalokeyeva paṭisandhidānato paccayo nahotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:925_17: Paccayo nahotīti tesaṃ vipassanānikanti taṇhā kāmasugatipaṭisandhiyā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0301n:926_0: Tasmā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sekhānaṃ kuppadhammānaṃpi sataṃ jhāne vijjamāne kāmabhave nikanti nāma natthīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:926_1: Anāgāmissa pana niddāyantasseva satthena gīvaṃ chinditvā mārīyamānassapi jhānaṃ alabhitvā cavanaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n:926_3: Itthiyo pana aṭṭhasamāpattiyo labhitvā anantare bhave akaniṭṭhe nibbattamānāpi adhipatibhūtesu mahābrahmesu na nibbattanti.
anya-e0301n:926_5: Tathāhi aṭṭhakathāsu yaṃ itthī brahmattaṃ kareyya,
anya-e0301n:926_6: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti suttapadassa atthavacane brahmattanti mahābrahmattaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0301n:926_7: Itthī ca idha jhānaṃ bhāvetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmapārisajjānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati,
anya-e0301n:927_0: Athakho bhikkhave sikhībhagavā abhituṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi.
anya-e0301n:927_1: Paṭibhātu taṃ brāhmaṇa brahmunoca brahmaparisāyaca brahmapārisajjānañca dhammikathāti.
anya-e0301n:928_3: Nanu brahmapārisajjānanti vuttattā na mahābrahmānanti ettheva tesaṃ saṅgahaṇaṃ yuttanti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n:928_7: netaṃṭhānaṃ vijjatīti evaṃ adhipati bhūtehi sakkādīhi saha vuttattā idha adhipatipaṭikkhipanasseva sambhavato.
anya-e0301n:928_11: Ettāvatā vehapphalādīsu uparibrahmalokesupi purohitapārisajjabrahmānaṃ atthitā siddhā hoti.
anya-e0301n:928_12: Teneva saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ therānañhi bhaṇḍagāhakadaharā viya brahmānaṃpi pārisajjabrahmāno nāma hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:930_0: “Itthiyopi pana ariyāvā anariyāvā aṭṭhasamāpattilā bhiniyo brahmapārisajjesuyeva nibbattantīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:931_0: Tattha brahmapārisajjesuyevāti akaniṭṭhe nibbattamānāpi brahmānaṃ paricārika brahmesueva nibbattanti.
anya-e0301n:933_0: Brahmapārisajjesuyeva nibbattanti, na brahmapurohitādīsūti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:935_0: Sāmāvatiyādīnaṃ pathamaṃ brahmapārisajjesu nibbattanaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0301n:936_0: Yasmā pana tā imasmiṃ attabhāve ariyaphalāni sacchākaṃsu.
anya-e0301n:936_2: Itarā kāci tāvatiṃsesu kāci paranimmitavasavattīsu uppannā icceva udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0301n:936_3: Apicettha vehapphale akaniṭṭhe catutthāruppeti tīsu bhavaggesu nibbattā ariyā aññattha nuppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:937_2: Tattha aparikkhīṇeyeva kammānubhāve tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye yathāniyamitassa āyuparimāṇassa parikkhayena paripuṇṇena maraṇaṃ āyukkhaya maraṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:937_3: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave dubbalena kammena nibbattassa sattassa aparikkhīṇeyeva āyuparimāṇe kevalaṃ kammasattiparikkhayena
anya-e0301n:937_5: Tadubhayassa samaṃ parikkhayena maraṇaṃ ubhayakkhaya maraṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:937_6: Dharamānepi tadubhaye purimabhavesuvā imasmiṃvābhave katena upaghātakakammena ajjhattabahiddhābhūte nānārogābādha
anya-e0301n:937_7: pathavīpavesa asanipātādike jīvitantarāye samuṭṭhāpetvā dussimārakalāburājādīnaṃviya antarāva uparodhita
anya-e0301n:937_9: Nanu cettha marantānaṃ nāma sabbesaṃpi taṃtaṃbhavaṃ janentaṃ kammaṃ khiyyatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:937_11: sarasavaseneva hi kammasāmatthiyassa khayo idha kammakkhayoti adhippeto.
anya-e0301n:937_12: Ye pana dasavassa vīsativassa yāva asaṅkhyeyya vassādi vasena nānāāyukappavidhāyakā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye
anya-e0301n:937_13: sabbajana sādhāraṇā sattānaṃ ajjhattabahiddhasambhūtā utuāhārānāma honti.
anya-e0301n:937_14: Te tassa tassa āyukappassa ṭhitikarā vuddhikarā hānikarācāti tividhā honti.
anya-e0301n:937_17: Ubhayamūlesu samaṃ ṭhitesu ṭhitikarā samaṃ pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:937_18: Tesaṃ vasena sattānaṃ āyukappo katthaci sadā ṭhitibhāgo hoti.
anya-e0301n:937_19: Katthaci kadāci hānibhāgo kadāci vuddhibhāgo hoti.
anya-e0301n:937_20: Tayopi cete ṭhitikarādayo taṃtaṃsattanikāyaṃ ajjhottharamānā āyuṃ paricchindantā pavattantīti asaṅkhyeyyāyuka
anya-e0301n:937_21: saṃvattanikaṃ cakkavattisampatti saṃvattanikañca kammaṃ dasavassike kāle vipaccamānaṃ tadanurūpaṃeva
anya-e0301n:937_23: Taṃ taṃ sattanikāya pariyāpannā sattā santānabhūtā rūpadhammā sabbaññu buddhānaṃ khandhasantāna bhūtāpi
anya-e0301n:937_24: taggatikā tadanūvattikā eva hutvā pariṇamanti aññatra iddhimaya vijjāmaya rasāyanavidhi jīvita saṅkhāra vidūhīti.
anya-e0301n:939_0: Tasmā padhānanissayabhūtesu dvisamuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesu taṃ taṃ āyukappavasena pariṇamantesu jiyyamānesu
anya-e0301n:939_1: yāvamahantaṃpi kammaṃ attano vipākādhiṭṭhānassa abhāvā khiyyatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:939_3: Athakho āyusaṅkhāravipattiyā eva hotīti idha āyukkhayo visuṃ gahitoti.
anya-e0301n:939_8: Tāni pana pāḷiyaṃ mūlabhedato saṃkhipitvā aṭṭhadhā vuttāni.
anya-e0301n:939_19: Yasmā pana vāto kuppamāno sītuṇhādīhi dasahi kāraṇehi kuppati.
anya-e0301n:939_21: Sesāni pana akammavipākajānīti milinda pañhe vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:939_22: Yasmāca kammavipākajāpi ābādhā uppajjamānā vāta kuppanādīhi vinā na uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:939_23: Tasmā keci vātasamuṭṭhānādayopi kammavipākajā hontiyevāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:940_0: Tattha sannipātikāti vātādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃvā sannipatitānaṃ vasena pavattā.
anya-e0301n:940_1: Ye pana loke sattānaṃ payogamuttā sayaṃ jātā nānābhayupaddavā.
anya-e0301n:940_3: Visamaparihārajāti anisammakārīnaṃ anekavidhe visame vipattimukhe attānaṃ payojantānaṃ tato tatovā tattha tattha vā patana pakkhalanādivasena pavattā.
anya-e0301n:940_4: Opakkamikāti attanāvā parehi rājacoraverīhivā amanussavāḷayakkhadevatāhivā vāḷamigādīhivā katānaṃ payogānaṃ vasena pavattā.
anya-e0301n:940_5: Kuppitā hi devatā sakalaṃ rajjaṃvā raṭṭhaṃvā dīpakaṃvā ekappahārena asesaṃ katvā vināsenti daṇḍakaraṭṭha
anya-e0301n:940_9: Vuttañhetaṃ aṅguttare yakkhā vāḷe amanusse ossajjanti.
anya-e0301n:940_12: Vāḷe amanusse ossajjantīti caṇḍe yakkhe manussapathe vissajjanti.
anya-e0301n:940_13: Te laddhokāsā mahājanaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpentīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:940_14: Tattha vissajjantīti visamācāra bahule manusse disvā bhinnasaddhā yakkhasenāpatino manussānaṃ atthāya pubbeviya ārakkhaṃna gaṇhantīti attho.
anya-e0301n:940_15: Janapadanagaranigamagāmesuceva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ puggaleca vattabbameva natthi.
anya-e0301n:940_16: Aṅguttare vuttā satthadubbhikkharoga kappāpi idha vattabbāti.
anya-e0301n:940_17: Kammavipākajāti upapīḷakopaghātakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipaccanavasena pavattā ābādhāti attho.
anya-e0301n:940_18: Evaṃ akālamaraṇaṃ upacchedakammunāvā aññehivā anekasahassehi kāraṇehi hotīti.
anya-e0301n:940_20: Pāṇaharā jīvitavināsakā nānārogāvā nānābādhāvā nānābhayā nivā nānā daṇḍāvā nānā upaddavu pasaggāvā.
anya-e0301n:940_21: Sabbe te sakakamma samuṭṭhitāeva attano sādhāraṇāti natthi.
anya-e0301n:940_24: Kammena vinā yato kutoci samuṭṭhitāpi attano vā paresaṃvā sādhāraṇāeva.
anya-e0301n:941_0: Yathā catumahāpathe thapite lakkhamhi sabbadisāhi āgatā sarasattitomarapāsāṇādayo nipatanti.
anya-e0301n:942_1: Tattha yejanā upāya kusalāvā na honti.
anya-e0301n:942_6: Tejanā vināpi upacchedakakammunā tato na muccanti.
anya-e0301n:942_8: Kalyāṇabhūtaṃpi hi kammaṃ attano balavataraṃ yatokutoci samuṭṭhitaṃ rogaṃvā ābādhaṃ vā bhayaṃvā daṇḍaṃvā upaddavupasaggaṃvā paṭibāhituṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n:942_10: Yathā hi udakaṃ attano balavataraṃ aggiṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n:942_11: Aggieva taṃ khepento pavattatīti evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:942_12: Imesañca sattānaṃ pakatiyāpi kammassa dubbalabhāvo mahāniddese jarā suttaniddesena visuddhi maggeca maraṇassati
anya-e0301n:942_13: niddese āyu dubbalatoti padassa niddese na dīpetabbo. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:943_1: Tathā hi sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ assāsapassāsupanibandhañceva iriyāpathupanibandhañca sītuṇhu panibandhañca mahābhūtupanibandhañca āhārupanibandhañcātiādi.
anya-e0301n:944_0: Tathā kāyabahusādhāraṇato animittatoti imesaṃ padānaṃ niddesenapi pākaṭoyeva.
anya-e0301n:944_1: Kammanibbattassa hi āyuno tiṇagge ussāvabindusseva paridubbalabhāve pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathā yañca vutte kammasāpi tatheva paridubbalatā siddhā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:945_0: Idhekacco samaṇovā brāhmaṇovā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃ diṭṭhī.
anya-e0301n:945_1: Yaṃ kiñcāyaṃpurisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃvā dukkhaṃvā adukkhamasukhaṃvā.
anya-e0301n:946_0: Ayañca attho milindapañhe tīsu ṭhānesu vitthārato āgato.
anya-e0301n:946_1: Yathāvuttehi pana anekasahassehi kāraṇehi pavattamaraṇaṃpi akālamaraṇatāsāmaññena idha upacchedakamaraṇe saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:948_0: “Idaṃ pana nerayikānaṃ uttarakuruvāsinaṃ kesañci devānañca nahotīti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:949_0: Yathā pana mahāṭīkāyaṃ kesañci petānaṃ ito ñātake hi dinnaṃ puññapatti anumoditvā taṅkhaṇeyeva cavitvā
anya-e0301n:949_2: Tathā kesañci nerayi kānaṃpi yamarañño samanuyuñjanakālādīsu attanā katapuññaṃ anussaritvā taṅkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0301n:949_3: cavitvā sugatiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ upacche dakamaraṇaṃnāma na na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n:949_4: Kesañci tāvatiṃsādīnaṃ devānañca taṃ upacchedakamaraṇaṃ hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n:949_5: Tathā hi subrahmadeva putta saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ atha rukkhaṃ abhiruḷhā upacchedakakammādi vasenaekappahāreneva kālaṅkatvā avīcimhi nibbattāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:949_8: Manopadosika khiṭṭāpadosika devānaṃ maraṇaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ dighāyuke devalokevā brahmalokevā nibbattānaṃ
anya-e0301n:949_9: adhimutti kālaṅkiriyā channattheragodhikattherādīnaṃviya sayameva satthaṃ āharitvā parinibbāyantānaṃ
anya-e0301n:949_12: Marantānaṃ channaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhātīti sambandho.
anya-e0301n:949_16: Tesu sukkhavipassakānaṃ pakatiyā yatho paṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpa meva antima javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃhoti.
anya-e0301n:949_18: Paccavekkhanasamanantare parinibbāyantānaṃ jhānaṅgāni abhiññāsamanantare parinibbāyantānaṃ attano karajarūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n:949_19: Jīvita samasīsīnaṃ pana aggamaggassa paccavekkhanasamanantare parinibbāyantānaṃ maggaṅgādini antimajavanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:949_20: Parinibbānacuticittassa pana sabbesaṃpi ādito attano attano paṭisandhiyāyathāgahitaṃ kammādīsu aññatarameva ārammaṇaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:949_21: Yepana anejosanti mārabbhayaṃ kālamakarīmunīti imaṃ suttapadaṃ disvā nibbānameva bhagavato parinibbānacutiyā ārammaṇanti vadanti.
anya-e0301n:949_22: Te tena sayameva abhidhamme ārammaṇattikesu attano akovidataṃ dassenti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:950_1: sabbo kāmāvacaravipāko kriyamanodhātu kriyāhetuka manoviññāṇa dhātu somanassasahagatā.
anya-e0301n:951_0: Yasmā pana parinibbānaṃnāma santi atthāyeva hoti.
anya-e0301n:951_3: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ santimārabbhāti anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha paṭicca sandhāyāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:951_4: Na pana vuttaṃ ārabbha ālambitvā ārammaṇaṃ katvāti.
anya-e0301n:951_5: Theragāthaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana santimārabbhāti santiṃ anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:951_7: Tāsu hi bhagavato parinibbānaṃ jhānaṅga paccavekkhanasamanantaranti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:951_8: Etthaca purimāni dve samanantarāni parinibbānasuttaṭṭhakathāsu vuttāni.
anya-e0301n:951_10: vuṭṭhahitvā parinibbāyīti iddhicittato vuṭṭhahitvā bhavaṅgacittena parinibbāyīti.
anya-e0301n:951_12: ekūnavīsati me paccavekkhanaññāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatīti.
anya-e0301n:951_16: Tikhiṇena asinā sīse chijjamānepi ekaṃvā dvevā paccavekkhanāni uppajjantiyevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:953_1: “Katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:953_2: Na kamma kammani mittādayoti.” Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_0: Na hi tassa cuticittaṃ kammakammanimittādayo ārammaṇaṃ nakaroti.
anya-e0301n:954_1: Naca cutiyā gahitāni kammādīnināma sabbasattānaṃpi bhavantarassa atthāya bhavantīti.
anya-e0301n:954_2: Abhimukhībhūtanti kammantarassa okāsaṃ adatvā attano okāsaṃ katvā paccupaṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_4: Upaladdhapubbanti tassa kammassa ārammaṇa bhūtāni deyyadhamma vatthādīni parapāṇādīnica sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_5: Upakaraṇabhūtanti kammasiddhiyā upakaraṇabhūtāni parivārabhūtānica paṭiggāhakādīni āvudhabhaṇḍādinica sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_6: Yasmāca lakkhaṇa saṃyutte gavādīni vadhitvā rāsikatāni aṭṭhipuñjādīni kammanimittāni hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_7: Tasmā kammasambandhāni yāni kānici vatthūni vā ārammaṇānivā idha upakaraṇe saṅgahi tānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0301n:954_10: Ubhayaṃpi vā yaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ hutvā labhitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:954_12: Apaṭibaddhaṃ hutvā kevalaṃ sukhadukkhānubhavanatthāya labhitabbaṃ upabhoga bhūtaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:954_13: Etthaca aggijāla lohakumbhi nirayapāla nirayasunakhādīni nirayanimittaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_14: Taṃ pana kesañci janānaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhāneviya upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n:954_15: Kesañci tato tato āgantvā attānaṃ saṃparivārentaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n:954_17: Soṇagiripādato mahantā mahantā sunakhā āgantvā khāditukāmāviya saṃparivāresunti.
anya-e0301n:954_19: nandavana cittalatāvana missakavana phārusakavana vimānāniceva devanāṭakānica parivāretvā ṭhitāniviya ahesunti.
anya-e0301n:954_20: Kesañci pana sayaṃ tattha tattha patvā diṭṭhaṃviya upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n:954_23: Kammabalenāti idāni paṭisandhiṃ janetuṃ paccupaṭṭhitassa kammassa ānubhāvena.
anya-e0301n:954_25: Pakatiyā pana āciṇṇa bhūtaṃvā taṅkhaṇakataṃvā parena sarāpitaṃvā sayameva anussaritaṃvā pakatiyāva kukkuccaṃvā
anya-e0301n:954_26: somanassaṃvā janetvā ṭhitaṃvā kammaṃvā tassanimittaṃvā aññenapi kāraṇabalena paccupaṭṭhātiye vāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_27: Tameva tatopaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbhāti idañca yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_28: Tato hi kesañci pathamaṃ kammabalenavā kāraṇantarenavā pāpapakkhiyesu upaṭṭhahantesu puna duṭṭha gāmaṇi
anya-e0301n:954_29: rañño viya pubbakataṃ balavantaṃ puññaṃ anussarantānaṃvā soṇatthera vitu viya taṅkhaṇeyeva pasādajanakaṃ
anya-e0301n:954_31: Tathā kesañci pathamaṃ kalyāṇa pakkhiyesu upaṭṭhahantesu dhammāsokarañño viya pacchā kenaci kāraṇena
anya-e0301n:954_32: domanassaṃ uppādetvā pāpakammassa okāsaṃ karontānaṃ pāpapakkhiyāni upaṭṭhahantīti.
anya-e0301n:954_33: Vipaccamānaka kammānurūpanti yassa vipaccamānakaṃ kammaṃ kusalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:954_36: Tassa upakiliṭṭhaṃ akusala cittasantānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pavattatīti attho.
anya-e0301n:954_37: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi sugatigāmīnaṃ kusaluppatti hetubhūtaṃ paṇītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ āpātamāgacchatītica
anya-e0301n:954_38: duggatigāmīnaṃ akusaluppatti hetubhūtaṃ hīnārammaṇaṃ āpāta māgacchatī tica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_39: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ mahāṭīkāyañca āsanne akusalaṃ duggatiyaṃ kusalañca sugatiyaṃ paṭisandhiyā upanissayo hotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_42: Tadā tāni taṇhāya assādentasseva sato cavantassa kathanti. Vuccate.
anya-e0301n:954_45: Yasmā pana paṭisambhidā magge tādisiyā taṇhāya kusalakammassa sahakāri kāraṇa bhāvo vutto. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n:954_47: Tasmā sugatibhavanibbattanepi ayaṃ taṇhā ekantena kusala kammassa niyāmakasahakāripaccayabhūtāti katvā
anya-e0301n:954_48: tassa tānivā devaccharādīni kusalakamma kammanimittānivā assādentasseva sato cavantassa sātaṇhā tadupatthambhikāeva
anya-e0301n:954_51: Yañca nimittassādagadhitaṃvā bhikkhave viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0301n:954_57: Taṃpi attano paresaṃ vā hatthapādādīsu gadhitaṃ taṇhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_59: Upalabhitabba bhavānurūpanti upalabhitabbo bhavo yadi sugatibhavo hoti,
anya-e0301n:954_62: taṃ anassādanākārenāti evaṃ upalabhi tabbassa bhavassa anurūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_63: Tatthoṇataṃvāti tasmiṃ yatho paṭṭhite ārammaṇe oṇamantaṃeva.
anya-e0301n:954_64: Tathā hi bālapaṇḍitasutte tānissa tasmiṃ samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_65: Tattha tānissāti assa puggalassa tāni puññāpuñña kammāni.
anya-e0301n:954_67: Olambantīti tassa cittasantānaṃ attanieva oṇamantaṃ ajjhoṇamantaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ katvā lambanti palambanti.
anya-e0301n:954_69: Evaṃ pana tesu tathā olambantesu taṃcittasantānaṃ tesu ninnapoṇapabbhārameva hotīti vuttaṃ tatthoṇataṃvāti.
anya-e0301n:954_70: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kilesabalavināmitaṃ sutvā tadevaṃ pavattamānaṃ taṇhāavijjānaṃ appahīnattā avijjāya
anya-e0301n:954_71: paṭicchā ditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye taṇhā nāmeti sahajāta saṅkhārā khipantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:954_75: Taṇhānāmetīti vaṭṭamūlaka taṇhā taṃ tasmiṃ oṇamantaṃ katvā niyojetīti attho.
anya-e0301n:956_0: “Tatthoṇataṃvāti tasmiṃ upapajjitabbabhave oṇataṃ viya oṇataṃeva vā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:957_1: Tathāpavatti pana saṇikaṃ marantānaṃ eva labbhati.
anya-e0301n:957_2: Lahuka maraṇena marantānaṃ pana na labbhatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:959_0: “Bāhullenātiettha adhippāyo yebhuyyena bhavantareti ettha vuttanayena daṭṭhabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:960_0: Na hi tasmiṃ vuttānaṃ asaññisattānaṃ cittasantānassa abhiṇhappagattipasaṅgonāma atthi.
anya-e0301n:960_2: Idāni aparena pakārena kammu paṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ tamevavā pana.La.
anya-e0301n:960_4: Tattha abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ hotīti pubbe katasaññaṃ ajanetvā taṅkhaṇe eva karaṇākāraṃ janetvā
anya-e0301n:960_5: attānaṃ abhinavaṃ viya katvā manodvāre taṃsadisajavanappavattivasena pattaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0301n:960_6: Yathā hi imasmiṃbhavepavattaṃ kiñci pākaṭaṃ kammaṃ asukasmiṃ kāle idaṃnāmamayākatanti evaṃ pubbekatasaññaṃ janetvāpi upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n:960_7: Na tathā bhavantare pavattaṃ bhavapaṭicchannaṃñca imasmiṃ bhave pavattaṃ apākaṭañcāti. Apica,
anya-e0301n:960_8: idhekacce buddhādīsu tīsu vatthusu dānapūjādivasena āciṇṇabahulā honti.
anya-e0301n:960_9: Te maraṇanti kābādhabalena visīdappattā kiñci dukkhaṃajānitvā visīdantare pubbe viya bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e0301n:960_10: dānaṃ dentācetiyaṃ vandantā pūjaṃ karontā vippasannacittā pamodacittā eva honti.
anya-e0301n:960_14: Tattha asilomapetādi patthūsu tassa ukkhittāsikabhāvova nimittaṃ ahosīti ca.
anya-e0301n:960_15: Tassa sattiyā vijjhanaka bhāvova nimittaṃ ahosītica.
anya-e0301n:960_18: Tassa sūcīhi patodanadukkhaṃ paccanubhavituṃ kammameva nimittaṃ katvā sūcilomapeto jātotica evaṃ bahuṃdvāra pattavasena kammupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0301n:960_19: Tattha hi tassa ukkhittāsika bhāvova nimittaṃ ahosīti tassa niraye pacitvā puna āsanna maraṇassa taṃkammaṃ
anya-e0301n:960_20: tadā tassa ukkhittāsikasaññaṃ janetvā dvāra pattavasena nimittaṃ ahosīti attho.
anya-e0301n:960_23: Tassa sattassaca apākaṭonāma natthīti tassa paṭisandhiyā gahaṇayogyatā jātāti.
anya-e0301n:960_24: Paccāsanna maraṇassāti antima javanapavattivasena puna āsannamaraṇassa.
anya-e0301n:960_25: Vīthicittā vasānevāti kāmabhavato cavitvā kāmabhaveyeva uppajjamānānaṃ javana pariyosānānaṃvā tadārammaṇa pariyosānānaṃvā vīthicittānaṃ avasāne.
anya-e0301n:960_26: Itaresaṃ pana javanapariyosānānaṃeva vīthicittānaṃ avasāneti attho.
anya-e0301n:960_28: taṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya suddhāyavā javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:962_0: “Tattha kāmabhavato cavitvā tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ tadārammaṇapariyosānāni sesānaṃ javanapariyosānānīti dhammānusāraṇiyaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:963_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vutte kiṃaparipuṇṇāya dhammā nusāraṇiyāti.
anya-e0301n:963_2: Yadi duvidhapīthicittato paraṃ pañcavokāre vatthurūpaṃ catuvokāre cittasantānaṃ dvicittakkhaṇāyusesaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:963_3: Tadā ekassa bhavaṅgassa avasāneti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:963_4: Etthaca somanassa paṭisandhikassa domanassacittena cavantassa āgantukabhavaṅga sambhavo.
anya-e0301n:963_5: Taṃ sambhaveca sati aññabhavaṅgasambhavopi avāri toti suvuttametaṃ bhavaṅgakkhayevāti.
anya-e0301n:963_6: Tasmiṃniruddhāvasāneti tasmiṃ niruddhe tassa niruddhassa avasāne.
anya-e0301n:963_7: Ye pana loke cuti paṭisandhīnaṃ antare eko antarābhavonāma atthi.
anya-e0301n:963_8: Yattha uppanno satto dibbacakkhuko viya iddhimā viya ca khaṇena icchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samattho.
anya-e0301n:963_9: Ito cutā keci tattha uppajjitvā mātāpitu samāgamādīni āgamentā sattāhaṃvā atireka sattāhaṃvā tiṭṭhantīti laddhiṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n:963_12: Yathārahanti kusalabhūtassavā akusalabhūtassa vā saṅkhārassa arahānurūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n:963_13: Avijjātaṇhānusayā kusalabhūtassa appahīnaṭṭhena akusalabhūtassa pana sahajātabhāvenāpi parivārabhūtā mūlabhūtāca hontīti attho.
anya-e0301n:963_19: Avijjānusaya mūlakena taṇhānusaya parikkhittenāti pana vutte suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati.
anya-e0301n:963_22: Taṇhā ca pana sahakāri kāraṇa bhāvena taṃ taṃ saṅkhāraṃ niyojentī pavattatīti saṅkhārassa parivārabhūtā balavaāsanna sahāyabhūtā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:964_0: Etthaca akusalakamma sahajātānaṃvā kammanikanti nimittanikanti sahajātānaṃvā vippaṭisāra saha jātānaṃvā
anya-e0301n:964_1: maraṇāsanna javana sahajātānaṃvā avijjātaṇhānaṃpi dhammato anusayasadisatāya anusaya vohārasambhavo veditabbo.  Apica,
anya-e0301n:964_3: Tasmā idha ekantānusayabhūtāeva pariyattāti kiṃsahajātānaṃ gahaṇenāti.
anya-e0301n:964_4: Teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi taṇhā avijjānaṃ appahīnattāti evaṃ appahīnasaddena ekantānusayāeva gahitāti.
anya-e0301n:964_7: Sopi hi upanissayabhāve na paṭisandhiṃ janetiyevāti. Athavā,
anya-e0301n:964_10: Tadubhayaṃpi hi kammādivisaye khipanaka saṅkhārabhāvena paṭisandhiṃ janetīti.
anya-e0301n:964_11: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṇhā avijjānaṃ appahīnattā avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye taṇhā nāmeti.
anya-e0301n:964_15: Sakalena pana vacanena aggamaggena appahīnā avijjākammādivisayevā bhavantarevā ādīnavaṃ paṭicchādeti,
anya-e0301n:964_16: tathā rūpāyeva taṇhā tadubhayasmiṃ cittasantānaṃ nāmeti.
anya-e0301n:965_0: Sampayuttehi pariggayhamānanti phassādīhi sampayuttadhammehi parivāretvā gayhamānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:965_4: Pada dvayena vijānanadhātuyā ativiya mahānubhāvabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n:965_5: Yathā hi loke ekasmiṃ mahānubhāve purisavisese jāyamāne parivārabhūtā sahajātajanāca tassa upabhoga paribhogabhūtā
anya-e0301n:965_8: Bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasenāti ekasmiṃbhave niruddhe tena saha nirantaraṃ katvā bhavantarassa paṭisandahana vasena.
anya-e0301n:965_9: Uppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti na purimabhave uppajjitvā anirujjhitvā ṭhitibhāvena gantvā bhavantare patiṭṭhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n:965_10: Na hi uppannuppannā dhammā pakatikālepi desantaraṃvā khaṇantaraṃvāsaṅkantā nāma atthi.
anya-e0301n:965_13: Pubbakoṭi napaññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsaratanti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n:965_15: Yesañhi avijjā taṇhāsaṅkhārānaṃ vasena bhavantare paṭisandhi pātubhavati.
anya-e0301n:965_17: so tesaṃ hetuphalasambandhena bhavantaraṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratīti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n:965_18: Tatoyevaca tassā paṭisandhiyā purimabhavapari yāpannehi hetūhi vinā anuppajjanaṃpi siddhaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:966_1: Mandappavattānīti kammadubbalabhāvena vatthudubbalabhāvenaca mandaṃ hutvā pavattāni.
anya-e0301n:966_6: Kāmañcettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ gatinimittaṃnāma nibbattanakaokāse eko vaṇṇo upaṭṭhātīti vatvā sabbesu gatinimittavāresu
anya-e0301n:966_7: gabhinimittaṃ vaṇṇāyatanameva manodvāra gahitameva paccuppannamevaca dassitaṃ.
anya-e0301n:966_8: Tathāpi chadevalokato attano santikaṃ āgate dibbaratheyeva gatinimittaṃ katvā cavantānaṃ dhammikaupāsaka
anya-e0301n:966_9: duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayarājādīnaṃ vasena taṃpi kammanimittaṃviya chabbidhaṃpi chadvāragahitaṃpi paccuppannamatītaṃpi
anya-e0301n:966_10: sambhavatīti adhippāyena taṃkammanimittena nibbisesaṃ katvā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiyā.La.
anya-e0301n:966_12: Tathā cavantā hi dibbavaṇṇopi devatānaṃ ānubhāvena cakkhunā diṭṭhoyeva hoti.
anya-e0301n:966_13: Dibbo rathasaddovā tūriyasaddovā vacanasaddovā sotena sutoyeva.
anya-e0301n:966_15: Nirayato uggatena aggijālena dayhamānakāyena cavantānaṃ devadatta nandayakkha nandamāṇa vakādīnaṃ khuracakke
anya-e0301n:967_0: Pañcadvāre siyā sandhi, vinā kammaṃ dvigocareti.
anya-e0301n:968_1: Yadā pana antima javanavīthito pubbabhāge yathopaṭṭhitaṃ gatinimittaṃ antimajavanassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:968_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana santativasena tassa paccuppannatāva vuttā.
anya-e0301n:968_4: Tathā vaṇṇārammaṇabhāvo manodvārena gahitabhāvoca yebhuyyena vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:968_5: Itarathā kammanimittaṃpi paccuppannabhūtaṃ pañcadvāreeva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitanti taṃpi manodvāragahitaṃ
anya-e0301n:968_6: paccuppannabhūtaṃ pañcārammaṇaṃvā dhammārammaṇaṃvā nasambhavatīti vattabbaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n:968_8: cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantītiādinā paṭṭhāne vuttassa chaḷārammaṇa bhūtassa purejātapaccayassa
anya-e0301n:970_0: Tathā avicāretvā yaṃvuttaṃ “paccuppannārammaṇesu āpātamāgatesu manodvāre gatinimittavasena pañcadvāre kammanimittavasenā”ti.
anya-e0301n:972_0: “Chadvāragahitanti kammanimittaṃ chadvāragahitaṃ gatinimittaṃ chaṭṭhadvāragahitanti yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:973_0: Evañhi sati kammaṃ viya gatinimittaṃpi therena bhinditvā vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n:973_1: Naca taṃ vuttanayena pañcadvāragahitaṃ na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n:975_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ mūla ṭīkādīsuca yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ sāvasesapāṭhaṃ avicāretvā “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana gatinimittaṃ
anya-e0301n:975_1: manodvāre āpātamāgacchatīti vuttattā tadārammaṇāyaca pañcadvārikapaṭisandhiyā adassitattā mūlaṭīkādīsuca
anya-e0301n:975_2: kamma balena upaṭṭhāpitaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassaviya dibba cakkhussa viyaca manodvāreyeva gocarabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:975_3: gacchatīti niyametvā vuttattā tesaṃ vacanaṃ nasampaṭicchanti ācariyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:975_4: Tatthapi asampaṭicchantānaṃ aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi aññatra avicāraṇāyāti.
anya-e0301n:976_0: Paccuppannamatītanti ettha yassa javanāvasānāya pañcadvārikavīthiyā cavanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:976_1: Tassa paṭisandhiyā dvinnañca bhavaṅgānaṃ paccuppannā rammaṇatā upalabbhati.
anya-e0301n:976_4: Yassa pana javanāvasānāya paccuppannārammaṇāya manodvārikavīthiyā cavanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0301n:976_8: Etthaca ārammaṇe bahutarāyuke balavantepi vatthudubbalabhāve sati kāmasattānaṃpi javanāvasānā vīthi hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:976_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tadārammaṇāvasānāya eva yojitattā manodvāre paṭisandhito paraṃ catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0301n:976_11: Tadārammaṇa pariyosānāyavā suddhāyavā javanavīthiyāti vuttattā pana idha javanāvasānāpi yojitāti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n:978_0: Evaṃ avicāretvā yaṃ vuttaṃ “manodvāre tāva paṭisandhiyā catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānañca pañcadvāre paṭisandhiyāeva paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatī”tiādi.
anya-e0301n:979_0: Etthaca yasmā paṭisandhijanakasseva kammassa ārammaṇaṃvā upakaraṇaṃvā kammanimittanti adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0301n:979_2: Tasmā tadā paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ purimabhāgeeva manodvāravasena siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:979_3: Tassaca ārammaṇabhūtameva upakaraṇabhūtamevavā ekantena kammanimittaṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n:979_4: Yaṃ pana pañcadvārikassa antimajavanassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:979_5: Taṃ purimena niruddhena ārammaṇena vatthuto abhinnattāvā tassadisattāvā kammanimittanteva vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n:979_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pañcadvāre āpātaṃ āgacchantaṃ paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ āsannakatakammārammaṇa
anya-e0301n:979_8: Tattha yesu deyyadhammavatthūsu cetiyādīsuvā yehi satthādīhivā pubbe kammaṃ siddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n:979_9: Tesaṃ paccakkhe dharamānataṃ sandhāya santatiyaṃ uppannanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:979_10: Tehi sadi savatthūnaṃ dharamānataṃ sandhāya taṃsadisañcāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:979_12: Yathā taṃ ito parittakena pāpakammena niraye ussadasāmante nibbattānaṃ pubbe puññakaraṇakāle laddhanimittasadisaṃ
anya-e0301n:979_13: nirayaggijālānaṃ saddaṃ sutvāvā vaṇṇaṃ disvāvā puññaṃ saritvā cavitvā sagge nibbattānaṃ aggijālāni viyāti.
anya-e0301n:981_0: Mūlaṭīkāpāṭhaṃ avicāretvā taṃsadisañcātiettha naṭṭhacakāraṃ pāṭhaṃ disvā “manodvārika javanānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena
anya-e0301n:981_1: saha samānattā tadekasantatipatitaṃ cutiāsannajavanagahi taṃpi paccuppannaṃ vaṇṇādikaṃ kammanimitta bhāvena
anya-e0301n:982_1: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ aparassa maraṇasamaye ñātakā ayaṃ tāta tavatthāya buddhapūjā karīyati.
anya-e0301n:982_2: Cittaṃ pasādehīti vatvā pupphadāmadhajapaṭākādivasena rūpārammaṇaṃvā dhammasavanatūriyapūjādi vasena
anya-e0301n:982_3: saddārammaṇaṃvā dhūmavāsagandhādivasena gandhārammaṇaṃvā idaṃ tāva sāyassu,
anya-e0301n:982_4: tavatthāya dātabbaṃ deyyadhammanti vatvā madhuphāṇi tādivasena rasārammaṇaṃvā idaṃ tāva phusassu,
anya-e0301n:982_5: tavatthāya dātabbaṃ deyyadhammanti vatvā cīnapaṭa somārapaṭādivasena phoṭṭhabbā rammaṇaṃvā pañcadvāre upasaṃharantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:982_6: Tattha rūpasaddagandhārammaṇāni sandhāya ṭīkāyaṃ santatiyaṃ uppannanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:982_8: Tāni hi pathamaṃ sāyita phusitāni aññāni honti.
anya-e0301n:982_9: Pacchā dinnāni aññānīti etthaca evaṃ upasaṃhaṭāni rūpārammaṇādīni pathamaṃ pañcadvārena gahetvā acavitvā
anya-e0301n:982_10: pacchā puna atthi dāni evarūpānīti suddhena manodvārena gahetvā cavantānaṃ tāni manodvāragahitāni paccuppannabhūtāni
anya-e0301n:982_12: Pathamatatīyāruppa paṭisandhīnaṃ paññatti bhūtaṃ dutīyacatutthāruppapaṭisandhīnaṃ mahaggatabhūtanti vuttaṃ yathārahanti.
anya-e0301n:982_14: Na ca te tāni puna āyūhantīti vuttaṃ heṭṭhimāruppa vajjitāti.
anya-e0301n:982_15: Pamādapakkhe patitvā vissaṭṭhajjhānānaṃ tatoyevaca appahīnehi orambhāviya saṃyojanehi heṭṭhabhāgaṃ ākaḍḍhita
anya-e0301n:982_16: mānasānaṃ kāmabhave uppajjamānānaṃ tesaṃ thapetvā tihetu kukkaṭṭhabhūtaṃ upacārajjhānacetanaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ
anya-e0301n:982_19: na hi tassa upacārajjhānato balavataraṃnāma kammaṃ atthīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:982_21: Atthīti iminā tato cavantānaṃ upacārajjhānameva paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammanti dīpetīti vuttanti.
anya-e0301n:982_23: Evañca katvā yamakearūpadhātuyā cutassa arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassātivā arūpa dhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassātivā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:982_24: Na pana vuttaṃ arūpadhātuyā cutassa rūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassāti.
anya-e0301n:982_25: Rūpa lokato cavantānaṃ pana aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ okāsaṃ nalabhatīti navattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:982_26: Evaṃsantepi suṭṭhu vikkhambhitanīvaraṇānaṃ tesaṃ appanā pattajjhānavisesena suparibhāvitacittasantānattā
anya-e0301n:982_27: jaccandhādivipatti janakaṃ dvihetukomakakammaṃpi okāsaṃ na labhati.
anya-e0301n:982_28: Kuto apāyagāmikammanti vuttaṃ ahetuka rahitā siyunti.
anya-e0301n:984_0: “Upacārajjhānā nubhāveneva duhetuka tihetuka paṭisandhiyo siyu”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:985_0: Yadi hi taṃ paṭisandhidānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n:985_2: Na hi suṭṭhu vikkhambhitanīvaraṇānaṃ appanāvīthiyaṃ pavattaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ tihetukomakaṃnāma sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n:985_3: Atha kammantarassa upatthambhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n:985_4: Sayaṃ balavatarassapi sato paṭisandhiṃ adatvā dubbalassa kammantarassa upatthambhane kāraṇaṃ natthīti.
anya-e0301n:985_5: Yasmā pana rūpabrahmānaṃ upacārajjhānato aññānipi kāyavacīmanokammakusalāni uppajjantiyeva tāniyevaca
anya-e0301n:985_7: Oḷārikānaṃ pana nīvaraṇānaṃ suṭṭhu vikkhambhitattā savipattikapaṭi sandhijanakāni dvihetukomakāni tesaṃ nuppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:985_8: Aparapariyāya bhūtānica tādisāni tesaṃ okāsaṃ nalabbhanti.
anya-e0301n:985_11: Yenaca te cakkhu sotadvārehipi tato cavanti.
anya-e0301n:985_12: Tasmā ettha upacārajjhānena kāraṇaṃ avatvā vuttanayeneva taṃkāraṇaṃ vattuṃ yuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:985_13: Kāmatihetumhā cutiyā paraṃ sabbā vīsati paṭisandhiyo siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n:985_14: Itarā duhetukāhetukacutito paraṃ kāmesveva bhavesu dasapaṭisandhiyo siyunti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:985_15: Evaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe visayappavattiyā saha vīthimuttacittānaṃ pavattākāraṃ dassetvā idāni pavattikāle paraṃparabhavesuca dassetuṃ iccevantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:985_19: Yāva cuticittuppādāti ettha cutiggahaṇena tadāsanna vīthicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:985_20: Asati vīthicittuppādeti antarantarā vīthicittānaṃ uppattiyā asati.
anya-e0301n:985_22: Tasmiṃti avattamāne pacchājātapaccayarahitānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ vassodaka rahitānaṃ taruṇasassānaṃ viya milāta bhāvapattiyā upapattibhavo occhijjatīti.
anya-e0301n:985_23: Cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati tameva cittanti sambandho.
anya-e0301n:985_24: Yathākkamaṃ eva parivattantā pavattantīti yāva parinibbānacutiyā yathākkamaṃ parivattantā pavattantieva.
anya-e0301n:985_25: Na pana parasamaye viya kadāci katthaci nivattiṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
anya-e0301n:988_3: Yathā iha paṭisandhica bhavaṅgañca āvajjanādi vīthiyoca cuticāti ayaṃ cittasantati pavattati.
anya-e0301n:988_4: Tathā puna bhavantarepi sandhibhavaṅgādikā ayaṃcittasantati parivattati parivattamānā pavattatīti attho.
anya-e0301n:988_5: Idāni yassa vipassanā maggaphalanibbānassa atthāya cittacetasikānaṃ pabhedapavattisaṅgahā paṭṭhapiyanti.
anya-e0301n:988_7: Tattha paṭisaṅkhāyāti paṭisaṅkhāna saṅkhātena vipassanā ñāṇena punappunaṃ ñatvā.
anya-e0301n:988_13: Suṭṭhu anusaya mattaṃpi asesetvā sesakilesehi saddhiṃ ucchinnaṃ yathā vuttesu cittacetasikesu adhisayitaṃ
anya-e0301n:988_14: taṇhāsineha saṅkhātaṃ bandhanaṃ etehīti susamucchinna sineha bandhanā.
anya-e0301n:988_19: Sundaraṃ adhigamāvahaṃ sīla dhutaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ vataṃ etesanti subbatā.
anya-e0301n:988_21: Cirāya subbatā budhā etaṃ adhuvaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya accutaṃ padaṃ adhigantvā susamucchinnasinehabandhanā samaṃ essantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:993_1: Evaṃ cittacetasike dvīhi pabhedappavattīhi dassetvā idāni yathānuppattaṃ rūpaṃ dassento ādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n:993_7: Tāhi saha ye vattanti te sappabhedappavattikā.
anya-e0301n:993_8: Ettāvatā sappabhedappavattikā cittacetasikā dhammā mayā vibhattā.
anya-e0301n:993_17: Salakkhaṇato sasambhāratoca mahantāni hutvā bhavanti pātubhavantīti mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0301n:993_18: Tāni hi attano sabhāvatopi mahantānieva hutvā pātubhavanti upādārūpāni upādāyāti.
anya-e0301n:996_0: Na hi sasambhāravatthuvaseneva tesaṃ ayaṃ vohāro pavattoti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n:996_1: Naca salakkhaṇato mahattena vinā tesaṃ sasambhārato mahattaṃnāma sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n:996_2: Tasmā yaṃ tesaṃ indriyānindriyabaddhasantānesu pathavipabbatādivasena samudde macchakacchapādivasena sasambhārato mahattaṃ.
anya-e0301n:996_4: Mahābhūtātivā loke visaṃvāda kaṭṭhena māyākārāvā āvisanagahaṇesu acinteyyaṭṭhānaṭṭhena yakkhādayovā vañcakaṭṭhena yakkhiniyovā vuccanti.
anya-e0301n:996_5: Tenevaṭṭhena tehi sadisattā imānipi mahābhūtāviyāti mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0301n:996_6: Ubhayatthapica mahantāni abhūtāni abbhutānivā etesūti nibbacanaṃ yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:998_0: Yakkhiniṃ visuṃ upamāmattaṃ katvā “manāpavaṇṇasaṇṭhānā dīhivā sattānaṃ vañcikā yakkhinīādayo viya manāpa
anya-e0301n:998_1: itthipurisarūpadassanādinā sattānaṃ vañcakattā mahantāni abhūtāni etesūti mahābhūtāti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:999_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi mahābhūtasāmaññatoti padassa vitthāre eva māyākāro yakkho yakkhinīti tayo mahābhūtā vuttāti.
anya-e0301n:1001_0: “Upādāya pavattaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:1002_0: Na hi imasmiṃ pāṭhe katthaci yakāraviraho diṭṭho.
anya-e0301n:1002_1: Tathā hi mūlaṭīkāyaṃ upādāyati nissayatīti upādāyaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1002_4: Sahajātarūpānaṃ patiṭṭhāna bhāvena pakkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti attho.
anya-e0301n:1002_7: Ayaṃ tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānā patiṭṭhānā vatthubhūtā bhūmi bhūtātiādinā nānāppakārena guṇapadena abhitthavīyatīti pathavī.
anya-e0301n:1002_10: appāyati vā tāni suṭṭhu brūheti vaḍḍhetīti āpo.
anya-e0301n:1002_11: Tānivā avippakiṇṇāni katvā bhuso pāti rakkhati,
anya-e0301n:1002_12: pivativā vivanto viya tāni saṅgaṇhati sampiṇḍetīti āpo.
anya-e0301n:1002_14: Te jati tikkhabhāvena samujjalanto viya sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhe pakāsati,
anya-e0301n:1002_15: tejetivā niseti sahajātadhamme tikkhathāma bale karoti,
anya-e0301n:1002_18: Vāyati samīreti desantaruppatti hetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghāṭaṃ desantaraṃ gametīti vāyo.
anya-e0301n:1002_19: Vāyati vā sahajātadhamme apatamāne katvā vahatīti vāyo.
anya-e0301n:1002_28: mudubhūtāpi pana sā sesabhūtattayaṃ upādāya kakkhaḷā tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:1002_29: Aññamaññaṃ upādāyeva pana ayaṃmudu ayaṃ kakkhaḷāti bhavati.
anya-e0301n:1002_30: Teneva mudukakkhaḷānaṃ dīgharassānaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānatā hoti.
anya-e0301n:1002_31: Mudubhūtāpi hi tato mudutaraṃ patvā kakkhaḷānāma jātā.
anya-e0301n:1002_34: Soca pakatiudake adhimattoti pakatiudakaṃ baddhaṃ ghanībhūtameva siyāti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n:1002_36: yattha pana pathavī balavatī hoti tattheva so baddhataraṃ ābandhatīti.
anya-e0301n:1002_38: Evañcasati sītabhāvo tejoyeva na siyāti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n:1002_39: Usati dahati paripāceti pariṇa tabhāvaṃ gametīti uṇhonāma.
anya-e0301n:1002_44: So pana ghana thaddhesu silāthambhādīsu nalabbhatīti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n:1002_45: Tattha hi pathavī attanā sahajātavāyuvitthambhanaṃ labhitvā thāmappattā thiratarappattāca hutvā vahatīti.
anya-e0301n:1002_48: Rūpaṃvā assādeti āpātaṃ āgatāgatassa rūpassa anirākaraṇato.
anya-e0301n:1002_55: Tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā. Athavā.
anya-e0301n:1002_56: Jīvitaṃ vahati etāyavā taṃ vahanti pavattenti jīvitavuttisampādanattāti jivhā.
anya-e0301n:1003_0: Purisassa hi jātassa, kudārī jāyate mukhe;
anya-e0301n:1004_0: Yāya chindati attānaṃ, naro dubbhāsitaṃ bhaṇanti.
anya-e0301n:1005_0: Idha pana taṃ sahacaritattā jivhāti pasādarūpamo vuccati.
anya-e0301n:1005_1: Kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ pāpadhammānañca āyo uppattiṭṭhānanti kāyo.
anya-e0301n:1005_3: Idha pana taṃ sahacarito pasāda kāyoeva adhippeto.
anya-e0301n:1005_5: Pasīdanti vā ettha candamaṇḍalādīni ārammaṇanimittāni tattha saṃsīdamānāni viya sarūpato sandissantīti pasādā,
anya-e0301n:1005_7: Ime pana pañca daṭṭhukāmatādi nidāna kammasamuṭṭhāna bhūtapasāda lakkhaṇā rūpādi abhighātāraha bhūtapasādalakkhaṇā vā cakkhupasādādayo daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:1005_8: Tattha cakkhu tāva setamaṇḍala parikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe ūkāsirapamāṇe atimukhe ṭhitānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1005_9: sarīrasaṇṭhānuppatti padesabhūte diṭṭhamaṇḍale telamiva sattapicupaṭalāni sattaakkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n:1005_10: Sotaṃ sotabilabbhantare aṅguliveṭhanākāraṃ upacitatanutambalomaṃ padesaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n:1005_11: Ghānaṃ nāsikabbhantare ajapadasaṇṭhānaṃ padesaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n:1005_12: Jivhā sasambhāra jivhāmajjhe uppala dalagga saṇṭhānaṃ padesaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n:1005_13: Kāyo pana mahanti yā kappāsa paṭalavaṭṭiyaṃ āsittatelaṃviya thapetvā pācaka tejassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1005_14: kesagga lomagga nakhagga sukkhacammānica avasesaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0301n:1005_15: Te pana pañca yathārahaṃ pañcadvārikacittānaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhenti.
anya-e0301n:1005_16: Tesuca ekekassa catasso catasso dhātuyo sandhāraṇaābandhana paripācana samudīraṇa kiccehi upakāraṃ karonti.
anya-e0301n:1005_17: Yathākhatti yakumārassa catasso dhātiyo dhāraṇa nahāpana maṇḍana bījana kiccehīti.
anya-e0301n:1005_19: Yathā taṃ khattiyakumāraṃ pitu jeṭṭhabhātu jeṭṭhabhaginiyoviya.
anya-e0301n:1005_21: Yathā taṃ khattiyakumāraṃ disāpāmokkho rājasammato mahābhisakkoviya.
anya-e0301n:1005_23: Yathā taṃ khattiyakumāraṃ sahajātā amaccaputtā viyāti.
anya-e0301n:1005_24: Yasmā pana sattānaṃ cittaṃ nāma vicittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1005_31: Tehi pasādamaṇḍabhūtāpi samānā keci rūpasseva abhighātārahā honti,
anya-e0301n:1005_35: Tasmā tesaṃ aññamaññañca aññarūpehica lakkhaṇato asaṃmissatā veditabbāti.
anya-e0301n:1006_2: Pakatiyāpi vā yaṃkiñcidabbaṃ samavisamaṃvā pakāse tīti attho.
anya-e0301n:1006_5: Taṃ taṃ atthaṃvā attano vatthuṃvā ācikkhatīti attho.
anya-e0301n:1006_6: Sadativā taṃ taṃ disaṃvā desaṃvā khaṇena vissarati vippharatīti saddo.
anya-e0301n:1006_14: Phusanañcettha pasādena saha ghaṭṭanaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi saddhiṃ paṭihananañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1006_15: Tadubhayaṃpi āpo dhātuyā natthīti vuttaṃ āpodhātuvivajjitanti.
anya-e0301n:1006_17: Nanu sītatāvā dravatāvā phusitvā gayhatīti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n:1006_20: Pakkumite santatte loharasepissa sītatā labbhamānā siyā.
anya-e0301n:1006_23: Tasmā sā tejoyeva, na āpoti. Apica,
anya-e0301n:1006_24: sītuṇhānaṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe saha appavattanato orapārānaṃ viya tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānatoca viññāyati.
anya-e0301n:1006_28: Pacchā tato sītatare āgate tasmiṃyeva puna uṇhasaññā saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0301n:1007_0: Atha pana dravabhāvabhūto āpo phusitvā gayhati.
anya-e0301n:1007_2: Evañca sati yathā tesu itarāni tīṇi bhūtāni vinā itarītarena visuṃ visuṃ kāyika sukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāni honti.
anya-e0301n:1007_3: Tathā sopi vinā itarehi visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtoeva siyā.
anya-e0301n:1007_5: Yañhi tāni ayopiṇḍādīni phusantānaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃvā dukkhaṃvā uppajjati,
anya-e0301n:1007_9: Tasmā purimabhāge tīṇi bhūtāni phusitvāvā vaṇṇaṃ disvāvā pacchā bhāge suddhena mano viññāṇasantānena
anya-e0301n:1007_10: dīgharassādisaṇṭhānaṃvā rattiyaṃ alātacakkaṃ vā taṃtaṃchiddavivaraṃvā jānantā viya pathamaṃ dravatāsahitāni
anya-e0301n:1007_11: vilīnāni mudūni tīṇi bhūtāni pathaviṃ eva vā phusitvā pacchā suddhena mano viññāṇasantānena visuṃ dravabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:1007_13: Evaṃ santepi taṃ phusitvā jānantā icceva maññanti avisesavidunoti.
anya-e0301n:1007_19: Teyeva idha ekattaṃ upanetvā gocararūpanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1007_20: Imānipana pañca yathākkamaṃ cakkhādīsu paṭihanana lakkhaṇāni rūpādīnīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0301n:1008_1: Yassa pana dhammassa ānubhāvena taṃ tathā saṇṭhāti pavattati.
anya-e0301n:1008_5: Tattha itthiliṅga itthinimitta itthi kutta itthākappānaṃ hetubhāva lakkhaṇaṃ itthattaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1008_6: Purisaliṅga purisanimitta purisakutta purisākappānaṃ hetubhāva lakkhaṇaṃ purisattaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1008_17: Yasmā panettha saṇṭhānādīnaṃ avisadādibhāvoeva atthato itthipurisatā hoti.
anya-e0301n:1008_19: Soca akkharapada saṅkhātesu vacanesu ca vacanatthesuca yathārahaṃ sandissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1008_20: Tasmā indriyarahitesupi padesuca rukkhādīsu padatthesuca pariyāyena itthipumanapuṃsakatāsiddhi veditabbāti.
anya-e0301n:1010_0: “Itthīnaṃ aṅgajātaṃ itthiliṅga”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:1011_0: Na hi katthaci pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsuca nimittasaddoviya liṅgasaddo aṅgajāte pākaṭo diṭṭhoti.
anya-e0301n:1014_0: Na hi liṅgasaddo viya ākappasaddo saṇṭhāne pākaṭo diṭṭhoti.
anya-e0301n:1014_1: Sesaṃpana tattha vuttaṃ yaṃkiñci aṭṭhakathāya asamentaṃpi tena pariyāyena yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1014_2: Bhavanti pavattanti taṃsahite khandhasantāne esā itthī,
anya-e0301n:1014_3: eso purisoti evaṃ pavattā sadda buddhiyo etenāti bhāvo bhavantivā pātubhavanti taṃsahite khandhasantāne liṅgādīni etasmiṃ satīti bhāvo.
anya-e0301n:1014_5: Hadanti sattā taṃtaṃatthaṃvā anatthaṃvā pūrenti etenāti hadayaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1014_6: Hadantivā sattā ito nānāvikakke osajanti muñcantīti hadayaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1014_7: Harantivā pariharanti taṃ sattā jīvitaṃviya dayanti rakkhanticāti hadayaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1014_8: Vasanti nivasanti cittaceta sikādhammā etthāti vatthu.
anya-e0301n:1014_11: Taṃ pana hadayakosabbhantare aḍḍhapasatamattaṃ lohitaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1014_12: Dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ pana desanābhedarakkhanatthaṃ avatvā paṭṭhāneeva taṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n:1014_15: Etthaca chahi vatthūhi aññaṃ vatthunāma natthi.
anya-e0301n:1014_16: Tesuca purimāni pañca kusalādīnaṃ nissayāeva na honti.
anya-e0301n:1014_17: Tasmā tesaṃ nissayabhāvena tattha vuttaṃ vatthunāma visuṃ ekaṃ vatthurūpamevāti siddhanti.
anya-e0301n:1016_0: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyāti pāṭhassa uddhaṭattā rūpasāmaññapasaṅgo hotīti taṃ visodhetuṃ yuttināma vuttā.
anya-e0301n:1016_1: Paṭṭhāne pana bahūsu anaññasādhāraṇesu ṭhānesu vatthunāmena visesetvā vuttattā sopasaṅgo natthiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1017_1: Tesaṃ jīvane ādhipaccayogena tesu indaṃ issaraṃ attānaṃ karotīti indriyaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1017_4: Yathā hi bījanibbattāni uppalādīni bījevinaṭṭhepi udakānupālitāni ciraṃpi kālaṃ jīvanti.
anya-e0301n:1017_5: Evamevaṃ niruddha kammanibbattāni kammajarūpāni kamme asantepi jīvitānupālitāni santativasena vassasataṃpi
anya-e0301n:1017_7: tathā hi jīvitarahitāni itararūpāni jīvantānināma nahonti.
anya-e0301n:1017_8: Tāni hi yena ekena cittenavā utunāvā āhārenavā jāyanti.
anya-e0301n:1017_11: Tesu hi cittajarūpānaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ ekavīthi ekajavanavāra ekasamāpattivārena paricchinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1017_12: Utujāhārajānañca sabhāgeka utuāhāra vasena paricchinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1017_19: Tānipi hi asati vīthicittuppāde yāvajīvaṃpi ekasantativasena pavattissantiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1017_20: Itarāni pana yassa ārammaṇassa āpātāgatattā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:1017_21: Tasmiṃ niruddhe tadabhāvepi tadārammaṇā bahū cittasantatiyo jīvitassaaddhānapharaṇānubhāvena pavattantiyeva. Apica,
anya-e0301n:1017_22: yāvakhandhaparinibbānā anantarapaccayupanibandhena abbocchinnaṃ pavattamānāya cittasantatiyāvasenapi ayamattho vattabbo.
anya-e0301n:1019_0: Āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādiyeva uppattiyāpi ṭhitiyāpi kāraṇaṃ hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n:1019_2: Kamma jānaṃ pana kammaṃ uppattiyāeva kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0301n:1019_5: Jīvitena pana anupālitattā eva tesaṃ khaṇaṭṭhiti siddhāti iminā dhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyīnaṃpi
anya-e0301n:1019_7: Na hi tesaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitikāraṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1019_8: Āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya kammassa taṅkhaṇābhāva toti”.
anya-e0301n:1020_2: Itarathā uppādakkhaṇe labbhamānānaṃ upacayasantatīnaṃ viya ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhamānāya jaratāyapi kutocisamuṭṭhānatā pāḷiyaṃ vuttā siyāti. Apica,
anya-e0301n:1020_4: Na hi uppannā dhammā paccayavekallena attano khaṇesu paripuṇṇaṃ aṭṭhatvā antarāva bhijjantīti atthi.
anya-e0301n:1020_5: Naca paccayādhimattena atire kataraṃ tiṭṭhantīti atthi.
anya-e0301n:1020_6: Tasmā khaṇaṭṭhitiyaṃ upatthambhayamānāpi āhārādayo anupālayamānañca jīvitaṃ pacchā balavarūpasantati pavattiatthāyaeva upatthambhenti pāletica.
anya-e0301n:1020_8: Ettāvatā sabbesaṃpi khaṇaṭṭhitināma dharamānajanakāyattā vā jīvitāyattāvā nahotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1020_9: Yadi pana taṃ santatipavattimeva sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā,
anya-e0301n:1020_11: Aṭṭha kathāyaṃpi santepica anupālana lakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ tedhamme pāletītiādivacane yathāsantatiṭṭhiti labbhati.
anya-e0301n:1020_13: Idaṃ pana pācakagginā saha sakalaṃ upādinnakasarīraṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0301n:1020_19: kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ attabhāvaṃ bhuso harati addhānaṃ pavattetīti āhāro.
anya-e0301n:1020_20: Khajja bhojjādike kabaḷīkāre āhāro tannissitattā tappariyā pannattācāti kabaḷīkārāhāro.
anya-e0301n:1020_21: Imasmiṃatthe sati nibbattita ojā eva labbhati.
anya-e0301n:1020_22: Atthato pana aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sārabhūto upatthambhabalakāro bhūtanissito paramasiniddhasi neho idha āhārarūpaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1020_23: Tattha aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassāti ajjhoharitvā āmāsaye patiṭṭhitāni āhāravatthūni pācakatejena vivecitāni rasādibhāvena pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0301n:1020_24: Tattha paṇīta siniddha lahuka sineha koṭṭhāso rasonāma.
anya-e0301n:1020_26: So pācaka tejabalena tato uttaritvā rasaharaṇidhamanijālānusārena heṭṭhāca uddhañca sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni
anya-e0301n:1020_28: Tassa sārabhūto upatthambhaṃ balaṃ karotīti upatthambhabalakāro.
anya-e0301n:1020_29: So hi āmāsaye patiṭṭhita mattova sakalasarīre bhūtesu upatthambhakabalaṃ janetīti.
anya-e0301n:1022_0: “Aṅgamaṅgā nasāri rasahara saṅkhātāti” pāṭho. So duppāṭho.
anya-e0301n:1023_11: Aññāpadesarahitena kakkhaḷattādinā attano bhāvena siddhaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvarūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_12: Uppādādinā aniccatādināca saṅkhahalakkhaṇena sahitaṃ rūpaṃ salakkhaṇarūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_13: Ujukatova kammādīhi paccayehi nipphāditaṃ rūpaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_16: Saṅkhatalakkhaṇayutta tāya aniccatādikaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā sammasanārahaṃ rūpaṃ sammasanarūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_17: Te te dabbasambhārāvā rūpakalāpāvā visuṃvisuṃ bhuso kāsanti pakāsanti etenāti ākāso.
anya-e0301n:1023_20: Parito samantato chindati kalāpantarabhūtāni kalāpantara bhūtehi saddhiṃ asaṃmissaṃ ekattaṃ anupagamanaṃ karotīti paricchedo.
anya-e0301n:1023_21: Tehivā paricchindīyati attanovā paresaṃvā akatvāmajjhe visuṃ thapīyati.
anya-e0301n:1023_25: Vikāralakkhaṇarūpāni hi asabhāvadhammabhūtānipi taṃtaṃ rūpakalāpesu sandissamānatā taṃtaṃrūpakalāpapakkhikānieva honti.
anya-e0301n:1023_26: Ayaṃ pana tehi rūpa kalāpehi sabbaso vimuttabhāvena bahibhūtattā kassaci rūpa kalāpassa pakkhabhūto na hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1023_27: Asabhāvadhammattāca pana kenaci rūpena phusana pariyāyopi tassa sabbaso natthīti katvā so asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti pāḷiyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0301n:1023_28: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ghanapiṇḍavatthūsu paṭighaphoṭṭhabbasabhāvānaṃ nānā kalāpagatabhūtānaṃ aññamaññasaṃphuṭṭhatā
anya-e0301n:1023_29: atthīti katvā asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti etehi asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ ajaṭākāsaṃ kaṃthitanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_30: Ṭīkāyaṃ pana ayaṃ niddeso ajaṭākāsaniddeso nahoti,
anya-e0301n:1023_35: Tattha asaṃphuṭṭhatānāma yuttā siyāti adhippāyena abyāpikatā hi asaṃphuṭṭhatāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_36: Atthato pana nānākalāpagatānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pariyantatā saṅkhāto antarāḷadhammo.
anya-e0301n:1023_38: Yā pana calamānena kāyaṅgena attānañca attasamaṅgino puggalassa adhippāyañca paccakkhe ṭhite jane viññāpeti pākaṭaṃ katvā dasseti.
anya-e0301n:1023_39: Sayañca tena kāyaṅgena tehi janehi viññāyati.
anya-e0301n:1023_41: Yā uccārīyamānena vācaṅgena saddena attānañca attasamaṅgino puggalassa adhippāyañca sotapathe ṭhite jane viññāpeti.
anya-e0301n:1023_44: viññāpenti janā viññāyantivā janehi aññamaññassa cittāni etāyāti viññatti.
anya-e0301n:1023_45: Sasambhāre aṅgapaccaṅgabhūte kāye pavattā viññatti kāyaviññatti.
anya-e0301n:1023_46: Copana kāyasaṅkhāto kāyo evavā viññatti kāyaviññatti.
anya-e0301n:1023_48: Copanavācā saṅkhātā vācā evavā viññatti vacīviññatti.
anya-e0301n:1023_49: Tattha cittavasena yaṃkiñci kāyaṅgavikāraṃ karontassa taṃtaṃaṅgaṃ santambhantā sandhārentā cālentā aṅgamaṅgānusārisaṅkhātā
anya-e0301n:1023_51: Uppajjantāca yathāvā tathāvā anuppajjitvā yassa tehi cittajavātakalāpeti sahajātassa copanakāyassa ānubhāvena
anya-e0301n:1023_56: Yathā hi niyāmako nāvāya mūlabhāge ṭhatvā ekaṃ mahāphiyaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā nadisote cāretvā sakalaṃ mahānāvaṃ icchitadisābhimukhaṃ niyojeti.
anya-e0301n:1023_57: Na yaṃvā taṃvā disaṃ gantuṃ deti.
anya-e0301n:1023_59: Ekacittakkhaṇikā hi viññatti tesaṃ mūlabhāgeeva labbhamānā te yathādhippetadisābhimukhe evaṃ katvā niyojetīti sā niyāmakasadisī hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1023_61: Ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu javanesu pathama javanasamuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu attanā sahajātarūpakāyaṃ saṃthambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n:1023_64: Sattamacittena pana samuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā chahicittehi samuṭṭhitaṃ vāyodhātuṃ upatthambhanapaccayaṃ
anya-e0301n:1023_65: labhitvāattanāsahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ saṃthambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ cāletuṃ abhikkamāpetuṃ sakkotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_66: Taṃ abhikkamāmīti kāyaṃ paggaṇhantānaṃ anekasahassesu javana vāresu pavattamānesu yasmiṃvāre calanasaṅkhātaṃ desantarapāpanaṃ jāyati,
anya-e0301n:1023_70: iddhimantānaṃ iddhiyāgamanaṃ viya sabbesaṃpi sīghataraṃ gamanaṃ paññāyeyya. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n:1023_72: Ayañca attho upari akkharuppattivicāraṇāyaṃ pākaṭo bhavissatīti.
anya-e0301n:1023_73: Tasmā tato purimavāresu saṃthambhanasandhāraṇānieva sampajjantīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_75: sāpi nānājavanavīthīsu samuṭṭhitānaṃ vāyodhātūnaṃ aparāparaṃ upatthambhaneca yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1023_76: Tathā hi calanacittajarūpasantatiyaṃ pavattāni utujarūpasaṅghāṭānipi viññattisahitāni viya tadākāravantāni savegāni savipphārānieva pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:1023_77: Tasmā pubbāparapavattānaṃ nānā javanavīthīnaṃ antarantarā bhavaṅgasamayesupi abhikkamanādikaṃ calanaṃ sampajjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1023_78: Ekābaddhapavattānica catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānināma ekassa visaye itarāni ekasamuṭṭhānāni viya sabbaso tadanu
anya-e0301n:1023_79: parivattīni hontīti cittaje calante itarānipi calanti yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_80: Calanañcettha pacchimapacchimānaṃ rūpakalāpasaṅghāṭānaṃ purima purimānaṃ uppannadesato desantare yathāpavattasannivesākārena
anya-e0301n:1023_82: Na hi rūpārūpadhammānaṃ uppanna dese anirujjhitvā kesaggamattaṃpi desantara saṅkamanaṃnāma atthi.
anya-e0301n:1023_83: Itarathā khaṇikadhammatā abyāpāradhammatā avasavattitāca tesaṃ nasiyāti.
anya-e0301n:1023_84: Yaṃkiñci vacībhedaṃ karontassa kaṇṭhaṭṭhānādi gataupādinnaka pathavīdhātūsu calamānakaṇṭhapadesādigatacittaja
anya-e0301n:1023_85: pathavīdhātūnaṃ saṅghaṭṭanasaṅkhātena ṭhānakaraṇasannipātena sahevayo vacīghosasaṅkhāto cittajasaddo jāyati.
anya-e0301n:1023_86: So yena attanā saha jātena ākāravikārena yathādhippāyaṃ taṃtaṃ vaṇṇavisesattaṃ upagacchati.
anya-e0301n:1023_87: Yenaca suṇantānaṃ taṃtaṃatthajotako akkharasannipātabhūto padabyañjanaviseso upalabbhati.
anya-e0301n:1023_89: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tassā pana cittasamuṭṭhānāya pathavīdhātuyā upādinnaghaṭṭanassa paccayabhūto eko ākāravikāro vacī viññattināmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_90: Tattha upādinnaghaṭṭanassa paccayabhūtoti kammajabhūtāya catujabhūtāyaevavā upādinnapathavīdhātuyā sahaghaṭṭanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1023_92: Ghaṭṭanassa paccayo pana calamānakaṇṭhapadesādivikārabhūto kāyaṅgavisesoeva siyā.
anya-e0301n:1023_94: Etthaca upādinnakapathavīhi saha ghaṭṭanaṃ cittajapathavīnaṃ kiccaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_95: Yaṃ pana tāsaṃ yathāvā tathāvā aghaṭṭetvā yathā icchitakkharaṃ sampajjati.
anya-e0301n:1023_98: Ghaṭṭanena saheva uppannasaddānaṃ taṃtaṃvaṇṇatta pattiyā vidahanameva vacīviññattiyā kiccaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_104: Etthaca yadetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ idaṃ vakkhāmi etaṃ vakkhāmīti uppajjamānaṃ cittaṃ aṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n:1023_105: Tesaṃ abbhantare citta samuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu upādinnakaṃ ghaṭṭayamānāva uppajjati.
anya-e0301n:1023_106: Tena dhātughaṭṭanena saheva saddo uppajjatītica purimacittasamuṭṭhā nāya upatthambhanakiccaṃpi natthītica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_107: Taṃpi anekasatesu javanavāresu pavattamānesu yasmiṃvāre paribyattaṃ akkharaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0301n:1023_109: Teneva hi mūla ṭīkāyaṃ upatthambhanakiccaṃ natthi laddhāsevanena citteneva ghaṭṭanassa balavabhāvatoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1023_110: Etthaca laddhāsevanenāti etena pubbabhāge nānājavanavīthīhi laddhāsevanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n:1023_112: Naca ekajavana vāramattena paribyattaṃ ekakkharaṃ sampajjatīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n:1023_113: tassa ekadviaccharakkhaṇamattena kālena vattabbattā ekaccharakkhaṇeca anekasatasahassānaṃ javanavīthīnaṃ pavattisambhavato.
anya-e0301n:1025_0: Timatto tu gīto ñeyyo, byañjanā aḍḍhamattikāti.
anya-e0301n:1026_0: Milindapañheca sādhike vīhivāhasate vīhibījāni ekaccharakkhaṇe uppannassa cittassa kalaṃpi naupenti.
anya-e0301n:1026_2: Ekakkharaṃ uccārentassaca tattakaṃpi kālaṃ uccāraṇacittabyāpāro sandissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1026_3: Naca paramatthato ekameva saddaṃ uccāremītivā suṇomītivā sakkā niyametvā uccāretuṃ sotuñca.
anya-e0301n:1026_4: Tathā niyamentassapi saddānaṃ pubbāparato anekasatasahassasseva uccāraṇa savana sambhavato.
anya-e0301n:1026_5: Ekamevāti abhimāno pana samūhaghana santatighanehi paṭicchannattāeva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1026_6: Sesamettha kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttana yena yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbanti.
anya-e0301n:1026_7: Etthaca viññattisaddo kāyena viññāpeti vācāya viññāpetītiādisu bodhanattho.
anya-e0301n:1026_10: Evañhi sati paraṃ bodhetukāmatārahi tesu sabbesu kāyaṅgavācaṅgacopanesupi pavattakaviññattiyā labbhamānatā veditabbā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1026_11: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana paraṃ bodhetukāmatāya vināpi abhikkamanādipavattanena so citta sahabhūvikāro adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti.
anya-e0301n:1026_13: tattha dvīsu bodhanaviññattīsu purimā kāyaviññatti aṅgapaccaṅgassa calamānavaṇṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā
anya-e0301n:1026_14: calamānaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ kāyaviññāṇavīthiyā gahetvā pacchā suddhena manodvārikajavanenaeva viññāyati pacchimāca
anya-e0301n:1026_15: vacīviññatti uccāriyamānaṃ saddaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā gahetvā pacchā suddhena manodvārikajavanenaeva viññāyati,
anya-e0301n:1026_17: Sā hi attānaṃ jānanteeva parasatte attanā samaṅgino puggalassa cittaṃ viññāpeti,
anya-e0301n:1026_19: Ñāpaka hetu hi nāma attānaṃ jānanteeva ñāpetabbaṃ ñāpeti,
anya-e0301n:1026_21: Evañca katvā kāyaṅga copanaṃ disvāvā parāmasitvāvā saddaṃ sutvāvā parassa taṃtaṃadhippāyaṃ jānantānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1026_22: tiracchāna gatānaṃpi pathadhaṃ viññattijānanaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0301n:1026_24: Viññattiṃ jānantānaṃca purimasiddhasaṅketa sambandha jānanena vinā adhippāyajānanaṃ na sambhavatīti majjhe
anya-e0301n:1026_26: dvīsu pana pavattakaviññattīsu paraṃ abhikkamantaṃ cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā disvā abhikkamanaviññattiñca abhikkamanacittañca manoviññāṇavīthiyā jānanti.
anya-e0301n:1026_28: Tathā parassa kathaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā sutvā kathanaviññattiñca kathanacittañca manoviññāṇavīthiyā jānanti.
anya-e0301n:1026_29: Paraṃ rattacittena kāyaṅgaṃ cālentaṃ disvā calanaviññattiñca rāgacittañca jānanti.
anya-e0301n:1026_30: Rattassa kathaṃ sutvā kathana viññattiñca rāgacittañca jānanti.
anya-e0301n:1027_3: Aññamaññaṃ avijahantiyopi etā viruddhapaccayasappāya paccayānaṃ vasena asaṃmissato veditabbā.
anya-e0301n:1027_4: Tathā hi attano kāyaviruddhaṃ utuṃvā āhāraṃvā cittakriyaṃvā sevantānaṃ sarīragatā dhātuyo kadāci sakalasarīraṃvā
anya-e0301n:1027_5: sarīrekadesaṃvā khobhetvā visesato pūtimukha sappasaṅkhātaāpo pariyuṭṭhānaṃ katvā kāyaṃ asayhabhāraṃ
anya-e0301n:1027_9: Puna attano sarīrasappāyaṃ utuṃvā āhāraṃvā cittakiriyaṃvā sevantānaṃ so dhātukkhobho vūpasammati.
anya-e0301n:1027_14: Visesanato panettha mudubhāyaṃ kaṭṭhamukhasappasaṅkhāta pathavīpariyuṭṭhānaṃ katvā sukkhakaṭṭhaṃviya kāyaṃ thaddhaṃ kakkhaḷaṃkaronti.
anya-e0301n:1027_15: Iriyāpathaparivattane aṅgamaṅgānaṃchijjanabhijjanākārapattaṃ thaddhaṃ kakkhaḷanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādentīti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1027_16: Kammaññatāyaṃ satthamukhasappasaṅkhāta vāyo pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vāyovisamaṃ katvā dāmarikacorapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0301n:1027_19: Tejodhātu pana tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃpi mūlabhūtā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n:1028_0: Imā pana arogino kallabhāvoviya suparimadditacammassa mudubhāvoviya sudandhasuvaṇṇassa kammakkhamabhāvoviya
anya-e0301n:1028_1: rūpakāyassa iriyāpathaparivattane sallahukatādivasena sandissamānā visesākārā hontīti katvā vikārarūpaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n:1028_6: Ayañhi upasaddo upaññattantiādīsu viya pathamattho upasittantiādīsu viyaca upari atthoti.
anya-e0301n:1028_7: Vuttañca mūlaṭīkāyaṃ upasaddo pathamattho upariatthoca hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1028_14: Yathā pavattānaṃ āyatanānaṃ addhānapūraṇavasena pavattīti attho.
anya-e0301n:1028_15: Tattha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpānaṃ uppādo pathamānibbattiatthena upacayonāma.
anya-e0301n:1028_16: Tato paraṃ yāva sabbapathamaṃ uppannānaṃ cakkhu sota ghānajivhānaṃ uppādo,
anya-e0301n:1028_17: etthantare rūpānaṃ uppādo upari vaḍḍhiatthena upacayonāma.
anya-e0301n:1028_18: Tato paraṃ yāvajīvaṃ catusantatirūpānaṃ uppādo santatināma.
anya-e0301n:1028_19: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nadītīre nikhātakūpasmiṃ udakuggamanakāloviya ācayo nibbatti.
anya-e0301n:1031_0: Saṃsedajopavātikānaṃ pana paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpānaṃ uppādo pathamā bhinibbatti atthena paripuṇṇa vaḍḍhi atthenaca upacayo nāma,
anya-e0301n:1031_1: tato paraṃ rūpānaṃ uppādo santatināma. Apica,
anya-e0301n:1031_2: tisamuṭṭhānika rūpānaṃpi visuṃ visuṃ santatipaccuppannaṃnāma atthi.
anya-e0301n:1031_3: Tassaca ekekassa nibbatti vaḍḍhi pavatti vasena tisso tissoavatthā honti.
anya-e0301n:1031_4: Tattha ekekasantatiyaṃ ādimhi santatisīsarūpānaṃ sabbapathamaṃ uppādo nibbattināma.
anya-e0301n:1031_9: Saṅkhepato pana loke sabbāsu indriyānindriyabaddharūpapavattīsu sandissamāne jāyana vaḍḍhana pavattanasaṅkhāte
anya-e0301n:1031_14: Vaḍḍhane samatte avaḍḍhitvā pabandhavasena pavattitvā bhijjantīti.
anya-e0301n:1031_18: Uppādajarābhaṅgehi niccalati nakampatīti nicco asaṅkhata dhammo.
anya-e0301n:1033_0: “Niccadhuvabhāvena na iccaṃ anugantabbanti anicca”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:1034_1: So eva idha nakārayutto aniccoti vuttoti.
anya-e0301n:1034_2: Lakkhīyanti sallakkhīyanti vinicchīyanti dhammā ime saṅkhatāti etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1034_4: aṅguttare tīṇi māni bhikkhave saṅkhatassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0301n:1034_10: Tasmā sāpi idha vattabbāti vuttaṃ jātirūpamevātiādi.
anya-e0301n:1034_14: upacaya santati nāmenapavuccati tassājātiyātathā avatthābhedayogatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n:1034_15: Sā hi ādito paṭisandhirūpāni pātubhavantāni karoti.
anya-e0301n:1034_17: Pūritāni ca dīghaṃpi addhānaṃ abbocchinnaṃ katvā pavatteti pabandhayatīti.
anya-e0301n:1034_18: Ekā dasavidhaṃpīti mahābhūtādibhāvena ekattaṃ upanayanavasena ekā dasapabhedaṃpi.
anya-e0301n:1034_19: Kathaṃ sarūpavasena aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ hotīti pucchitvā bhūtappasāda visayātiādinā ekādasavidhasseva sarūpato
anya-e0301n:1034_20: dassanaṃ antogadhabhedānaṃ pubbe vuttabhāvena supākaṭattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha-
anya-e0301n:1035_0: Cattāri bhūtāni pañcapasādā agahitagahaṇena cattāro visayā gocarā.
anya-e0301n:1035_3: Iti idaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitāhārarūpehi saha aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ hoti tathā eko paricchedo.
anya-e0301n:1035_6: Catubbidhaṃ lakkhaṇanti dasa anipphannācāti rūpaṃ sarūpato aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ bhaveti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:1035_7: Etthaca pacchimāni dasarūpāni sabhāvato anupalabbhamānattā paccayehi nipphāditāni rūpāni na hontīti anipphannāni nāma.
anya-e0301n:1035_8: Api cettha abhidhamme visuṃ uddiṭṭhāni niddiṭṭhānica etāni sabhāvato anupalabbhamānānīti vā paramatthato avijjamānānītivā nasakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n:1035_9: Vohārasiddha mattabhāvaṃ atikkamma tādisena suddhadhammagatiyā siddhena paramattha lakkhaṇena upaladdhattā.
anya-e0301n:1035_10: Itarathā nibbattilakkhaṇarahitaṃ asaṅkhata nibbānaṃpi sabhāvato anupalabbhamānaṃ paramatthato avijjamānañca nāma siyāti.
anya-e0301n:1036_1: Rūpavibhāgesabbañca pana etaṃ yathāsamuddiṭṭhaṃ aṭṭhavīsati vidhaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṭṭhena ekavidhameva.
anya-e0301n:1036_4: Na sappaccayāpaccaya vasena duvidhanti evaṃ pavattaṃ ekavidhanayaṃ tāva dassetuṃ sabbañcātiādimāraddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1038_0: Ekavidhanayopi rūpavibhāgoevāti katvā “yathā uddiṭṭha rūpānaṃ ekavidhādinayaṃ dassanatthaṃ sabbañca panetantiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1042_0: Tattha sabbaṃpi rūpaṃ hetusampayogā bhāvato ahetuka meva,
anya-e0301n:1042_2: Kiñci ahetukanti evaṃ vibhāgo atthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n:1042_4: Sappaccayaṃ saṅkhataṃ lokiyaṃ sāsavanti pana yutto.
anya-e0301n:1042_6: Itarāni pana pāḷikamena asamentānipi sabhāga yugaḷattā bhāgato yuttānieva.
anya-e0301n:1042_7: Tattha attano janakena paccayena saheva vattatīti sapaccayaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1042_10: Attānaṃ ārabbha pavattehi āsavehi saheva vattatīti sāsavaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1042_11: Akaniṭṭha brahmasantāna bhūtaṃpi rūpaṃ kāmataṇhā visayabhāvena kāmeeva pariyāpannattā kāmāvacaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:1042_12: Natthi attanā gahitaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃnāma assāti anārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1042_13: Yo dhammo aññena payogena pahīnopi samudayapahāne asati apahīnova hoti.
anya-e0301n:1042_18: Rūpaṃpi edisameva hotīti vuttaṃ appahātabba mevāti.
anya-e0301n:1042_19: Aṭṭhānattā pahāna vāyāmaṃ na arahatīti attho. Athavā,
anya-e0301n:1042_21: Yadi evaṃ rūpaṃ bhikkhave na tumhākaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1042_23: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavissatīti idaṃ kathanti.
anya-e0301n:1042_24: Taṃpi tabbisayassa rāgassa pahānaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:1043_0: Rūpe kho rādha yo chando, yo rāgo, yānandī, yā taṇhā,
anya-e0301n:1043_2: Evaṃ taṃrūpaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti.
anya-e0301n:1044_0: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi kusalādīsu appahātabbesu veditabboti.
anya-e0301n:1044_4: Tena pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ na hetu hetuvippayuttantiādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n:1044_5: Tassa tassa puggalassa attabhāvapariyāpanno dhammasamūho ajjhattaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1044_6: Tasmiṃpica yattha taṇhāya atirekataraṃ daḷhapariggaho hoti.
anya-e0301n:1044_7: So cakkhādiko cittena saha chabbidho dhammo ajjhattiko nāma.
anya-e0301n:1044_10: Itarāni pana rūpādini phassādīnica tadupādāya taṇhāpariggahassa mandattā bāhirāni nāma.
anya-e0301n:1044_11: Yathā hi loke maṇivā suvaṇṇaṃvā rajataṃvā bahigehe nidahitvā thapitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1044_12: Pacchivā suppaṃvā ghaṭovā sarāvovā anto gehe thapito.
anya-e0301n:1044_18: Rūpādīni phassādinica sabbāni chaḍḍetvāpi cakkhādikaṃ chabbidhameva avassaṃ rakkhissantīti.
anya-e0301n:1044_19: Iti taṇhā pariggahassa daḷhamandatā vaseneva tesaṃ dvinnaṃ ajjhattika bāhiratā vuttā.
anya-e0301n:1048_0: “Attasaṅkhātaṃpā cittaṃ adhikicca tassa dvārabhāvena pavattatīthi ajjhattaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1049_0: Tasmiṃ atthe hi sati cittassa ajjhattatā na sampajjati.
anya-e0301n:1051_1: tvaṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamo bhavissatīti vadantā viya attabhāvassa sātisayaṃ upakārakattā cakkhādineva visesato ajjhattikānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1052_0: Tathā upakārātisayattāeva hi tesu sattānaṃ pariggaha daḷhatā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1052_3: Tattha pana pañca vidhaṃ pasādarūpaṃ upapattidvāraṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1052_4: Viññattidvayaṃ kammadvāraṃnāmāti oḷārikarūpaṃ pakatiyā thūlasabhāvattā ghaṭṭanasaṅkhātassaca attano kiccassa oḷārikattā.
anya-e0301n:1052_5: Santikerūpaṃ dūre pavattassapi sīghataraṃ ñāṇena gahaṇayogyattā.
anya-e0301n:1052_7: So duvidho visayavisayīnaṃ paṭighaṭṭanaṃ mahā bhūtānaṃ aññamaññapaṭighaṭṭananti.
anya-e0301n:1052_8: Tattha yena paṭighaṭṭanena pasāda dvārānaṃ bhavaṅgassaca vikārappatti hoti.
anya-e0301n:1052_10: Yena ruppanalakkhaṇānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ ruppana kuppana ghaṭṭana pīḷana bhijjanādayo pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:1054_0: “Yo sayaṃ nissayavasenaca sampattānaṃ asampattānañca paṭimukhabhāvo aññamaññapatanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1054_2: Yathāhi paṭighāte sati dubbalassa calanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1054_3: Evaṃ aññamaññapaṭimukhabhāve sati arūpasabhāvattā dubbalassa bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ hotīti” evaṃ mahābhūtaghaṭṭanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1055_0: Evañhi sati yāni loke ajjhattabahiddhāsantānesu ghaṭṭanāni dissanti.
anya-e0301n:1055_1: Yesaṃ vasena rūpadhammesu aññamaññaṃ laggana bandhana thambhana dhāraṇa calanādīnivā vaḍḍhana hāyana chedana bhedana vilīna vikiraṇādīnivā pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:1055_3: Naca tāni anuggaha upaghāta vasena pavattibhūta sannipāta saṅkhātaṃ ghaṭṭanaṃvinā aññapakārānieva sakkā bhavitunti.
anya-e0301n:1055_4: Itaraṃ soḷasavidhaṃ vuttapaṭipakkhavasena sukhumarūpaṃ dūrerūpaṃ apaṭigharūpañca.
anya-e0301n:1055_5: Upādinnarūpaṃ nāma katthaci yaṃkiñci sarīraṭṭhakarūpaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0301n:1055_6: Katthaci kammasamuṭṭhāna meva tadubhayaṃpi taṇhādiṭṭhīhi tusaṃ ādinnaparāmaṭṭhattā upādinnaṃ nāma nippariyāyato
anya-e0301n:1055_8: Kasmā tasseva sattasantāne niccakālaṃ pavattivasena sātisayaṃ bhusaṃ ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhatāsambhavatoti vuttaṃ kammajaṃupādinnarūpanti.
anya-e0301n:1055_9: Etaṃ mamātiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi bhusaṃ ādiyatīti upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1055_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana taṇhādiṭṭhīhi upetena kammunā attano phalabhāvena ādinnaṃ gahitanti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n:1055_13: So pana dhammato anaññattepi aññe viya katvā upacarīyati.
anya-e0301n:1055_18: Ghānādittayaṃ sampattavasena gocaraggāhikanti pañcavidhaṃpi gocaraggāhikarūpanti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:1055_19: Tattha pasāde allīyitvā laggitvā uppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sampattaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1055_25: Ākāsoca saddagahaṇe sotassāti cakkhurūpesuca aññamaññaṃ laggitvā uppajjamānesu ālokaparivārassa okāso natthi.
anya-e0301n:1055_27: Vāyuāpapathaviyo pana ghānādittayassa gandhādigahaṇe paccayā honti.
anya-e0301n:1055_34: Na hi dubbalapathavīsannissayo ālokovā rajovākāye patamānopi pasāde ghaṭṭetīti.
anya-e0301n:1055_35: Iti paccayavisesato tesaṃ sampattāsampattavasena gahaṇa viseso hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1055_38: Dūre pana mahantaṃ candamaṇḍalādikaṃvā phalikāditirohitaṃvā vaṇṇaṃ passati.
anya-e0301n:1055_41: tattha hi dūre saddo cirena suyyamāno dissati pacchimadisābhāge uppannopi saddo antarā mahante cetiyādike antarite sati dakkhiṇapassatovā suyyati.
anya-e0301n:1055_44: uppanno saddasaṅghāṭo āsanne ṭhitānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya yāva avasānā kamena pākaṭībhūto hoti.
anya-e0301n:1055_46: Ahaṃ suṇomīti pavattā sallakkhaṇavīthiyo sīghataraṃ nirantaraṃ viya pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:1055_47: Dūre ṭhitānaṃ pana paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso mandataro hoti.
anya-e0301n:1055_53: saddonāma nissayadhātuparaṃparāya pavattitvā dūraṃpi desaṃ gacchatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1055_54: Evaṃ gacchantoca gatagataṭṭhāneeva ṭhatvā savanūpacāre ṭhitānaṃ sotasahassaṃpi ghaṭṭeti.
anya-e0301n:1055_55: Mahante pana cetiyādike antarite sati yato ākāso ujuṃ vivaṭo hoti.
anya-e0301n:1055_58: Evaṃ gacchantoca yāva sotapasāde allīyitvā nuppajjati.
anya-e0301n:1055_64: Yathā anto kucchigato gandho bahi naghāyiyati.
anya-e0301n:1055_65: Tathā anto kucchigato saddopi bahi nasuyeyya.
anya-e0301n:1057_3: tassa so gocaro siyā.” Tipi vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1058_0: Na hi cakkhādidvayassa bahiddhā visayadesagamanasaṅgo atthīti.
anya-e0301n:1058_2: Pasāda maṇḍabhūtattā āpātamāgataṃ ārammaṇanimittaṃ sampaṭicchatīti attho.
anya-e0301n:1060_0: Viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā taṃtaṃ gocaragahaṇa sabhāvattāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1061_3: Ṭhānato desato uppattikāraṇato visuṃvisuṃ vavatthapīyatīti attho.
anya-e0301n:1061_6: Ācariyānandattherenapanettha gandharasaojā katthaci vinībhuttā dissantīti pañcavidhameva avinibbhogarūpaṃ icchitaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1062_2: Sāyeva hi paṭṭhāne nānākkhaṇika kammapaccayabhāvena vuttā. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n:1062_3: nānākkhaṇikā kusalākusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattāca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayoti.
anya-e0301n:1062_6: hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetu paccayena paccayotiādi.
anya-e0301n:1062_8: So hi kappasaṇṭhāpanavasena sakalaṃ okāsa lokaṃpi nānāsarīrasaṇṭhāpanavasena saka laṃ rūpamayaṃ kāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1062_9: sattalokaṃpi nānārukkhatiṇādīnaṃ abbhapaṭalameghavuṭṭhijalaaggi vātādīnañca saṇṭhāpanavasena sakalaṃ
anya-e0301n:1062_14: Rūpavirāgabhāvanābhūtaṃ arūpakusalaṃ kammajarūpaṃ najanetīti vuttaṃ pañcavīsatividhaṃpīti.
anya-e0301n:1062_15: Atisaṅkhatanti atītakāle yathākā lantare rūpaṃ janeti,
anya-e0301n:1062_19: Ajjhatta meva ajjhattikantivā ikasaddassa attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:1062_21: Khaṇekhaṇeti ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu.
anya-e0301n:1062_22: Ācariyānandatthero pana sabbesaṃpi catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ ekekassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇeeva uppādaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇeeva nirodhañca āha.
anya-e0301n:1063_0: Yassavā pana samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati, tassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti. Noti.
anya-e0301n:1064_0: Tathā tāni cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeeva nirujjhanti. Na uppādakkhaṇe. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:1065_0: Yassa kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, tassa abyākatā dhammā nirujjhantīti. Noti.
anya-e0301n:1067_2: Arūpe taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati.
anya-e0301n:1067_4: Pañcavokāre taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca nirujjhati,
anya-e0301n:1069_0: Arūpe kusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kusalā dhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:1069_2: Pañcavokāre kusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kusalā dhammāca uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:1070_2: Tasmā nayidaṃ arūpabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttanti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n:1070_3: Cittajarūpaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce. Tampi na.
anya-e0301n:1071_2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjati.
anya-e0301n:1071_3: Noca tesaṃ tattha jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjati.
anya-e0301n:1072_0: Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha manindriyañca nauppajjati.
anya-e0301n:1073_0: Ettha hi asaññasattānanti etena rūpajīvitindriya meva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1073_2: purimakoṭṭhāse pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n:1073_4: pacchimakoṭṭhāseca sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ icceva vuttaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n:1073_5: Pacchimakoṭṭhāse pana arūpa jīvitindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n:1073_6: Tathā gahaṇatthaṃ yamaka pāṭhantarābhāvato sabbaññuvisayeca ṭhāne pāḷiyo saṃsanditvā balavatiyā pāḷiyuttiyāeva ṭhātabbatoti.
